So far this stylus pen is the best overall performer, from the ones I've tried so far!It's very accurate, and my Moto G 2nd Gen (2014 version), is very responsive while using this stylus.From notes, to writing, and simple dragging and dropping Apps in folders, this stylus works the best for me.So far I've used 3 other bargain brands, (2 of which have the Hybrid, microfiber tip).My initial concern was to find a stylus with a slimmer tip, for use with texting.I've tried the Bargain Depot Premium brand with the Hybrid Miro-knit Fiber tip Stylus/Styli, Length 5.5"Slim Barrel, and although they worked well, they do occasionally drop apps while dragging them, and sometimes won't register while typing.What drew me to this stylus was the thinner tip, and I was interested it this Hybrid microfiber tip.They do seam to glide across the touch screen easier than a silicone tipped stylus.These did come close to my top pick, but the Targus stylus tip is a bit smaller, although a bit stickier, when sliding across the touch screen.Another stylus with a microfiber tip is the The Friendly Swede Extra Long Premium XXL Micro-Knit Hybrid Fiber Tip.This stylus also has some problems with not registering on my touch screen, loosing apps as I drag them, and thought the stylus and tip look small in there picture, there actually much bigger than you'd think, so for me, not a good stylus for typing.These were my least liked stylus.The 3rd I tried was the one that came with my smart phone, and it has the same problems as the other 2 mentioned above, dropping things as you drag them, and it has a large silicon capacitive tip, so it's a bit harder to use to type with.So far this Targus Ultrabook Stylus has had very few of the above mentioned problems. Plus it does have a much more narrow tip (great for typing), and it feels good in your hand (good weight).It measures about 6 inches long, and has the smallest tip I could find, without spending a load of cash.So well worth the cost!I really like it, and an sure others would as well.So I do recommend this stylus over the others I mentioned above.I am interested in an active stylus, but they cost much more, so they'll have to wait for now.

These are the best, high quality sweat pants I've ever had!Warm, but not overly so. Perfect for retaining heat on those cold days!The quality of these pants are excellent, a top quality sewing job, and the size fits perfectly.They have a nice & extra wide waist band (2 full inches), with a sewn in tie.I always look for sweat pants with the wide waist band, they just seam to be made better, and the wider width really helps with keeping them up, and in place when active.I also really like the open bottom legs, rather than an elastic band cuff.The fit is great, and I love how loose they feel, a very relaxed fit, they're somewhat baggy, but not overly so, and the fleece inside is super soft feeling on your legs. They hang really well on you, just very nice fitting sweat pants.They are warm, but not a heavy material at all, it's really quite light feeling.Just great for that cold day, of around the house work, or just lounging around.I wear then for running out on errands, and even when guests stop by.All around, very nice looking sweat pants!So the short of it is, they're made very well, and look equally nice.They seam to be made to last a very long time, so equally tough.High quality, excellent sewing, great fit, made to last, everything you'd want!I've bought 4 pair and am very happy with all of them.Not to many colors to choose from, but enough (more would be nice).The Carbon Heather color is extremely nice looking, and my favorite!Highly recommended!!!

This Fosmon case/holster provides a very high level of protection for your Moto G 2nd Gen Smart Phone. Designed to be Very Tough, with 3 separate layers of shock absorbing defense. Plus it has a excellent, & very positive non-slip grip. Super quality for a low price. Affordable, and great looking!!!The Moto G 2nd Gen (2014) Smart Phone is my very first smart phone. After a few days of use, I absolutely fell in love with this phone. So finding the best holster for it became my biggest priority, focusing on high protection! I'll elaborate more, about this holster below.The build of this holster is Top Quality, using Top Quality materials, and should last the life of your phone, and then some!It's also very sharp looking, and at a minimal, and unbelievably low price of between $7 to $9 dollars (thats including shipping costs), it's more than worth the cost for such a high quality case and holster. I'd really expect to pay double of what this holster costs, due to it's quality build and very high level of protection.Once you have your phone inserted into it's protective case (comes with this holster), it then slides fairly easy into the holster, and fits in it nice and securely. With this holster you wont need to worry about it slipping out, from any bump or jarring.When your phone is in this holster, it sits very close to your side, so very little chance of getting it snagged or knocked around from anything.The holster uses a spring loaded hing to attach to your belt, or pocket. It's a very good quality latch, that wont break because of over use. I like it much better than the others that use the same style hing and latch, but instead of using a actual spring, they designed it with bendable tension plastic, which is much stiffer, and much harder to use.The protection of the case that fits your Moto G 2nd Gen is second to none!It's made of very high quality silicone, and is excellent for shock absorption. Then that soft shell has a hard skeleton shell that fits around it, and that also has soft silicone ribs on the outside of the skeleton shell, for a complete non-slip grip.It does make the phone feel a bit thicker, but still fits your hand nicely, and extremely non-slip.You might think with all this padding and protection, the buttons would be hard to push, but they're not, they're still very responsive to your touch, thats the beauty of the high quality silicone!There are others that are equal and/or slightly different, if this one holds your phone to tight, but I prefer that so it doesn't slip out.Here is one thats Identical to this Fosmon Holster: E LV Dual Layer Armor Defender Holster Case Cover, this holster is equal in every way.This one here: Townshop[TM] Extreme Rugged Heavy Duty Impact Armor Hybrid Holster & Case, it has a shinny finish to it, and it slips out of it's holster very easy.But this last one may be a target for thugs to easily pop out and steal.Smart phones are targeted by thieves of all kinds these days, so be careful.The Fosmon is my favorite, and will continue to use it.I just love everything about this case & holster, and it just works well with the Moto G 2nd Gen.I would highly recommend this to all who own a Moto G 2nd Gen!!!It's one of the best holsters I've seen and used, and I love mine.

Please keep in mind that this is my first Smart Phone, and saying that, I absolutely "LOVE" this phone!!!This Moto G 2nd Gen gets very good & clear sound, it has the best sound quality of any past cell phone I've had, (again, never had a Smart Phone before this one).The quality of reception is excellent! I live in a rural area (lots of farming fields), but get a very strong signal, and before, that was a problem in this area. Although this phone is only a 3G & not a 4G LTE, it's still plenty fast enough for me.The build quality of this phone is also excellent, and very easy to install my Sim Card, and an extra 32Mb micro SDHC card, I chose the SanDisk Extreme PRO 32GB. It's very affordable, and one of the fastest SDHC cards made. Plus I've been using SanDisk storage cards of all kinds, for many many years, and have never been let down.This phone has a good weight to it, without being to heavy to handle. Very solid phone build!I've always liked Motorola & Samsung, for good quality cell phones.This one does not disappoint at all. Absolutely Zero buyers remorse!The features on this Moto G 2nd Gen are wide ranging and many.As this is my first smart phone, I found it easy enough to set up, and have been learning how to do things each day. The ability to connect to my Wi-Fi network really makes it easy on my phone plan, (I use Consumer Cellular). So while at home, all of my calls, data, and messaging, are unlimited, and all free, through my Wi-Fi.The phone plan usage takes affect only when I use it on the road. So it's very economical for me!When I turn it on, it automatically seeks out and connects to my Wi-Fi network, and when I leave the house, it automatically switches to the cell towers.This smart phone is basically a hand held computer, and very fast in my opinion, (again, never had a phone with a quad core processor in it).The battery life is just Ok, but when I stop playing with it, I'm sure it will last me far longer.This phone does everything I need, and much much more!This is a great smart phone at a great price.So for what it's worth, I'd highly recommend this phone.Update (12/13/2014)Man, I tell ya, the more I use this Moto G 2nd Gen, the more I Love it!!!This thing really is a handheld computer, and there's just so many very useful Apps, it's unbelievable.I also very highly recommend getting this Holster:Fosmon Shock Absorbing, Hybrid Holster Cover and Case, for Motorola Moto G (2nd Generation, 2014)I did a lot of searching for a good holster, for my new Moto G 2nd Gen Smart Phone, and it had to have good protection, without breaking the Bank!This Case/Cover Holster is all that and more!I was just amazed at how nice this Holster is for the incredibly low price.It provides Excellent protection for my phone.Take a look at it, and it comes in different colors, other than Black.I think it's an excellent holster for the Moto G 2nd Gen!!!If your looking for a great protective case, rather than a holster, I first bought this one:LK  - Rugged Armor SpiderIt's an excellent case for this Moto G 2nd Gen!It also provides a high level of protection, with excellent materials, and great cushioning.

The Rugged Armor Spider 2 in 1 Defender is an excellent case/phone protector!It provides maximum protection, with minimal bulk added to your phone.This case protector fits the Moto G 2nd Gen (2014 model, with 5 inch display) perfectly.A.K.A Moto G EXT, purchased from Consumer Cellular.The whole cover is a rubber like material (Silicone), and very non-slip. So it's very easy to hold onto your phone with this protector. The ribs are a added benefit, which makes it even easier to hold, especially if your bumped into while your using your phone, or any other type of body jarring episode. It's simply really well designed, and as I said earlier, it fits the Moto G 2nd Gen perfectly.It also has a kickstand, which I use a lot when playing short videos for other family members.The kickstand is a great feature, and well thought out.It was 1 buying point for me, since I knew I'd use it a lot.The 2nd buying point was the overboard protection of the case itself, with very good shock absorption.The 3rd buying point was it's price, as there are many other case/protectors, with much less protection, but at a higher price.The addition of the free Stylus Pen was a nice bonus gift, which I use a lot, when at home sending texts or emails.In my opinion this product is easily a 5 star item, and I highly recommend it to anyone considering this case for there Moto G (2nd Gen) Smart Phone.

Phenomenal & Professional saw blade!Professional & Exceptional quality made saw blade!For a skill saw that requires a 6.5 inch blade, this is the best choice you can make.It's made in the USA, it's carbide teeth are fully re-sharpenable, and the carbide used for the teeth, is the highest quality carbide (there are many different grades of carbide used for saw teeth). These carbide teeth can even be replaced if broken off, by the company that resharpens your blades.The kerf cut is 1/8 inch, a little on the heavy side.This alone will give you plenty of resharpenings, which means a long life and a lot of use!When you do need to get it resharpened, go to a machine shop that does it, and not one that says they CAN sharpen it for you.Blades can be sharpened poorly, so make sure they specialize in resharpening circular saw, and/or table saw blades!This is one of the highest quality blades I've used, and have been in custom cabinets, and remodeling for many many years (30+). This is a Professional Quality blade!The 40 tooth count gives you that smooth cut, with very, very minimal chipping (if any).This makes it perfect for use on paneling, pre-finished plywood (Oak, Maple...), and also it's equally great when cutting any solid surface material, like Corian.This blade has a 5/8th's arbor, and works perfectly in my Dewalt 20V Max Skill Saw.The blade body is standard thickness, not one of those thin kerf throw away blades.I just got 2 new ones and they should easily last me for at least 3 years or more with proper care, and with medium duty use.Even with heavy, and everyday use, the 2 of these will last about 2 years.Vermont American makes Top Quality blades of all sizes, and I would recommend them all, and to anyone who asks!Vermont American is easily one of the highest quality saw blade makers. You can walk into the smallest cabinet shop, and the largest cabinet manufacturer, and I can guaranty you, they're using Vermont American saw blades.You wont be disappointed!!!I was pleasantly surprised I found them here on Amazon!

Extremely bright, pure white lights, and really easy to install!A great investment for any car or truck.It probably took me a little while longer to install these, due to cold hands.But if you can change your normal halogen headlight bulbs, then you can install these just as easy.The only extra step is to mount a ballast (a small one), and it just screws to any open area near your headlight. 3 small screws and your done mounting the ballast.The wire connections are easy to see, and pretty self explanatory. Each connection uses a different style plug (3 connections to make). This way, no mistakes are possible.These LED headlights really are plug & play...just really easy to install.35 minutes and I was done.These headlights are super bright, with 2600 lumens on low beam, and 3200 lumens on high beam.They use Cree LED's so you can be confident they are the best made.The color is listed as being 6500k, but other reviews I've read, including my mechanics boards and flashlight forums, all say these are measured closer to 5600k and 5700k, but that is still a excellent color/temp.These are a Pure White light, they have absolutely no bluish tint to them (or any other color tint for that matter), just a very nice pure white light.I call these an investment because they will last you for a very long time!They're advertized here as having a 25,000 hour life span, but the paperwork I received with my kit says 30,000 hours.So either way, these will last for many many years to come!Thats double the life span of a LL (long life) Halogen headlight, that comes standard with new cars today, and the LL Halogen headlights are only 50% or less, as bright.There 5 year Hassle-Free Warranty is great, and if any problems do arise, you also get lifetime customer support.So to sum it up, you get very high quality (Cree) LED headlights that are super bright (easily replacing any HID lights).Being LED's, you get the long life that an LED gives you. So no worries about burning out.Plus these are super easy to install.You also get the added benefit of these running on much lower power draw than normal halogen or HID headlights, which means less strain on your alternator.I just love mine, and will recommend them to everyone who asks me.

For a gas additive, this is one of the best.For me, I didn't start using this for more horsepower, and to this day, I've had no fuel injector problems at all.But this product helps improve my gas mileage, and can keep down, and eliminate carbon deposits, so for me it's worth every penny! It also acts as a gas stabilizer, making it possible to store emergency generator gas for 2 years or more.I say it's worth every penny because it's so concentrated, just 1 - 8oz. bottle will last you for a very long time. I had to double check the amount to make sure I was reading the bottle correctly.Just 1/4 oz. of this will treat 20 gallons of gas. Thats just amazing to me!So considering how far just 1 bottle will go, and considering all of the listed benefits this additive can give to your vehicle, it's an excellent bargain for anyone using it.I now keep half a bottle in my road emergency kit/bag, for easy access when I need to stop for gas.I also use AR9100-8 ~ Archoil Friction Modifier 8oz, (there oil additive), which is also one amazing product!Now that I'm using both, in an engine that just turned 50,000 miles, I'm really very impressed with Archoil products.I highly recommend both products, for everyone to use on a regular basis.If you can save some gas money, and extend your engines life, why not!Great stuff.

My first reaction, after adding this to my oil....Wow!!!This stuff is amazing.I initially let my Van (3.8L V6), sit for about half an hour, after adding this to my oil (Mobil 1). I just had my last oil change about a month ago.Then after starting the engine, I noticed from the start, it slowly became more and more quiet. Just a much smoother idle & smoother running.This is all with the hood up, and standing directly over the engine.Once I closed the hood, I let it idle for about 3 to 4 minutes, then took it out for a drive. Plenty of time to warm up the engine, and get everything circulating, and mixed up good.I did notice that the engine actually sounded different, just softer, much more quiet, and simply a better running engine.The difference in my Van is pretty dramatic. Well worth the cost, and is going to be part of every oil change, from now on.I've read all of the other reviews, and now I really understand why they talk so highly about this oil additive.Adding this to every oil change (for only about $20.00), is a really easy decision to make, now that I've actually used it, and I've seen, first hand, how it really helps, smooths out and quiets your engine.Plus this is also an additive for your transmission fluid, your differential case fluid, and your power steering fluid.They give you the proper amounts you should add (in conjunction with each capacity amount), right on the bottle, and both easy to read and understand directions.I'd now recommend this additive to everyone who owns a vehicle on the planet!This is definitely going to be used in the next oil change for my home generator.

This is an excellent roll-up for your wrench sets!It's made of all canvas, and really well made, at that.The canvas is thick, and some have spoke to that (in there review), as a negative, but this is a really good thing!It will last a very long time, and also given time, the canvas will become easier to roll up.Plus being made out of thick canvas, it's very durable.About the only improvement I can think of, is it would be nice if this had an additional 2 slots, so a 16 slot tool roll-up.Because with both my SAE and Metric sets, I have a couple of extra wrenches, (Large Ones), and I could use the extra slots.Having my wrenches in these roll-ups, I now have a lot more useable room in my chest drawer.If you want to hang this roll-up on a workbench pegboard, the grommets are very good quality, and will easily support a full set of wrenches.I've been looking for some good quality wrench roll-ups, and now I'm really glad I found, and chose these!Another great quality product from Arsenal!I highly recommend this roll-up to everyone who asks me.

High quality/High performance air filter!Great upgrade to your old OEM filter, and the last one you'll ever buy.Just clean when dirty.They recommend a cleaning at 50,000 miles, and sooner if in a rural/country setting, or simply running on dirt roads frequently, so I'd say 30,000 to 35,000 miles in a continually dusty environment. This filter also provides better air flow, which translates to better gas mileage, and more horsepower...better acceleration.It fits perfectly in my 2002 Ford Windstar (3.8L V-6 engine).It's no easy task putting it in, since everything is so crammed together, on a sideways sitting V6 engine. Just no room to maneuver your hands for any wiggle room. But with some stubbornness, and persistence,  you can do it!I'll be checking my gas mileage for the next 60 days or so, and I hope to see an improvement.This is a much better quality filter than your standard Fram, but it should be, due to it's cost!I really haven't noticed any improvement in pickup (possible a little), I mainly bought it so I can keep it, and just wash when needed. So no need to keep replacing it when it gets dirty. I am looking forward to seeing if it does give me better gas mileage.All in all, it's a great air filter.Very high quality, durable, it should last the life of your vehicle, washable/reusable, with much better air flow than your stock/OEM filters.I'd highly recommend it!Update 1/1/2015I've really enjoyed checking the gas mileage, because I've seen a good 10% to 13% increase in mileage, I see the biggest increase when on the highway. The horsepower is much more subtle, but very noticeable when passing on the highway, not so much from a dead stop. Still well worth the cost!

This is a very thorough set of 1/2" drive, metric sockets.They're SK's, so Made in the USA! Always a plus for me.Very High Quality!All are 6 point sockets, and I described them as being a thorough set because they are complete, from 10mm to 24mm, and every size in between, No left out sizes.Many other sets you find will say 14 pieces set, or 15 piece set, but those sets always seam to skip some sizes, like the 19mm, 21mm, 23mm, and others.This set doesn't, it has them all, it's a full 10mm to 24mm...Complete Set!Now this is just my opinion, but I think 6 point sets are the best (for most, but not all situations). You'll have ZERO problems with rounding, due to the torque being applied to the flat side of the bolt or nut, instead of the point of the bolt or nut. So if my ratchet has enough room, I always grab my 6 point sockets.I've been using SK sockets, drives, and wrenches for many many years, and I can say they"re still the same, Extremely high Quality tools, now, as they were years ago.A big plus is they don't come in a thin & disposable display case. These come in a hard plastic carrying case, which is a nice extra for me.If your looking for a high quality socket set, this is it, and for under $100.00, it's also a great deal.I'd expect to pay $50.00 to $75.00 more for a set like this, so I'm very happy with this purchase!Another plus, is all SK products I've ever owned come with a "Full" Lifetime Warranty, and not a "Limited Lifetime Warranty".This socket set also comes with a FULL LIFETIME warranty, so if you ever snap a socket, or damage it somehow? Just walk it into any Hardware Store that sells SK tools, and they will honor that warranty, on the spot, no receipt needed.Also, as said, this is a socket set, so it doesn't include a ratchet. If you do need a good ratchet, and if your looking for an extended ratchet, I can tell you this one here is simply wonderful!!!I own one to, and really LOVE it!SK 40170 1/2-Inch Drive 15-Inch Professional Reversible Ratchet, this ratchet is smooth and solid! Plus it's longer than a standard ratchet, normally in the 10 inch range, this one gives you an addition 5 inches, for added force/torque. You can do a lot more with a ratchet this size than a standard size ratchet, much less reaching for your breaker bar!Being SK (yes, I am a little biased towards SK tools, simply because they are always so good), and made in the U.S.A. your getting one of the best ratchets made, with one of the best warranties in the business!SK is, and always has been, a great brand of Very High Quality tools.I'd VERY highly recommend these, to anyone looking for High Quality, metric 6 point sockets!!!

This is a very very bright light for night vision cameras, that can use a 850nm IR illuminator/emitter.I emailed my manufacturers Tech Support to find out if I needed a 850nm, or the 940nm emitter.There reply said my cameras were designed to see IR between 820nm and 870nm, so the 850nm emitter would work perfectly for my needs, and they added that my cameras would not see the 940nm emitter, since thats outside of it's IR optical range.As I said, this one is Very Bright, and I do really like the enclosure, being rated IP66, means it's dust tight/proof, and can take high pressure water jets, from all angles.But don't mistake that for being water proof! If it was rated IP68, or IP69, that would be water proof.The first digit indicates it's resistance to dust, the last digit is the indicator of it's water resistance.You can find that info online in various places. Also under commercial code enclosures.I only have 1 problem with this product, and it's not a big deal to me, so I didn't take any stars away from it's rating.It's regarding the hardware & design of the hardware.The enclosure is made of cast aluminum, and has a top notch finish applied to it.But cast aluminum does NOT hold tight and thin threaded screw hardware.With a very very minimum amount of torque, the screw that holds the fixture on the elbow joint, that has teeth on both halves, for adjustments, it immediately stripped. I'm talking about just a snugging up of the screw, not even considering tightening it yet, because I was checking the angle of the light.The screw itself is made of extremely cheap and soft metal, and it was threaded very fine.Now that with a cast aluminum enclosure, with a tapped hole, well, everything just went to hell, quickly and decisively!Luckily I keep nuts and bolts of all sizes on hand (in large amounts...lol).It was a very quick fix for me, I just got a hardened bolt (10/32), about a 1/4 inch longer than the original, and used a wax insert bolt to tighten it back together. All done.Also, for the mounting plate..."Pre-Drill" the holes, before trying to just screw them in without a pre-drilled hole, or you'll strip out the Phillips head on the screw. Or better yet, either find, or buy some better/harder mounting screws!This is another oversight by the manufacturer. Still, not terribly bothersome to me.That was the only negative I ran across.This could be a major pain in the ass for those who don't have extra pieces and parts on hand, in case of a situation like this.If that were the case for me, I would have been pissed, knowing I would now need to make a trip to the hardware store for a single nut and bolt of good quality, which would probably cost more in gas, to drive into town & back, than the nut and bolt itself.So if this was a problem for others as well, I can understand the 2 and 3 star reviews.This is a nice unit, and would only cost a few cents more, for proper hardware.Pretty silly (and cheap) for a manufacturer, if you ask me!The power supply comes with this unit, so it's basically a mount, plug & play. Very easy!For me, this IR illuminator works excellent! On my cameras, in night vision, this 1 emitter looks like 2-150 watt Halogen flood lights, just oozing out light, everywhere!It's also a very nice and wide angle of light, and it does carry a good distance, but realistically, I think they are a little over confident in there claim of 300 to 400 feet. I can easily see a good 200 feet, possibly more, and like I said, with a nice wide spread.The light is very even in it's distribution of light. It's a true flood light. No hot spots, just a large area full of light.I'll upload a screen shot of the night vision.Well, apparently Amazon isn't posting customer pics anymore, but they are posting your uploaded picks in your own profiles, so to see my uploaded pic of this product throwing light, you'll need to go to my profile and look at it. It's currently at the top, so you don't have to scroll through a bunch of reviews.I do highly recommend this IR emitter to anyone asking.

This knife really is a work of art!!! Just Beautifully crafted!!!The Super SOG Bowie is a very, very solid knife.Made with AUS 8 steel, it's very resistant to water/rust damage, yet still has a high carbon content.Plus with the TiNi finish, makes this blade that much more resistant to any and all environmental threats.The blade itself is a 7-1/2 inch long chunk of steel.It's slightly over 1/4 inch thick, and that 1/4 inch carries down to within 2-1/4 inches to the tip.It's also 1-1/2 inches wide, through most of the blade.Just an excellent blade, with beautiful lines.This Super SOG Bowie comes sharp as a razor blade, this is my 3rd SOG knife, and I still say that SOG delivers the best factory grind on a blade, that I've ever seen. I own quite a few knifes. A bunch of Ka-Bar knives, 3 Zero Tolerance locking folders, and some Buck knives.SOG, by far, comes with the cleanest and sharpest grind on there blades.Great Handle!!!They did a excellent job with the stacked leather handle, (just beautiful work).The handle is a full 5 inches long, and thats Not including the blade guard. So even with very large hands, this knife has plenty of room to get a good solid grip on it!The Super SOG Bowie, as a whole, is a great, great knife! The balance is very good, though the complete knife does carry some weight, I still find it easy enough to use and handle.This really is the perfect choice for a hunter carry knife, even if, for the only reason, if your other means of protection/hunting failed, I.E. riffle, handgun, this Super SOG Bowie will dispatch a dangerous animal quickly, and you can depend on this knife.I simply LOVE this knife, and would buy it again tomorrow, if I lost mine.The Super SOG Bowie comes with a very nice & heavy leather sheath, and the sheath has a leather (sewn on) pouch for a sharpening stone, and the sharpening stone is also included.This Super Bowie is a Home Run for SOG, one Spectacular Bowie Knife!!!

This Ka-Bar Bowie Hunter is just Ok...I'm a little hesitant to review this knife, but I'll give your some data thats not in the description page anywhere, some basic facts, and a few of my opinions, then you can make up your own mind, if this knife is for you, or not?This is definitely not a crap knife, as some say it is.However, I do agree, it's also definitely not up to Ka-Bar standards, which with the Ka-Bar name, you'd expect a tough, no-nonsense, heavy duty, do it all knife. This knife is not any of that.It's a "Show knife".It comes completely polished up, very shiny. They do a very nice job at this!It's a traditional Bowie style blade.The blade is 7 inches long, 1.25 inches wide, and 1/8th inch thick.The steel is AUS-6, and it's a little softer than I'd like to see in a hunting/skinning knife.For a blade with these dimensions, I'd think it really should have been at least 3/16th's thick, if it were going to be used for hunting and specifically, cleaning/skinning.At least in my opinion.But again, for a show knife, thats really all you need.Plus you need to remember, it's only a 43 dollar knife.The knife is solid and well made.There is absolutely no give in the handle (no bending, very solid and stable), thats the first thing I checked.The stacked leather handle is done well, and very nice looking.The blade guard does look like solid brass, and is also well polished.The aluminum pommel is polished, and attached using a solid 1/8th inch pin, so the partial, full length tang, is not a welded on wire, or rod, as another reviewer had stated, at least not in my case.It is a true "Partial Full Length Tang".For the cost, I really don't think you can expect that much more.It is a very nice looking knife, and it is a "Show Knife".It is well made, but honestly I don't know what I'd use it for, because it's just a very light weight knife, meaning, it's not meant for any type of over use, or abuse!Again, this is only my opinion.It's definitely not close to a Becker, or a military Fighting/Utility knife.The sheath is FAR less impressive!Lastly, this is a very light knife (light in weight), so this may make it more appealable to some? Less weight to carry, can be a big plus when ounces count.If your looking for a "Top of the Line" Full Tang Bowie, take a look at the SOG S10B-K Tech Bowie. It's one of the best!Very tough/strong, AUS-8 steel, Kraton G handle (synthetic rubber, both heat and chemical resistant), Comes shaving sharp, Holds an edge really well, 1/4 inch thick blade, and comes with a very nice Kydex sheath. The SOG Tech Bowie is what a Bowie knife should be. I Love mine!Yes it does cost more, but I think it's worth every penny!So you can make your mind up, if this knife is for you, or not.Being only 43 dollars, I really can't complain.It might make a nice gift to someone who collects knives?I am thinking of gifting mine.I do love Ka-Bar knives, I own 5 full tang, and a few other locking folders.That being said, I really can't recommend this knife, one way or another.

Simply a great floor jack!I've read all the reviews both here and on many other web sites, and I couldn't find one thing I didn't like about this floor jack. Apparently most everyone else feels the same way.Nothing but glowing reviews.Personally, I love this jack!You can easily see that it's over built, it's welds are all excellent/very solid.It being very low profile is great (2-3/4"), but this jack is also great in it's lifting range (up to 24 inches), and overall reach.The lifting base is solid and wide, just great for stability.It's just an all around great floor jack, that any home owner would love.It lifts the front end of my 2002 Ford Windstar with no problems.It operates/lifts really smooth & easy. It lowers very smooth also.Being front end heavy, my last jack had some problems with my Van, but it was also 15 years old. Gave it to a friend who's gonna replace some parts on it, and keep it for himself.After the reviews already written, I really can't add any more.For more info & a very good, well written, and detailed review, read "Jimmy Stewart's" review, it's a good read!Titled "A Unique, Multipurpose Lift"It's currently the top review.Anyways, this is an excellent floor jack, which everyone could use.If your considering this floor jack, I'd highly recommend buying it, and you'd be very happy with your purchase!I love it, and I bet you would to!

This USB cord is perfect for my needs!It's high quality, and very well made.I own a few Dropcam Pro's, and they use this type cord (Male USB to Micro/male USB), for both setup, and for powering the camera, after setup, using a USB/110 volt wall plug adapter.The only problem is the included cable that comes with the Dropcam Pro, it's about 6 feet long, and they give you no option to request a longer cable.Plus the included cable is White, and the Dropcam Pro is all solid Black, so again, this cable is perfect for me!I know there are a thousand uses for cables like this one.I just thought it might be helpful if someone else in my situation was looking for a long cable, but wasn't sure if it would work with there Dropcam Pro.I can tell you that it works perfectly with the Dropcam Pro.For any other use, if you need this length of cable, it really is a very good cable, and very affordable as well.I'd highly recommend it.

I love Mediabridge products!Always good quality, at an affordable price.I purchase this 3 foot ethernet cable and the 7 foot version, both work perfectly, and are of very high quality construction.I've bought many Mediabridge cables, of many different kinds in the past, and 2 things have always been true regarding Mediabridge cables.One, is that they're always reasonably priced.Two, is that they're always made to higher standards, more robust, just higher quality cables.They also have very good customer support (if needed).I'll continue to buy Mediabridge cables, as the need arises!Highly recommended!

Well, I can tell you my first thoughts of this product were, WOW...pretty impressive for only 10 bucks.But please keep in mind, this is my first night of trying these out.According to many other reviews, the IR array will start failing soon, and quickly become useless.I'm keeping an open mind, and will give these a fair chance.How it looks, and how it's build quality is...It's small/compact, it looks very well built, it has a nice & thin protective cover (a rubber or silicone of some type) over the impact resistant glass and around the front edge of the casing (aluminum or thick plastic of some kind?). The mounting bracket could have been made out of better/stronger material, it takes very little effort to bend. But all in all, the build looks solid and professional.Now for how well it works...I use a WiFi Dropcam Pro camera (multiple), and 1 that's set up inside my house, pointed out through a double pane window. Yes...I had to disable the built in IR illuminators, which was an easy task using some 3M electrical tape. Now, with this Dropcam Pro, I can still enable night vision, without getting a lens full of reflecting glare. I can also come close to seeing my entire front yard, with the exception of the far left, driveway, and mailbox. The second Etekcity Night Vision Illuminator, mounted just above the garage door, took care of lighting up the rest of the front yard. Excellent coverage for such a small IR unit.Now with both mounted, powered up, and working properly, my entire front yard is lit up like day time, and I can also see across the street, and see my neighbors house and fence line. I mean these things are crazy bright, and worth every penny of the 10 bucks each! The power cord was only an extra 8 bucks. Still a great deal to me, both being "Prime" so fast shipping and delivery.I easily get 60 feet of good illuminated views, probably more, haven't actually measured it.2 factors are going to determine if these will work well for you.1 is the quality of the camera your using, this really does make a huge difference.2 is if 850nm is the right wavelength for your camera.I only mention this because some of the bad reviews stated they saw little to no improvement, with there night vision, and this might be due to the cameras need for a different wavelength IR.So I can only speak from the point of a Dropcam Pro owner, these work excellent with the Dropcam Pro!Now all I can do is wait, and see when these burn out and become paper weights, which a lot of reviewers say happened to them.I'll update this review, if or when, either one fails on me, or if they keep running strong. I have a feeling there going to keep working just fine.For now, I love em!!! (I have 5 of these now).They work as described & expected...Very Nice.At this time, I would recommend these.Update 9-4-14:Shortly after buying the first 2, I bought 3 more.All (for the first 30 days), have performed perfectly.Zero loss of any IR array LED's. As bright as day one (all 5).Zero failures, Zero loss of any IR LED's.I'll keep updating this, since some say these didn't last a week, a Month, or up to 3 to 4 months.Or, I've also read that some will burn out 1 or 2 IR LED's a day, or every few days.Again, best 10 bucks I ever spent! (Per unit)Last Update: 1/1/2015Zero failures, great IR illuminators, at a great price!!!

I've been using the Netgear AC750 for a while now, and it has been wonderful!!!I love this WiFi extender, and everything about it!I know there are so many reviews about this particular networking device, that my review will most likely go un-read and un-noticed, and thats just fine with me. I mainly want to convey my satisfaction with this Netgear Extender, how well it works, and how easy it was (for me), to get running. I do emphasize the "for me" part, because I do have a lot of experience in setting up networks, and all of the security protocols.Setting up secure networks can be a very tricky job, even for the most savvy computer techs. Years ago, I was one of those that thought I knew it all, and tried to setup my first secure network...I screwed it up. I've been building PC's for years, and had no idea there was so much involved in setting up a network.So I read, and then read some more....and then even more...I say this because there are a lot of bad reviews for this Netgear Extender...A Lot!This really is, a very good piece of hardware.I have read about half of the bad reviews, and though it is unfortunate, I see that most, if not all, are due to user error, and nothing else, except for very poor customer service help from Netgear Support.I really do blame the poor customer support from Netgear, more so, than I do the user error. If your going to sell networking hardware, your need qualified support staff, and it seams as though Netgear is answering questions using poorly written, form letter style, cheat sheets, and not speaking from experience, as they should!Now with that said, they do have a "genie" that you can use to take you through the basic setup, and be done with it.I didn't, and haven't used there Genie, so I can't really comment on how well it works, or how good of a job it does.I set mine up in advanced mode. Well, I set up my router in advanced mode and then added my extender to it, but it works just great, and I use WPA2-PSK, AES.I've also got NAS enabled with MAC address filtering, among other features.My best advice would be, if your new to router setup, and extender additions, ask around your circle of friends, and see if you can find someone who's done this type of setup before, and see if they could come over for a bit and just take a look at what you have, and what you want to do.I use mine in a long ranch style home, with my router at the far west end.I know it should be centralized...but it's not.My network consists of 1-Netgear Router, this (AC750) Netgear Extender, 2 laptops, a couple of Apple products, and 4 WiFi enabled cameras (Dropcam Pro)My router covers most of my house very strongly. But...I have 1 Dropcam at the far, opposite end, and with a signal thats just slightly degraded, due to distance, thats where this extender comes into play.Now, what was a slightly pixelated video feed, is now a very sharp detailed video feed.This can be a hair pulling event, if your not prepared!!!Bottom line is, this is a very good WiFi extender, and I'd highly recommend it to anyone who asked me.

I really like this lamp shade.It's a perfect "White" color, and is made as well as any I've seen at Sears or J.C. Pennies.The lamp shade I received was exactly as described, in every detail.It fits my lamp perfectly, and is also made very sturdy.I wanted the white color, to both reflect and allow the best brightness, in a dark room.This lamp shade just plain works well, in that aspect.It's make/construction is solid and high quality.After close examination, I found no flaws at all.Anyone considering this lamp shade would be very happy with it, as I am!I'd recommend this lamp shade to any & all.

This latest BP monitor from Omron (BP791IT), is Excellent!!!In 2000, I started having blood pressure issues. My Doctor wanted me to monitor it while I was at work, and at home. He recommended the Omron BP monitor.The model I purchased has a power button, a start button, and a memory button,(the memory capacity was 12 readings, of blood pressure & heart rate).It came with the adult small cuff (D-ring style), carry bag, and external AC power adapter.I took it with me, once a year, to my doctors appointments, to be sure it was giving me accurate readings.It was right on the money, correct!It is still, today, working perfectly, and giving correct readings.Before anything happened to it, like rubber rot, cuff failure, or any kind of electronic failure, I wanted to make sure I had another, so I purchased this one (Omron 10 Plus Series), from Amazon.I love this new one, and all of the new options you can use!I do still monitor my blood pressure, but I'm also the primary care giver for my 86 year old Mother.This monitor (Omron 10+), lets me check and record readings for both me and my Mom, and thats hugely convenient for me and our doctor (we both see the same doctor).I haven't had this new one (the 10 plus), for very long, but right out of the box I checked it against my old monitor, which I know to be correct, and it is right on the mark correct, when checking both me and my Mom.I really love the "Irregular Heartbeat Detector" and the option of using the "TruRead" mode.I use the TruRead for the both of us, and having the irregular heartbeat detector, is a great piece of mind when taking my Moms BP readings.I also really like that it has a built in calibration checking system.Before buying this particular model, I did read all, or most of the 1 & 2 star reviews.I noted a continued complaint about the comfort fit cuff, and almost all of the bad reviews were based on this.I do have larger arms, over 13 inches, and the comfort fit cuff is very easy for me to use.However, I can see how it could be a problem for someone with skinny arms, and no help.When I use it on my Moms arm, it does take 2 hands to place and secure it properly.Other than that, I also read that some say it's to slippery to secure it to your own arm.I haven't had that problem, and it doesn't seam slippery to me.I've had only 1 single error reading, and found it was due to the wrong placement of the cuff.I had placed the blue alignment line, closer to the top of the arm, and not right in the middle.Once I corrected that, no more errors.So far I've found this new style of cuff very easy to use.I do like it better than the large adult cuff (with D-ring), that I've been using.It goes on both easier and quicker, and it is very comfortable.Omron has been a trusted name for many years now, and a top pick from Consumers Choice.I really like the Omron 10 Plus, and would quickly and highly recommend it to all who asked.
Bonds super fast and works great under water.  Best to use all at once or make sure that you seal unused portion tightly to prevent it from drying out.  Also, store inside, especially in winter.

These are super absorbent and incredibly soft.Plus, the ridges make these dishcloths great for wiping down counters or cleaning/drying dishes and glassware.Just remember to wash with only whites or these will absorb every color!

I used the word frozen addicts because that is exactly what my 4yr old niece is.  She has watched the movie over 50 times and can almost recite it by heart.  I was thrilled to try this to see her reaction.  She is only 4 so I think her experience may have been better than some of the other reviewers with older children.  At 4 this really captured her attention and she played with it at least 4 times after we had installed it.There are 5 games that you answer questions on and then you play the game.  Her favorite was Jewelry making and after trying all the other games, she kept going back to that.  I think if your kids love frozen as most children do and are in the lower age range for this game, they will love it.  My neice certainly did.

The 1 quart dish is a very nice vibrant red.  The dimensions are 10x10 and 4 inches deep.  I have used it 3 times so far, 2 times for Mac and Cheese and once for a party I used it for Sausage dip.  It is nice that you can take it right from the oven to the table.  Cooks evenly, is relatively light at about 4lbs.  My reason for the 4 star vs the 5 star is the price.  It seems 53.97 for this product is very expensive considering there are quality casserole dishes much more reasonably priced.Would be excellent for a single person or a couple.  Not recommended for a large family at 1 quart size.

Loved this book.  Elizabeth LIttle is an extremely gifted writer and storyteller.  And, while the story is a bit far fetched, (ok, very far fetched) it is great, great fun.  I love her descriptive writing and I also love her sarcasm and wit.  I was sorry to see that this was her first novel as I want MORE!!  I would love more of Jane too, what an exceptional character.  Well done, Ms Little.

We've been using this for about a week now and our feet and backs really love it.It is placed right where we stand when we are cooking on the stove.  We also move it by the counter where we usually chop or cut vegetables, fruits. etc.It really is like having a pillow underneath your feet.Also, it moves easily (you can slide it with your foot) but not too easily where you could slip when stepping on it.Great item for the kitchen or wherever you are standing in place for long time periods.

Received the men's X-large size shirt.My son is wearing this and it fits him great.  He's 6'4" and has broad shoulders so he usually gets an XL.  However, the shirt is sometimes tight around the armpits when he raises his arms.This shirt is cut big enough that he can raise his arms without it getting too tight around the sides.Also, the material is thicker than  normal short-sleeved shirt so it is best for wearing in temps under 80 degrees, in my opinion.

I thought if there ever was a home to test this product in, it would be ours.  We have 3 large dogs that shed a sweater each and every day.I was very excited when this rubber broom arrived.  The arm came in 3 sections and was very easy to put together.  I then tried it on all surfaces that gather dog hair in my house: hardwood floors, carpeted floors, rugs, tiled floors in bathrooms, painted walls, leather furniture, and fabric furniture.Nothing. It picked up nothing.  It pushed some hair around the hardwood floors but that's it.  Maybe the broom can't maintain its electrostatic charge, but in any case, it does not work in my house.The 1 star is because the handle is metal versus plastic.

This is such a simple item but it really does the trick for me when it comes to making my back feel less tense.I equate it to having a deep tissue massage.Here are its dimensions:It is 12 inches in length and has a 6 inch diameter.It is super lightweight: weighs only 5.8 ounces.It does not skid on hard flooring or on carpeted areas, which is great for safety reasons.This is much thicker than ones you may have seen or used before.  The 6 inch diameter really allows a greater pressure on your problem areas than the smaller diameter rollers.  It is a huge difference.This is well worth its price, especially if you use it as an alternative to massage therapy.

Received the men's large size shirt and big.My son is wearing this and it fits him great.  He's 6'4" and has broad shoulders so he usually has to get an XL but this is cut big, which is what we want.So, if you're looking to get this shirt, you may want to go down a size from where you are used to wearing.The material wicks off moisture and is wrinkle-resistant.

These tongs are a must-have for any griller that likes to cook at anytime, day or night.First, some quick specs:Length: 17.5 inchesWeight: 1 poundLight power source: 2 AA batteries (included)Here's a couple of nice features:+ It has a locking mechanism in the closed position that you can engage simply by pointing the tongs to the sky and closing shut.  The pin slides into place to keep the shut.  To open, just point the tongs down and the pin slides out.+ The flashlight can be easily turned on/off with a simple push button switch.  Also, it can be removed without any tools required: just simply push in the retaining button and it slides right out.+ Dishwasher safe but I take the flashlight out before washing even though it is waterproof.If I could give these 4.5 stars, I would. The only negative is that I wished it had a better grip; possibly something rubberized.  Otherwise, great idea and product.

I probably could have just bought the burnt out thermistor (upper right hand side of board) but the board was about 10 years old anyway so decided to get this to replace the original board.Instructions were clear, concise and very easy to follow.It was already set up for my T-15 cell so no need to make any adjustments.Total time to remove old board and install new one was about 50 minutes.  Works like a charm!

My son has fairly severe acne and we have used many products to help clear it up.  He has been using the Proactiv treatment for about a week and a half and so far we really don't see that much change.  It has dried up his face and is flaky in some places but the acne is still very red and irritated.  I told him to stop using it this morning as I think it may be more irritating to his face.  I am not sure why as it is a very low dose benzoyl peroxide.  He may be allergic to it and I should have tested on him beforehand.  I also think the price at 90.00 is very high for this type of product.I have a neighbor who swears by it as it has cleared up both her daughters acne, so I guess it may work for some people.

I have only worn false eyelashes a few times because the products I usually purchased from the drugstore, either lasted one or two times or the glue that comes with them are usually 1/2 dried when I try to apply it.  Those false eyelashes aren't cheap especially considering you will only get a few uses out of them.  These are beautiful and the compact that they come in is really nice.  It holds the glue, the eyelashes and is mirrored.  I had no trouble putting them on.  I didn't trim them until I put them on so I would see how much to trim.  I have big eyes, so I just cut a little off of the ends.I would also say this is a value, it is a bit more than drugstore lashes but I have had them on 4 times now and I have a ton of glue left and they still look new.

It is jam packed with all the goodies of raw carrots concentrated, but it is so thick and chalky that I couldnt finish the one and only smoothie I used it for.  I am now looking for ways to better stomach it.

This is the 2nd Ryder Creed novel in the series.  If you are a fan of Alex Kava and her Maggie O'dell books you will love this one.  I actually like this duo much better than the Maggie stand alone books.  The chemistry between the two is electrifying and you can't help root for Ryder since he is such a nice guy.  Seems non complicated on the outside but is actually very complex in the inside.It is a fast paced story dealing with events in the early 60's with a tie in to the Military and experiments today.  The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because I really thought the ending left way too many questions unanswered and it was clear to me that the ending was just the beginning of book 3.  I really dont care for those endings with any book, I would just rather it be finished and then move on.  But, that's just me.  Excellent read for all thriller fans.

This shirt was perfect for school since they require white, collared shirts as part of their uniform.I love that the bottom is straight (no tail longer than the front) all the way around.The only reason that I didn't give it 5 stars is that I thought the material was a little thin but it's probably a weak argument considering the price of the shirt.Overall, nice quality for the price.

If you wireless carrier is using a CDMA network (Sprint & Verizon), then don't buy this phone because it won't work on that network.  It can only work on a GSM network (AT&T & T-Mobile).Having said that, this is a nice, low cost alternative if you'd rather buy an unlocked phone that you can move around between GSM carriers versus getting a subsidized one that locks you in to one carrier.Here are some specs:Weight: 6.1 ounces - You'll find this a little bit heavier compared to some of the newer models, such as the Samsung Galaxy S6Width: 2.875 inchesLength: 5.625 inchesthickness: 0.375 inchesThere are only 2 buttons on the phone, both on the right-hand side: the power button and the volume button. There is no home button or back button.However, it is very easy to navigate throughout the phone between apps, camera, etc.It comes with several accessories, including, screen protector, soft plastic clear case, head phones, glass cleaner, stylus, and charger.I would have given it 5 stars but it is a little bulky weight-wise.

This little guy really works!It is 3.5 inches long by about 1.5 inches wide with 2 adjustable antennae.The setup was easy but that might have been because we have a TP-Link router as well (model AC 1750).  I just plugged it into a wall outlet and hit the "Re" button after I hit the WPS button on the router and it linked up in about 1 minute.There is also a 5 step process to set it up via their website but try this easy way first.Our router is dual band (2.4Ghz and 5.0 Ghz) and before we had this range extender, the 5.0 Ghz was not useable past 10 feet from the router.  Now, we can use the speedier Wifi all over the house.We placed the extender about 30 feet from the router and our house now has full coverage for both frequencies!If you have wifi dead zones or just want a stronger signal throughout your home or wherever your wifi router is located, this range extender give you the connection that you want. Awesome!

This set comes with 2 pillow cases, a fitted sheet, and a standard sheet, all Queen size.The high thread count is a huge difference from what we normally use (250 thread count) and just feels so much softer.  Excellent quality.

This is a beautiful, sterling silver necklace that would be loved by any silver lover.It is a tilted heart,with pave diamonds on the side and a delicate 18' chain.  The silver is a little over 2.5 grams but feels weighty in your hand. Sterling silver is stamped on the back.It comes in a jewelry store worthy black box and then there is another spring black box inside with the necklace.  Very classic for the price.  I wear a lot of silver and I pair this with a silver choker and it is very fashion forward.  The chain is delicate so I would not sleep in it but would feel confident wearing it everyday.This would be a great gift for any daughter 12+, or wife, girlfriend etc.Lovely, lovely piece for a bit over $60.00.

First I want to state that I have been using Phyto hair care products for years.  They are the best products for unruly or damaged hair.  With that said, I was excited to try the eye serum.  I have been using it for over 2 weeks now and I really cant see any significant difference on my eyes, or my bags.I started using it to tighten up my bags after I applied my makeup like I do with my current cream that reduces puffiness and lines.  If I applied after my makeup, I saw no difference.  So I decided to put it on before my makeup and that didn't work for me either because it was a little crusty and you could see it.  So, I stopped wearing it during the day and just applied it at night time. After 2 weeks, I did not notice a difference, however you may have to wear it longer to notice.The other reason for the 2 stars is the cost.  At 83.00 it is significantly more expensive than what I currently use and doesn't work as well. It is also such a small amount that if you used it daily and then at night you would need another bottle in a month or so.Again, it may just be me.  I really don't like to leave a negative review on a product from a company that I love, but there you have it.If I had the chance, I would try a sample and see how it works for you before you make the purchase.

I have had this casserole dish for a few weeks and have used it at least 3 times a week.  I originally thought it would be too small for a family of 3, but, it's actually the perfect size.  It is heavy (a bit over 7lbs) but very sturdy.  It cooks very evenly and I love that it is so Pretty that I bring it right to the table instead of leaving it in the kitchen like my old casserole dishes.  You can freeze in it, and bake up to 500 in it.It is a vibrant cherry red so it would also be great to bring to a friends potluck.  The price is very reasonable at just above $46.00.  When compared to my old bakeware this is much nicer, beautiful color, sturdier and it cleans very well.Great purchase for any home cook with 2-4 people..  I love it.

Okay, since this is a preference item, I'll give you my take and my husband's review as well.For me, I enjoy a super soft feathery pillow.  This type of pillow is way too firm for me.However, for my husband, he would give it 6 stars if he could.  It's nice and firm, which keeps his head elevated so he can breathe easier and snore less!I did like that it kept cool even though memory foam is notorious for heating up when you lay on it for awhile.  I suspect the shredded memory foam is responsible for the cooling factor.It's a queen size pillow which is 27" long x 17" wide x 5" thick.  It also weighs and impressive 7.5 pounds!The stitching is high quality and should last to we are old and gray!

I read color blind and really enjoyed the story, so I was excited to pick this up.  It starts out ok but then becomes completely monotonous and tedius.  Pages, and pages, and pages of Greek mythology, an old serial murder case thrown in with severed feet, a triple shooter and a completely unbelievable plot. Oh, and dont let me forget about her boyfriend doing something completely illegal and everyone turning a blind eye. The only reason I gave it 2 stars is that I really loved Molly the 6 yr old number savant.  I think if this book was edited much better it would have had a better outcome.  If you must read it, get it free from the library.This is the last Dr. Jenna Ramey book for me..

These headphones are incredible!  The sound quality is so crisp and clear.  You can hear each instrument distinctively.The ear cups are super soft and comfortable.  No cords are hardwired to the headphones.Also, the ear cups swivel so the overheard band moves down behind your head about 60 degrees while keeping the cups in the correct orientation on your ear.Here are some specs:+ Total weight:12.5 ounces+ 3.625" ear cup diameter+ 2 Cords included:  1 - 4' 7" cord with in-line mic and push button that allows you to switch between music and incoming calls.  1 - 5' 5" tangle-free coil cord.  When the coil is stretched, it gives you another 15 inches.  No in-line mic on this one.If you want top-of-the-line sound with some nice extra bells and whistles, you can't go wrong with these headphones.

This is a beautiful watch.  It comes in a very nice box, Tiffany blue top with a gold band and an orange bottom. The watch has a gold face with the Kate Spade pink heart at the top.  The band is both gold and a black rubber like material.The watch is water resistant but the instructions say to keep it out of the shower as steam may affect its performance.  The watch features a 2 year warranty and, incidentally, the battery life expectancy is also 2 years.This watch is larger than most but that is the style right now.  I own a Michael Kor's watch and they are the same size.  I have a really small wrist so I had to get 3 links taken out and it fits perfect.If you love a bigger watch that makes a fashion statement then this watch is for you.  I really love the way it looks on my wrist with a few gold bangles.Solid 5 star for me.

I feel like I am very fortunate to be able to review this Hitachi Impact Driver.  The high-quality engineering and design is evident as soon as you pick it up.  Here are some actual specs:+ Drill is 8.5" tall x 6" long x 2" wide.+ Carrying case is 15" x 11" x 4".+ The drill with battery weighs approximately 2.5 pounds.+ The complete set, including drill, charger, both batteries and carrying case weighs about 6 pounds.+ Includes 1 standard 1/4" phillips bit.I first used it to put together some patio furniture and it worked like a charm.  The variable speed motor minimizes your chances of over-torquing and stripping the bolt/screw heads.  The grip is very comfortable and secure.  The rubberized portion on the back grip ensures no slippage even when the sweat starts to pour.What I like the most is its very small profile for the power it delivers.  You can squeeze it into small spaces that you wouldn't be able to with other makes that have the same power.Worth the price, especially when Hitachi backs it up with a Lifetime Lithium Ion Tool Warranty, including a 2-Year Lithium Ion Battery Warranty.

This hardshell case with rubberized edges is a perfect accessory to protect your new Galaxy S6 or S6 Edge.The phone fits securely in the case and still has easy access to all buttons and ports.It also comes with a screen protector and cleaning cloth.  Would have given it 5 stars if the case had a kickstand.

These pads work pretty good so far.  I used them on our kitchen table and seem to be holding up well.There are 4 pads in the package, each with a 1.5 inch diameter and one sticky adhesive side.I used these on both tile and hardwood floors and they slide easily on both.For heavier furniture, like couches, I like to double up these pads on each footer.

This is an excellent meal supplement for those looking to get a healthier source of protein, especially if you're a vegetarian or vegan.Once you get past the split-pea green color of the mix, you'll love how nice this mixes up with milk and/or yogurt.  I mixed it with blueberries, bananas, plain yogurt and some ice.  This mix is highest in protein, so I wanted to add some good carbs to balance it out.There was just a slight chalky aftertaste but that went away when I added a few more berries.Great supplement, plus it comes in a whole bunch of different flavors!

First off, you can't beat the price.  But, there's another saying that goes like this: you get what you pay for.Some of the batteries in the pack were dead before I even used them.  Others were not.  I had to go through almost the whole pack to find 2 that were worked.  The way I found out was that my dogs were just strolling down the street instead of being in the yard!In this instance, I would rather pay more and get batteries that are fresh.

This HP mini does a great job of providing some nice, quality sound.It linked up with my Samsung Galaxy SIII in seconds via Bluetooth.  It can also connect via a male-to-male headphone jack.The controls are simple: power button, volume +/-, and phone button if you need to answer/hang up on a call.Here are some specifications:It is shaped like a regular triangular prism, with 3 inch sides on the triangle as well as the base.  The height is 2.75 inches.It weighs 9.1 ounces.The charging cord (USB to mini-USB) is 34 inches long.Overall, great speaker with a cool design and simple operability.

This kit is an amazing deal!  For just over 12.00 you get a wooden magnetic dress up kit.The kit includes Emily and her horse with 42 different dress up pieces for Emily and saddles for the horse.  But, wait there's more.  The dress-up kit is made of solid wood and the background is a shadow box-stable that is also very high quality wood.  Did, I mention you get all this for slightly more than $12.00?  It is a beautiful toy and would make an excellent gift for any girl who likes horses.  Ideally 4 yr-8 yr old.Fantastic product.

I don't feel that this Iron Grip tape lives up to its name.First, here's what I like about it:- It is thinner and lighter than normal duct tape but has pretty much the same strength.- It is easy to tear by hand. Scissors or knife need not apply.However, I was disappointed in the "grip" and the feel of a solid seal on the items that I was taping.  the Iron Grip name led me to believe that this tape was on par with some real strong duct tape, like Gorilla Tape.  But it is definitely not and since they are priced almost exactly the same, I'd have to go with another tape for the real tough jobs that require an "iron grip".

Our family has tried to play this game a few times and we still don't get it.  We have had friends over a few times in the last month and we pull it out hoping that they have played and can let us know how to play.  I am not sure if it is just bad directions or a bad game.It does say that it helps if you have someone who has played the game explain it to you.Overall, a big dud for this game playing family.  I am still hoping to find someone to teach it to us, but in the meantime this company has to do a much better job of explaining the game and how you win.UPDATE:I watched the U tube video and it explained how to play the game (different version) So we played again.  It was better, but not the game for us.  I guess you either love it or hate it.However, it is made in the USA and worth a shot if you love games.

I know it is hard to get excited over a dish towel, but I am very excited about these.  The quality is excellent, they are over sized compared to my every day dishtowels and the turquoise color is bold and vibrant.  My kitchen is decorated in browns and they look beautiful with that color.  The only downside is that I don't want to use them and dirty them.  Great price, big, bold and bright color.  Love them.

Oh, Oddie, how we will miss you.I loved, LOVED this book although I am sad to see the series end.  I am very tempted to start from the beginning again and read them all over  Loved the ending and loved the book.  Odd Thomas fans you will not be disappointed, new fans start from the first book and indulge!Thank you Dean Koontz.

I have never read any of Robert Dugoni's books and I am going to change that after finishing MY SISTERS GRAVE.  Solid mystery, creepy, great character development and a great story line.  Where the heck Have I been?  And, the best part the book was only 2.99 on Kindle.  Much better than most of the 'bestseller' novels out today.Highly recommend this book and looking forward to reading more.

This backpack is ideal as an everyday briefcase or as your carryon for the plane.  There is a pocket or compartment for just about anything that you need to bring with you on a short trip.In fact, I recently used it as my carryon for a trip to DC and it worked out great.  It fits perfectly underneath the seat.  Also, when walking around with it on your back, the padded shoulder straps adjust easily on the fly.  That way, you don't have to take it off, adjust, and put it back on.The khaki color and front leather flap give it a more formal look, almost like a nice briefcase or fine piece of luggage.  It is well-made and should hold up to the rigors of everyday use and air travel.

I know that mushrooms are really healthy for you.  I've been taking Reishi mushroom powder for about a year now, because I figured that it couldn't hurt to try and prevent any kind of diseases, due to the healing powers of triterpenoids in reishi mushroom spores.  I was really excited to try this blend of Mushroom Extract Powder Blend, it's definitely full of a lot of nutritious properties.  I'll have to admit it doesn't taste too good, but it's not horrible either.  I just mix it up with raw cocoa powder and it helps to improve the flavor.I did a lot of research on all the benefits of the five mushrooms on Natural News and their blog.  I was very surprised how beneficial all these mushrooms are for the body!Benefits of Reishi Mushrooms:    Boosts vitamin D levels    Improving brain function    Ward off viruses and tumors    Helping those with cancer and HIV    Improves the skin, by eliminating dead surface cells    Chronic fatigue disorders    Regulate blood sugars    Altitude sickness    Helps treats inflammatory breast cancer    Effective for ovarian cancer   Supports cancer cell deathBenefits of Chaga Mushrooms:    Remedy for chronic inflammation    Diabetes    Hypertension   Cancers    Stomach illnesses    Improving the immune system    Breaks down cholesterol    Improves heart health    Anti-oxidant    Repairs cell damage from free radicals    Powerful anti-cancer properties    Helps induce DNA repair    Antiviral and anti-inflammatoryBenefits of Maitake Mushrooms:    King of vitamin D    Strong anti-carcinogenic properties    Boost immune system    Lowers blood sugar levels    Reduces blood pressure    Weight loss properties    Lowers cholesterolBenefits of Shiitake Mushrooms:    Boost immune system    Helps upper respiratory disease    Helps blood circulation and fatigue    Anti-aging properties    Lowers cholesterol    Weight loss properties    Anti-tumor benefits    Prevents thrombosisBenefits of Turkey Tail Mushrooms:    Cancer-fighting properties   Antimicrobial    Anti-malarial    Immunomodulating natural treatmentI feel my immune system has improved since I've been taking the Mushroom Extract Blend Powder, so I would highly recommend it!I received this product for a discounted price for my unbiased opinion.

I'm always on the look out for products that boost the immune system and help to make my body's pH more alkaline.  I wanted to see how my body's pH would change by opening and dumping three capsules of the Essiac Tea into hot water.  I used a piece of pH test strip before I drank the tea and after I drank the tea.  The pH test strip can be used by testing your saliva and it can tell you weather your saliva is more acid or alkaline.  As you can see in the picture my saliva was probably a 5.8 before and a 7.2 after I drank the tea, so I can see that the tea does help your body become more alkaline.  By making my body more alkaline, I'm removing the toxic build up and detoxing my body.At the moment I'm on the master cleanse and this is my 6th day fasting, so the tea is an added bonus of helping me detox my body.  I'm happy to see that the tea has some AWESOME ingredients like,Burdock Root, Sheep Sorrell, Slippery Elm Bark, and Turkish Rhubarb Root, plus it has no artificial coloring, artificial flavor, preservatives, yeast, corn, milk or milk derivatives, lactose, salt, sodium, soy, sugar, gluten, starch or wheat!I'm feeling great and the Essiac Tea is helping me to detox, so I'm really happy and I would highly recommend the Essiac Tea!I received this product for a discounted price for my unbiased opinion.

I love Goji Berries and these are very tasty, plus very healthy!  I tried Goji Berries over a year ago and I wasn't too sure about them, but they really grow on you and then they're hard to put down, once you start eating them.  I love snacking on them and cooking with them.  I always seem to sleep better after I eat Goji Berries.  Goji Berries are full of antioxidants and they're a SUPERFOOD, which is always a big plus!  I love that they're 100% natural and Organic, without any pesticides or GMO's.  It makes me feel great that I'm getting so many nutrients from just eating Goji Berries.  I would highly recommend these Goji Berries!I received this product for a discounted price for my unbiased opinion.

I absolutely love this Floating Ledge!  It's perfect for my Buddha's and Money Frog.  It's sturdy and very easy to hang.  This Floating Ledge is perfect for places where you don't have a lot of room for shelving.  This shelf is great for different types of collectibles.  I plan on buying more of them for different area of my home and yes I'd highly recommend this Floating Lead!

This is absolutely the most fabulous Snow Tree that I've ever seen!  When I first took it out of the box I was pretty skeptical, but after I bent the branches out, screwed on the base, attached the the plugin and turned on the lights, I was so impressed how gorgeous it was!  I decided to decorate it with a few ornaments and it looked beautiful.  This tree is perfect for Christmas, but it could be used for all of the holiday, by just putting different seasonal types of ornaments on it.  I wasn't sure where to put the Snow Tree, but I thought it would look pretty awesome on top of a bookcase we have in the bedroom.  So, check out the picture of it on the bookcase, it looks awesome and it gives the perfect amount of light to light up the bedroom, without turning on the overhead light.  It looks stunning in the bedroom and we definitely LOVE it!  I would absolutely give this Snow Tree Five Stars and if I could, I'd give it 10 stars, we love it that much and we highly recommend it!!!I was given this product for my unbiased review.

This is the first time I have ever seen a Blooming Teapot and I found it to be a very unique experience!  I wasn't sure what to expect, but I thought it was really AWESOME to watch the bloom open up in the teapot.  I loved that the teapot is made of glass, instead of some sort of metal.  The glass seems to be rather fragile, but I didn't experience any problem with that.  The teapot came with four blooms and I was extremely happy to see that the blooms had no artificial ingredients or additives!  The teapot is very well crafted and easy to pour, without dripping.  I heated the water in my electric teapot and poured it directly into the glass teapot, without any problems.  I think that this teapot is very unique and a very fun way to drink tea.  I would highly recommend the Blooming Tea Glass Teapot Gourmet Gift Set and I definitely would rate this teapot at five stars, without a doubt!I received this product for a discounted price for my unbiased opinion.

This is an AWESOME bar of NATURAL soap!  I love organic soap, so it's the only kind of soap I'll purchase.  I don't like chemicals in my products, so I was very happy to get this HUGE 100% Raw Organic African Black Soap!  I did cut the HUGE bar into smaller pieces.  After using it, my skin feels super soft and extremely clean.  It made my skin look beautiful and well nourished, so YES I would highly recommend this soap!I received this product for a discounted price for my unbiased opinion.

This pound of Tumbled Polished Natural Gem Stones are very beautiful!  They came in various sizes and colors, no two stones are alike.  Take a look at my pictures and you can see the various colors and the different kinds of Gem Stones that I received.  The stones are very colorful, shiny and quite AWESOME!  I recognized several of the stones, but there were a few that I didn't recognize.  The ones that I recognized were, amethyst, rose quartz, tiger eye, red jasper and the quartz crystal.The Gem Stones came with a 32 page guide book for collectors, called "Dig Into Rocks - Minerals & Crystals" and a Tumbled Stone Identification Sheet.  I decided to put the Gem Stones in a glass container on my desk, they add some color to my home office.  My grandkids even love sorting them out and looking at them, plus arranging them in different shapes.  I've always loved polished gem stones and crystals, so these gem stones are a great addition to my collection.  I would recommend them!I received this product for a discounted price for my unbiased opinion.

This tea is great at giving me an extra energy boost towards the middle of the day!  This is a great combination of teas that helps me get through the day, without feeling tired.  This tea contains, YERBA MATE, GREEN TEA , CINNAMON BARK, ELEUTHERO ROOT and GINSENG ROOT.  I was really impressed, with this combination of teas and I researched all of them.  They all have a pretty impressive list of health benefits!  Here's a list of benefits of each tea that I found on the Natural News website.  This tea is definitely one of my favorite energy boosting teas and I would highly recommend it!  We Love It!Benefits of Yerba Mate:  Antioxidants  Energizing effects  Helps fight mental and physical fatigue  Weight-loss aid  Lowers cholesterol  Anti-allergy  Antidepressant  Appetite suppressant  Blood cleanser  Diuretic (mild)  Stops inflammation  Promote healthy Gastrointestinal Tract (GI)  Improve digestion  Promote healthy heart  Lower blood pressure  Increase cognition and mental clarity
