Melissa enjoys her relatively simple yet satisfying life. She has a best friend that she can count on no matter what and she is determined to make the best of things. In an attempt to cheer her best friend up on his birthday, she drags him to a nightclub and finds that her life is quickly turned upside down. Will David find that which he desperately seeks, and will Melissa reclaim her life before its too late?I found the characters in this book to be wonderfully entertaining and beautifully crafted. The twist to the paranormal storyline was very enjoyable and I couldnt get enough. I love when someone takes an old story and makes even more compelling with new and unique information. Knowing more about the history of the Lore they followed would have been even better. The relationship among the characters was absolutely fascinating, and I would have loved to have seen more of that revealed. Its almost scary how quickly this story wrapped itself around my heart. I didnt want to let go of the characters, and I hope that we hear more from them in the future.Susan Child has an astounding talent that I see only getting better and better as time goes on. There is an incredible amount of talent that is just bursting at the seems to be released. This is one author that you need to keep an eye on. I see great things for her in the near future as her talent continues to grow and develop into what I believe it is meant to become.

Santas Pet by Rachelle Ayala is a magnificently breathtaking story of realizing that no one is perfect but that we are all deserving of pure, unconditional love. No matter what haunts or mares our past, we can be sure that each and every one of us deserves to be seen for who we are and not for what we have done. No one is born perfect, and so we cant in good conscience expect others to live a life free of blemishes. There are too many double standards that cloud the view of what our society expects from men and women, and those dark standards are constantly becoming even murkier as the years tick by. This is a very sad testament as to the fact that each generation devalues the power and influence of love while they push the boundaries of taking more than they give in return. I hope for all our sakes that we can learn from these heartbreaking mistakes and come to cherish and value each other as we all deserve and need.Brittany is convinced that everyone sees and expects her to be the perfect daughter since she has always been compared to her naughtier and more devilish older sister Lacy. To that end, she simply cant accept that she has vulnerabilities and weaknesses just like everyone else. No matter how hard she tries, she cant fight the need of more and the loneliness that invades her heart from time to time. When her life turns out not to be as perfect as she would like, she tries to bury it and move on. Only secrets have a way of becoming unburied at the worst times. When Ben Power enters her life and turns her heart inside out with this charm and vulnerabilities, she is helpless to avoid the pull she feels toward him. Will Brittanys past tear their happiness to shreds and jeopardize any future happiness, or will Bens own past destroy what could be before it even begins?Ben and Brittany are such a beautiful paring of characters that complement each other so wonderfully that its no wonder that the disappointments from their past leave such a painful, sour after taste. What they could have is so beautiful and powerful that they have to decide if they are ready to risk their heart for it. Giving up that much control and allowing another that much power over you is absolutely terrifying and tremendously exposed that some people just cant live with the damage if it doesnt work out. However, allowing for the possibility of the pain is so worth the pleasure and the fulfillment when things do work out. There are no words for what the power of love can do to transform a persons heart and life. Its a tremendously wonderful gift that doesnt come close to anything else.I never fail to be wonderfully surprised and delightfully enchanted by each and every story written by Rachelle Ayala. She pours such genuine heart and emotion carefully into each incredible masterpiece that she creates. Nothing is thrown haphazardly together, but instead it is brought to life by deliberate, meaningful strokes of love and passion. Her devotion to her writing is truly remarkable and unbelievably inspiring.

Cocked is a beautifully intriguing romance intertwined with a pulse-pounding, edge of your seat thriller. I didnt find anything lacking in the plot, and it spoke deeply to my heart the entire time. There is something to be said in finding a wonderfully satisfying and deeply moving storyline that can also keep you on your toes the entire time. I might be asking for a lot, but I enjoy such a full and robust plot that highlights strong yet vulnerable characters that reach out and touch you throughout their journey. This story delivered everything I love and in such an unforgettably grand style!Camden might be considered the black sheep of his town, his friends, and even his family. What he thought was him spreading his wings turned out to be stubborn self-destruction. He didnt care about anything except Lacey. She captured his heart as a teenager, and no matter what all he went through afterwards, he could never shake her memory or her presence in his heart. When he unleashes an unspeakable horror, he vows to protect Lacey and his family with his dying breath. Lacey tries to forget Camden after all these years. He broke her heart when he disappeared and never came back. She saw so much potential and beauty in him even when he couldnt see it, and her heart just wont listen to her when she wants to let him go. Instead, she and her family finds themselves in the crosshairs of a dark and devastating nightmare that refuses to be stopped. Will Camden be able to keep them all safe and do something right in his life, or will he find that for all of his efforts not even Fate can be outrun or out smarted?Lacey pulled into the story initially, but it was Camden that captured it and kept it. Finding out what all Camden went through in finding his way back to the light was utterly astounding. Most people couldnt have done what he did and kept his heart and soul intact. Holding onto the memory of Lacey was a huge catalyst in keeping from getting totally lost and consumed. When he gets the chance at redemption, he takes hold with hands and refuses to let go no matter how much his family doesnt trust him or how much Lacey hates him. He cant let them down when the stakes are so high that lives hang in the balance. I was proud of Lacey for showing him how much he hurt her and his family when he left and never sent word if he was dead or alive and yet also allowing herself to show him that she still cared for him even if she continued to fight and deny it. In the end, we cant fight against our hearts for long without breaking ourselves in half. When the truth comes to light, we have to accept it for what it is and let go of the past while holding tight to a future that is so full of light and happiness that our vision is blinded and our heart is ready to burst.B. B. Hamel is an insanely talented author who knows how to deeply touch the hearts of readers. Nothing was carelessly left to chance and everything was a perfect mesh of all of my favorite elements to create a breathtaking work of art that I thoroughly enjoyed! Dont miss out on the incredible talent of this author, so be sure to check this book out or others that she has written. You dont be disappointed.

Nothing Else Matters is a beautifully outstanding conclusion to this masterfully written series that follows the tumultuous journey of Xan and Georgie. There is nothing easy or calm about any step throughout this astounding series. Their pain will become your own and their heartache will threaten to overtake all of your senses. When you emerge at the end, you will not be the same, but you will be so much better for it. This is truly an inspiring and magnificent work of art!Georgie finds her worst fears finally coming true. She is staring at her worst nightmare in its cold, dark eyes, and she finds herself somewhat calm knowing that she has tried to do all she can to right a terrible wrong. Her last wish at keeping Xan safe has been gratefully fulfilled, and she cant ask for anything else. Her dreams and wishes never mattered, and she wont let them interfere now. All she ask is that no one will walk into the crosshairs to try and save her. She isnt worth saving, and she cant live with the blood of another on her hands. Will the end come on the wings of swift justice or will it tarry long enough to cause one more last complication?Watching Xan and Georgie slowly but surely discover the courage, the power, and the motivation to reclaim their life is beyond anything that I could have ever imagined. These astounding characters will shred your heart and encourage your soul as you watch their individual struggles and their inspiring journey to pull the other from their own quicksand while trying to survive in a world filled with sharp pain, unforgiving suffering, and harsh judgment. Nothing worth accomplishing is ever easy or pain-free. When survival and happiness are on the line, only a miracle and perhaps an angel can pull you back from the edge of darkness and begin to mend a fractured soul.Blair Babylon has proven that without a doubt she has the literary mastery and the incredible heart to write a story that will touch even the darkest recesses of the soul while shattering any literary boundaries that exist in your mind. After reading this marvelous story, I am confident that there is absolutely nothing that she cant accomplish on paper. Her genius is a breathtakingly extraordinary gift to experience, and I hope that no one misses out on it! This is a journey that should be read and cherished by all who understand the power and the importance of the written word.

Dark Sky is a deeply touching and intensely passionate tale of reclaiming a love that never died. The story centers around returning to ones first love as a last ditch effort to reclaim a life that should have been. What an astoundingly beautiful journey we are privileged to behold as it unfolds before our eyes! I simply couldnt get enough of the promise of hope and unspoken potential that penetrated and surrounded this amazing story! It had my head spinning and my heart singing the entire time.Severin has lived through a dark past marred by secrets and pain. Just when he begins to open his heart to a sweet girl, he is forced away and loses himself in another world even darker than the one he left. With nothing left to lose, he decides to go home, and take one last chance on cleansing his soul of the blackness of his past while discovering if his one possibility of love is still within his reach. To say that Avery is excited to see Severin would be a devastating understatement. She has waited for too long to show him the love she desperately wants to give him, and nothing will stand in her way this time. Can Severin accept Averys unconditional and pure love, or will he walk away thinking he is beyond any chance of redemption?Watching the incredible love story of Avery and Severin was such a breathtaking journey! The love that Avery poured into Severins dry and thirsty soul literally brings him back to life. He knows he can live the life he wants as long as Avery is by his side. Avery is finally being loved and cherished just like she has always dreamed of, and she will not let him go again. No matter what they know they are walking the rest of their days together, and I loved every minute that I spent with these two. They are absolutely amazing!Katalina Leon is a wonderfully talented author who will undoubtedly pull at your heart strings from the very first word. This is the first book I have read by her, and I am looking forward to reading more in the future. Her wonderful characters will endear themselves to you without you even realizing what is going on. You wont regret picking up this book and experiencing every second of it.

Never Love an Outlaw is an utterly fantastic, action-packed masterpiece! I was completely blown away by its unexpected force and intense impact to my heart. This is a story like no other in its depth and breadth of emotion and inspiration. Whatever you do, dont let appearances deceive or underneath the surface lies a breathtaking love story that you will not forget.One minute Megan was living the perfect life of a bored socialite and then she found herself trapped in a living nightmare. She long gave up hope of ever climbing out of her Hell until he showed up. Skin wasnt looking for anything more than an easy payday for himself and his club. What he found would change his life forever. Megan find within herself a strength and a fierceness that she never knew existed until Skin shone the light in her dark pit. She would rock the very foundation of his world while he would grant her the only thing her heart desired most. Will happiness continue to elude these two lost, hurting souls, or will they take Fate by the hand and lead her where they want to go?I was astounded as I walked along this harrowing journey with Skin and Megan. What they received neither of them either deserved. They were beautiful, honest, and true to themselves no matter what. They only wanted to be given the ability to live a life worth living. They didnt ask for the world, but what they asked for was everything. Neither was ready for the force or the impact of the other, but they absorbed all of the love, intensity, and passion that they found. Only the unexpected raw beauty and incredible heart they found in each other was worthy of their devotion and their very life blood.Nicole Snow writes with an unimaginable passion and beauty that flows from her amazing heart. Her story will leave you gasping for breath and holding your dreams in the palm of your hands. There is nothing better than a book that can tear shred your heart to pieces and then slow and powerfully mend all of the pieces back together into something new and beautiful. There is something to be said for an extraordinary author who isnt afraid of crossing boundaries and forges her own path toward mastering the greatest gifts that life can offer.

Forsaken Control is a surprise assault on the senses. Its achingly heart-breaking, intensely emotional, and infinitely healing. Without your consent, this story will seep into your very soul and bring you to your knees in a painfully sweet submission. What an absolutely incredible journey to have the privilege to take part in!Ares has had the type of childhood that few would ever dare to imagine. It shaped him in ways he had no control over, and try as he might, he couldnt run from it. He did the next best thing; he made it work for him. It helped to shape a life that he is proud of and wouldnt trade for anything. He is fiercely devoted to his new family, and he would pay any price necessary to keep them safe. What he doesnt expect is to be drawn deeper into the lives of two friends that he holds most dear. He fights to give up his tightly held control in order to open his heart to unconditional love and pure acceptance. When danger threatens all he holds dear, will Ares steps up and fight as if he can conquer the very flames of Hell itself, or will he fail and find himself weaker for allowing his heart to rule his mind for once?Learning more about Ares past and where he came from made me fall in love with him. I never realized such a hard man could love as deeply as he did. His capacity for love was nearly boundless when it came to his brothers and their families. He would do anything for them, and that warmed my heart so much for him. Watching him open up and accept the love that was just waiting for him with arms open wide brought out so many emotions for me. It was such an astoundingly breath-taking journey that I enjoyed every minute experiencing. His brothers were amazing men who loved each other and their families with no holds barred, and I was truly taken aback by the depth of their devotion. What a wonderful story!This is the first book that I have read by Sapphire Knight, and she literally took my breath away! I plan on reading more from her as I have fallen in love with not only Ares but the other man of the OathKeepers MC. This sounds like an incredibly amazing series that I dont want to miss out on! Sapphire Knight is a wonderfully talented author who has created a spectacular world of flawed but beautiful characters that you cant help but fall in love with.

My heart is still full from reading this beautifully touching and refreshingly raw story of two people deeply hurt and scarred by their past who have chosen to push past the fear and dare to hope for more. Their search for peace and comfort have led them to each other, and while the path to their future may be filled with more struggles then they want, deep in their heart they cant shake the hope, longing, and love that they have awoken within the other. Love knows no bounds, and hope will not fade even in the midst of the darkest of storms.Andi considers herself a simple and content girl. She has a decent job that allows her to pursue her love of history, and she does everything she can to help her mother care for her ailing father. She believes that she is happy as she can be until she unexpectantly meets a huge brute of a man who turns out to have the biggest heart she has ever seen. Her heart wont let her shut him out, and she finds herself doing the impossible  falling hard for this man who is a mere stranger to her. Cade has come to Andis town as a way to hide until he is ready to face the problems he has created back at home. The last thing he ever expected was to find the feisty and intriguing Andi. He doesnt know how to have a real relationship, so he fumbles and trips up a few times trying to figure out how to do the whole dating thing. No matter what he cant and then doesnt want to fight the undeniable attraction to this remarkable woman who sees more of him than anyone else cared to. Can he prove to her that he truly loves her in spite of who he is, or will the secrets from his past ruin any chances with Andi and a future filled with true love and endless happiness?Andi is such a wonderful character with the unconditional love she has for her parents. She doesnt shirk from her responsibilities because of her deep and appreciative love for those who raised and cared for her. No matter how hard things get, she still does what she can to help out. Cade is one who has never been shown what it is like to truly love and be loved. Andi couldnt be more perfect for Cade at this point in this life. Her deep love and unwavering devotion is exactly what he needs to breathe new life back into him and give him the strength and determination to turn his life around.Rachelle Ayala has scored a huge touchdown with this brilliant story! The characters are incredible with their realistic feel and the powerful emotions that cant be hidden or stopped. I see so much potential and beauty in this series, and I cant wait to see what happens next.

Christmas Lovebirds is an exquisitely heartfelt and immensely inspiring story of finding the courage to claim a once in a lifetime love. To walk through life never feeling quiet complete or content is a very hard revelation to live with. Happiness feels like it is just beyond our grasp, and a painfully, hollow void slowly begins to grow within our soul. Everyone must realize on their own that only when we take hold of love can we will truly become whole. Fighting for what we want is the only way to prove that we are serious about making a change and never intend on going back.Melisa Hart has had a crush on Rob Reed for as long as she can remember. No other guy has ever touched her heart or her soul as deeply as Rob has. The only problem is that he betrayed her brother Connor years ago and in turn her family cut all ties with him. No matter how much she wants to explore her feelings for him, it just isnt possible with her overprotective family keeping a close eye on her every move. Things change when Melisas pet lovebird Cassie is mistakenly picked up with Robs pet lovebird Casey and taken to his vacation home. She quickly discovers where Cassie was taken and follows her only to have her world turned upside down. When the truth of the past is revealed will she be able to forgive and make her dreams come true, or will she walk away with a shattered heart and an empty future?My heart hurt for Rob since his betrayal of Conners friendship ruined any chances with Melisa. He waited so long for her to grow up, and then he inadvertently threw his golden opportunity away. He thought for sure that there was no hope for him until a mix-up with their lovebirds brings them together and grants him one more chance to keep her in his life. Melisa is thanking her lucky stars when she is reunited with Rob and given a chance to show him how much he means to her and always has. Rob wants nothing more than to love her with everything in him while allowing her to spread her wings and fly free, and she wants to be removed from her protective cage and allowed to find out who she is while being loved fiercely and having safe and protective arms to fall into.This is such an incredible story that you will not be able to put it down. Rachelle has stolen my heart once again with her epic creativity and imagination. I couldnt get enough of these wonderful characters, and I loved seeing a mix of characters from her other books. Integrating storylines over the years helps me to have a greater appreciation for each precious character that I discover along the way. I look forward to the next story that Rachelle is creating and formulating with her stunning talent and heart.

Captivated is an astoundingly brilliant masterpiece that highlights the very best aspects of love. There is nothing better than a story that makes you feel with every part of your heart and soul! Above all, this wonderfully breathtaking gift shows us that even when we least expect it, life can bring us the greatest treasure of all. Our job is to recognize it, hold it close, and treasure it all the days of our life.Dom has run into some snags during Spring Training for which he hopes to keep off the radar for management. While he tries to lay low and behave, he meets his new neighbor, and suddenly he cant think of a better way to distract himself from how own problems then to get to know her. Irisa has managed her brothers band for years, and they slowly driven her to the brink of her sanity. With her nerves on edge, and their constant bickering, she cant think of a better distraction then her devilishly handsome and kind neighbor Dom. She is his fantasy come to life and he is her knight in shining armor. Together, they find what they have wanted secretly for so long in the other, but making it a reality, as most everyone knows, could be next to impossible. Can they beat the odds and win the heart of the other, or will misunderstandings and mistakes tear them apart forever?I had no idea what to expect when I started this book, but I was far from disappointed. In fact, I was pleasantly surprised, and blown away by the fantastic characters and the incredible storyline that I discovered. I couldnt get over how much I fell in love with both Dom and Irisa as well as their friends and family. They were all absolutely stunning in how real they felt, and how I could easily relate to each of them. My heart literally hurt for Dom and Irisa at times, and I wasnt sure I would be able to recover at one point. Becoming completely lost within the characters that I read about is the ultimate compliment that I can give an author, and I have only good things to say about this author!Susan Scott Shelley is a beautiful treasure that I have been fortunate enough to find with the romance world. Her approach is very unassuming yet powerful, and her stories will quickly latch onto your heart in a very short period of time. Be prepared to feel in a big way and have your heart invaded by her extraordinary characters. Her stories will stay with you for a long time after you read the last word. That is the mark of a truly talented author!

Alphas Darkling Bride is a beautifully exquisite and breathtakingly magical story of learning how to love all aspects of yourself. This is a story that will tear down all of your stubborn and resilient walls and allow true and lasting acceptance to break through. Even while written in shifter lore, the light from within this journey will find a way to shine into your own soul. The astounding characters prove over and over just how powerful we can become if we will only choose to cherish and love all aspects of who we are. We are all made with such beauty and care that each of us serves a very specific and unique purpose. The human race isnt complete without every last being on this planet.Jess has lived through a horrific past which has left her deeply scarred and fearful of not only others but also herself. She has uncovered revelations about herself that she doesnt understand and has no idea how to deal with. All she wants to do is find refuge within the unconditional love and welcoming arms of her grandfather. However, her time of peace is cut short when tragedy strikes and she is forced to start over with a new life filled with every type of frustration and confusion that she has desperately tried to avoid. Will her life-altering change be her saving grace in disguise, or will it finally prove that she will never belong and be forever resigned to a life where she will never find peace?Life doesnt always give us what we want, but it does give us what we need. We just have to decide if we will gracefully accept it or stubbornly refuse it and hope for the best. I love how even when Jess thought her life was on the road to complete and utter failure she was exactly where she needed to be. Even in the most unlikely person on the plant  Cade  she was able to find her perfect refuge along with the acceptance and love she needed in order to find her inner peace and balance.  Cade also found in Jess the contentment and the purpose that he has been blindly searching for since his brothers death. They both helped to fill a dark and deep void within the other that literally turned them away from the brink of their own personal abyss.Linda Barlow has woven a truly magnificent tapestry of rich and vibrant characters that blend in perfectly with the extraordinary landscape that is the incredible storyline. I feel hopelessly in love with both elements as I was drawn deeper and pulled relentlessly into the beautifully broken souls of Cade and Jess. Barlow has managed to expertly capture my attention while thoroughly enthralling my heart into her incredible world of magic and shifters. I cant wait to see what incredible work of art she creates next.

Warrior is an incredibly extraordinary story of all-consuming redemption, fierce determination, and unapologetic love. This is one story that will take your heart on a ride of a lifetime, and not stop even when the ride has ended. What a priceless treasure to find such a brilliantly astounding story that has been fashioned by a heart so deeply ingrained with love and hope that you will never be able to walk away unchanged! I invite anyone who enjoys a beautifully crafted and emotionally challenging story to pick up this outstanding work of art. You will never regret it.Olivias heart has always belonged to Ben no matter how much she has tried to convince herself or those around her of the opposite. Ever since she was thirteen, she has compared every male to him, and they have all fallen short. She knew that things wouldnt work out for them, so she has never asked for more than friendship from him even though her heart longs to belong to him forever. Ben has loved Olivia ever since he first set eyes on her. Her heart and her spirit captured his attention like no one else, and he has never been able to shake her from his heart. He has longed to have so much more than friendship with her, but he knows he will never be good enough to claim such a strong and beautiful girl as Olivia. Life has a way of bringing about what we deem as impossible but not usually in the way that we desire. When Olivia is handed such a gift, she grabs hold with a bone deep determination, and finds more joy then she ever dreamed possible. Will their hearts be able to hold them together no matter how far and how strained the ties that bind them are stretched?Ben and Olivia are two exquisitely broken souls who find a comforting refuge in each other, but what they long for the most  a deeply, binding human connection  always seems just beyond their grasp. I love that they have held onto a precious friendship no matter how hard it has been to maintain. They cherish what little they have because they know how much it is worth. Watching their paths collide and separate tore my heart to shreds at times and it healed and remade it during others. Through all of their trials and suffering, they only wanted the best for the other, and their pain was not in vain. Through everything, they found the deep connection that they had been missing their life and they found with everything in them to keep it close and alive. Ben and Olivia are absolutely amazing characters that I just couldnt get enough of. I hated to see their story end because I loved just how good they are together. They complete the other and bring such peace and joy into their lives that they wouldnt sacrifice that for anything. Their value is beyond measure, and they cherish that beyond anything else.Nicole Blanchard is an absolutely breathtaking author who has captured my heart and entranced my mind. Her work is unlike anything else I have read. The deepest parts of her heart flow from each word straight into your heart. You feel everything and it changes something within you. You feel a shift from within, and you know its genuine. Her stories hold an unimaginable power that will never you leave the same again. I challenge you to experience one of her truly outstanding masterpieces! You will never be disappointed.

Caught in Us is a beautifully inspiring and utterly ravishing journey of allowing the light of hope and love to not only surround but penetrate the broken and hurting hearts of those that are living in darkness. Even those who find themselves wandering in the fringes of the gray areas between light and dark can choose to have the sun warm their face once again. There is never a shortage of hope when love is allowed to break through the impenetrable barriers around your heart. Never turn away from the most precious things in life because they could easily be the very things that could save you.Dani would seem to have the perfect life with her rich family, good grades, and bright future, but how often are those who seem to have everything really have nothing when they take a closer look? She finds the one things she desperately longs for in the new boy at school. Until Damon came along, she never realized just how empty her life was without the simple and pure love that he offers her. Even with the demons that Damon wrestles with, Dani can see the good and beauty in him no matter how worthless he thinks he is. She breathes life and hope into his grieving and broken heart. No matter how much he knows he should stay away from her to keep from dragging her down, his heart wont let him walk away. She comes to mean everything to him, and he wont turn his back on her. Will these two lonely souls find a way to stay together in order to heal each other, or will their choice be taken away in the name of doing whats best for them?I absolutely fell in love with Dani and Damon throughout their story. They found their completion in the other, and they cherished the precious bond that they were building day after day. It was so wonderful to see how Damon treated Dani with such a depth of love, respect, and kindness in every way possible. He made her laugh, built up her confidence, and made sure she knew that he really saw her. While he couldnt look into her soul or read her mind, he could tell what she needed and he gave it to her. Dani knew without a doubt that Damon cared about her, cherished their friendship, and did his best to protect her from himself and others that might try to hurt her. They were such an amazing couple whose miraculous love literally took my breath away.Layla Hagen has a tremendously incredible talent of opening your heart to her wonderful characters from the very first word. You feel every written word as if it originated from the beating of your own heart. The pace of her story is so natural and beautifully fluid, and the storyline will remain with you long after the last word has been read. This is one author that is not to be missed. The soul that is found within these pages will touch you like nothing else can. I challenge you to walk away from her books and not feel the light, hear the passion, and experience a one-of-a-kind love.

Reunion is a perfectly pulse-pounding and emotionally intense ending to this captivating series. Nothing felt like it was left out or unexplained. I was left feeling highly satisfied and completely happy with the way this series blossomed unexpectedly and yet naturally. The storyline was utterly heart-wrenching and at the same time undeniably uplifting in its beautiful message that was portrayed by such outstanding characters. My heart will forever carry a piece of this outstanding journey with me for as long as I live.Carrie has allowed her curiosity to get the better of her and finds herself thrown into a horrifying nightmare. No matter what, she is determined to fight and never give up, but the human mind can only sustain nightmares for so long before it bends and starts to break. She knows she needs to hold on just a little longer because she is not alone. Her strength is for more than just herself, and that revelation fuels her determination to outlast what lies before her. Will Mark be able to find Carrie and rescue her before the unthinkable happens, or will he be arrive just to see what is left of a mind that has frayed beyond repair?Watching the beautiful rebirth of the love that surrounds and binds Carrie and Mark is truly beyond words. These two deeply scarred souls can only find the solace and happiness they desperately long for within the other. No matter what circumstances push them apart, they grow stronger and more determined the longer their bond is allowed to grow and flourish. They show what true sacrifice and pure love is all about - thinking of the other person before themselves, and doing what they know will help the other no matter the cost to them.  In the end, that love and devotion will not be forgotten. It will only prove to forge a love and a life that no one and nothing can break or destroy.Meli Raine has without a doubt proven to the world that she has the power and passion to create masterpieces that will undoubtedly stand the test of time. I have managed to once again fall in love with her incredible world-building, her phenomenal characters, and her brilliant storyline. Nothing could have been more perfect then walking this beautifully mesmerizing journey of hope and strength with this wonderfully talented author!

Mending Hearts is a wondrously exquisite and deeply freeing journey of learning how to live without borrowing worry and to allow our dreams to take shape in their own time. How incredibly liberating it is when we finally realize that even when we dont achieve our dreams in our desired timeline that it doesnt make them any less meaningful or precious when they finally do arrive. Wrestling these types of demons may be the hardest ones that I think humans have ever had to deal with. We dont deal well with waiting especially when we think we have everything ready and in place. Its what we dont have ready and in place that could cause our dreams to disintegrate and die if we were to receive them when we want them. Maybe, just maybe, the Plan behind our plan is one that is even better then what our finite minds can think up. After all the Creator behind that Plan is the very one who made us, our world, and the universe that surrounds us. Wouldnt that Plan be even more to our benefit then our own hastily thought out dream?Candice has watched her most beloved dreams burn and fade away before her eyes. Her heart cant take anymore, so she asks her husband Logan for a separation. While unwilling to let her go, Logan agrees in order to not lose her completely. During this time, Candice thinks her heart has finally started to mend on its own, and shes sure that leaving Logan for good is exactly what she needs in order to move on. Logan is a reminder of a past that has torn her spirit to shreds, and she cant handle anymore hurt or disappointment. At the first sign that Candice is considering a divorce, Logan jumps back into her life begging for one last chance. He knows he cant live without her any longer, and he refuses to let her go without having a chance to show her just how much she means to him. Will Logans determination and patience prove to be his undoing, or will Candice be able to work past her fear in order to see and claim everything that she could lose forever?My heart hurt so much watching these two beautifully broken souls trudge through life while going through the motion of living. I almost couldnt finish reading this book due to the intense and bone-searing pain and disappointment that permeated the pages of this book. While life isnt filled with flowers and sunshine 24/7, it is also not continuously inundated in regret, fear, and worry each day. There is a healthy balance to living this life, and once that balance is found, it will bring you more joy and peace than you could ever imagine. Candice and Logan needed and deserved to find this balance, and that is what kept me coming back for more. I loved the sweet and sincerely loving interactions that these two had with their family and friends which gave them the courage to turn their life around and rekindle their beautiful marriage. Even though marriage is probably the hardest thing you will ever undertake in your life besides having and raising children, it will bring you more love and fulfillment than you ever thought possible.Kimberly Krey has shown me yet another reason why I adore her creative talent and could never get enough of her magnificent heart. She knows how to touch the heart and show us that while life is hard, it is so worth each and every effort we can put into making it exactly what we want. The best things in life are worth the wait, and on the same hand, they are worth the fight in order to get it and keep it. The heart always knows what it wants. Its just trying to convince the mind that throws us into a painful whirlwind that forces us to confront what is holding us back and learn how to conquer it. This latest fantastic work of art is a perfect new addition to her outstanding library. If you arent familiar with her mastery of both the written word and the beautiful mystery called the heart, then I encourage you to check out her stunning collection that will leave you breathless and wanting more.

Sail is an incredibly intoxicating story of discovering exactly what makes love so mysteriously powerful and utterly impossible to live without. We see exactly how intense and indescribable love has the potential to reach when the essential elements like bare emotion and honest communication are weaved throughout its intricately beautiful web. When two souls begin to form a deliberate and pure connection where nothing between them is held back, the surprising force of the impact from their shared emotions and feelings could easily rip the very fabric of our universe. Love is more than just a simple emotion. Its a definitely astounding way of life if we would only have the courage to step out and open ourselves to those around us.Blake is making huge strides to get her life back onto the track that she knows will lead to blissful, life-long happiness and peace. Nothing about it is easy, but she is finally able to lean on her family and friends to help her along the way. With added help and support from Casey, she is absolutely sure that things will be going their way before too long. She just has to stick to her plan and make sure that she checks off all of the important boxes on her list. With all of love contained in her heart and the strength found in her soul, she knows that they are finally on a course together that will one day bring them to their forever laid out before them like an endless ocean filled with all of the promises and possibilities that come with each new day. Will Blake be able to keep up her pace with the pitfalls and the disappoints along the way, or will she find herself too overwhelmed and flailing while barely treading water and give into the temptation to just let go?If I could sum up my feelings for this part of Blake and Caseys journey in just one word, it would be pride. I am so unbelievably proud of everything that they are accomplishing individually and together. They are carefully and tenderly nurturing their budding relationship, and they are making such amazing strides. They are truly an inspiration, and I cant get over how breathtaking they are becoming day after day. Watching them learn how to openly and vulnerably love each other took my breath away. Their love is an amazing masterpiece in the making, and I just couldnt get enough of them!M. Mabie has once again turned my world upside down with this brilliant work of creative genius. She is continuing to prove that her place is among the shining stars of talented masters of truly outstanding dreams and hopes. There is no doubt that I will forever be a devoted and eager reader.  Her out of this world gift has been a major blessing to me, and I cant thank her enough for having the courage and the heart to put words to paper. Her books have turned my heart inside out, and I cant wait to see what she comes up with next.

Lethal Beauty is a fiercely intellectual treasure that proves it can be both beautifully passionate as well as ideally pragmatic at the same time while it pulls on your heartstrings every step of the way. We cant separate the heart from the mind without stripping away all traces of our humanity. Logic needs the emotion of the heart in order to ensure that we do not turn into cold, vacant carbon based shells walking around this world. Evil finds this the most enticing environment to live and thrive in since its intentions are not questioned when concern for others is seen as an expensive amenity rather than a necessity. We must be ever vigilant in taking care not to allow our neighbors and friends to fall into such despairing danger.Mia Quinn is working on a heart-wrenching case that is taking everything she has to keep alive and on track. Just when she thinks that justice will be served, she is dealt a harsh blow that threatens to crush her spirit. Dealing with the head-spinning verdict along with the harsh reality of her personal life leaves her feeling uncomfortably lost and grasping at non-existent options. Not one to lie down and die quietly, she pushes forward and puts her mind and heart into resolving some new mysterious deaths that  dont seem to have any connection until a dark truth is uncovered that sheds new light on the new cases as well we her most recently failure. Real danger is waiting for her around the corner, but nothing will deter her from learning the truth. Will she unknowingly risk everything in her pursuit of justice, or will those closest to her step in and prove just how much they believe in her and do whatever is necessary to keep her safe?This is the first book that I have read by Lis Wiehl, and I was delightfully surprised by its delicate yet believable presentation and management of the harsh subject matter contained within. My heart twisted at what was laid out before it, but at the same time it melted at the love and grace shown throughout. You see this story through the eyes of one who longs for hope and love to prevail, but she also knows the cruel reality of life including her own. All she wants is to see those around her live a life filled with promise and peace, so she does what she can to help make this wish come true.Lis Wiehl is a passionate soul that deals with facts and logic, but what really guides her is a deep seated love and drive that this world will set its eyes on the bright light whose purpose is to transform and complete the lost and hurting of this dark and empty world. What her fingers cannot accomplish is made complete by the One whose light forever shines from the confines of this one heart who gives freely of what abundantly overflows from the depth of her soul. As a result, her writing both illuminates and warms the cold, dark corners of a sometimes lawless and heartless society focused only on its sole happiness and pleasure. What a breathtaking result we see when love and mercy are given without thought to reward or recompense. Those will ears to hear and a heart to receive will be thoroughly and undeniably impacted by this breathtaking journey into the dark heart of a world that threatens to destroy and maim all that appear to be helpless and invisible.

Four Week Fiance is a breathtakingly brilliant work of art that lured me in with its innocent vulnerability while it gave up quiet whispers of mystery and intrigue the likes of which held me in a suspended state of utter captivation and beautiful anticipation. This story has more the one layer to its innocent veneer, and it is this promise of more that had me salivating to immerse myself into this incredible story. I was immediately taken in by the depth and breadth of this amazing journey that we are being introduced to, and I am more than ready to experience more of this outstandingly complex yet exquisite storyline!Mila has grown up surrounded by TJ Walker her older brothers best friend. TJ hasnt paid her any attention except to add in his own brand of teasing and criticism. Stubbornly undeterred, she takes advantage of a weekend getaway with TJ, her best, and her older brother to show TJ exactly how she feels about him. However, TJ quickly turns the tables on her and offers her exactly what she has wanted all along. Knowing that it all sounds too good to be true, but helpless to turn away the one thing she has wanted for as long as she can remember, she powerlessly follows TJ down the rabbit hole into the dark unknown. Will TJ and Mila see that what they both want desperately is finally within their reach and dare to take it, or will they bow to the whims of others and walk blindly into the lions den knowing that everything good in their life could be forever taken away?My heart both leaped and broke to see that Milas deepest desire was coming true but only according to the terms of another. To watch the beginning of such a deceitful yet thrilling relationship tore at my heart. I felt happy and relieved for Mila and TJ and yet I am desperately hoping that they will be able to work through the lies and see clearly the path they want to walk and take the situation into their own hands. TJ finds his only hope and light in the one girl that both rocks his world and securely grounds it. He would be do anything to protect and love her, but he isnt sure he can fight what has been set into motion.J. S. Cooper continues to mesmerize and enthrall me with her wondrously creative mind! As I read more of her stories, I find myself not being able to wait patiently for her next masterpiece to become available. She has won a permanent spot on my all-time favorite author list a thousand times over. Whatever you do, dont miss out on the extraordinary experience of a J. S. Cooper story. It is something you will never be able to forget.

Revenge is an incredibly exquisite and thrillingly action-packed journey that takes us into a realm of darkness and oblivion that some are all too familiar with. We understand and accept the harshest parts of life when it comes our way, but what makes us stumble and stutter is whenever we are confronted with small pieces of pure and precious gold that are meant to be a haven of comfort and support. We dont know how to deal with the small slice of Heaven that has been sent directly to us, and as a result we fumble around in the darkness of our minds trying to comprehend what is happening. Instead, we need to stop rationalizing and contemplating and instead just allow the peace, love, and hope that it brings to fill us up and heal our hearts. The soothing respite may not last long, so take it and hold it close for as long as you have it.Carrie has been stripped bare of everything she ever loved and cherished in her life, so to have it given back to her with interest is something she isnt able to deal with easily.  She desperately wants to trust and love easily, but she isnt sure that power is within her grasp anymore. No matter how hard she tries to fight it, Mark refuses to let her drift away from him. He finally has her back, and he absolutely refuses to allow her to slip away. As he beings to understand what all she has gone through, he knows that she needs him more now than ever before, and he is determined to not only keep her safe but to show her how much she has always meant to him. Only with his unconditional love and trust can she hope to heal her heart one piece at a time. Will Carrie finally accept the help and love she craves from her friends, or will she see that coming back was the biggest mistake she ever made?If I thought Carrie was a strong and courageous woman in Return, then Revenge just confirmed what my heart has been telling me all along. Even in the midst of her crumbling world around her, she is able to see the pain of others and does what she can to help them. She is sto much stronger then she gives herself credit for, and luckily those around her see that and do everything they can to strengthen, encourage, and love her. They are the courage she needs to face each day, the wings she needs to allow her heart to once again soar, and the hope she is seeking to allow her to see the dawning of a new day. Loving friends like Mark and Elaine show her with each step that she is more then she thinks she is and that she can become the woman that she knows is waiting to break free from within.Meli Raine continues to amaze and astound me with her highly creative and deeply emotional masterpieces. I am unable to read one of her stories and not feel with my soul and listen with my heart to the beauty and the truth that lies within her words of hope and challenge. Her stories are truly soul searing in their simple yet powerful messages of true, unfaltering love and unabashedly honest hope. I encourage you to pick up one of her books and experience these outstandingly unique treasures for yourself.

A Pet for Christmas is a deeply touching and utterly heart-wrenching story of learning to fight for a once in a lifetime love that transforms you into the person you always wanted to become. What a beautiful family we find under development within the pages of this wonderful story! Just as in life nothing is smooth sailing for long, and if we want something bad enough, we have to work hard and never give up. Questioning our circumstances is only normal because through that process we either find that we want it more than we thought or we are ready to let it go and walk away. No matter what, you should always follow your heart because it will never lead you astray.Tyler continues his struggle with PTSD, but this time around he isnt alone. While this should comfort him, it actually rips his heart to shreds as he watches the painful effects on his family. The guilt is almost too much to bear, and in an attempt to bring some peace to those he loves, he leaves them behind to find some solace in trying to undo his sins from the past. Kelly loves Tyler will all her heart, and her hearts breaks as she watches him deteriorate before her eyes. She longs to help him, but with the pressures of work and family, she knows her efforts are lacking. All she can do is stand by him as he decides to travel to the other side of the world to try and make a difference. He leaves with her heart safely tucked next to his. Will the heart fight for what it wants, or will unwanted complications and a bleak future convince them to give up and walk away for good?If I thought I fell in love with Kelly and Tyler in A Father for Christmas, I was very much mistaken. This deeper view into their hearts and lives brought with it a more intense appreciation for each of these beautiful characters. They are both hurting, and its only their faith in God, family, and each other that will help them through this time of intense trial. Anything worth having is unquestionably worth any amount of heartache and suffering that we have to endure along the way. Watching the love between these amazing people grow and blossom even more than it already had was an extraordinary experience that is truly beyond words. This is a remarkable love story that goes beyond two people to encompass a beautiful little girl and an amazing extended family.My heart never tires of the spectacular masterpieces that seem to effortlessly flow from the heart of Rachelle Ayala. She is truly a gifted and powerful author that can touch the deepest part of the soul! No matter how many of her books I read, I always find a new way that she has changed even the smallest part of my heart. The impact of her words is truly boundless, and through her stories I have come to never underestimate the influence of a well-crafted journey of the heart.

Playing the Rookie is an incredible story that delivers huge returns in the form of devastating passion and life altering love. There is no denying the powerful effect that it has on the heart and the mind. No matter how much in control we think we are, love will always take us beyond our limits and reconstruct our world. One touch and we will never be the same again.Jessica needs a fresh start. She is desperate to get over her feelings for her ex since a future with him isnt possible, and she is determined to put her whole heart into this endeavor. Her new job as a spring training intern should come in handy since she will come in contact with many new possibilities, but what starts out as a hopeful prospect lands her heart in very dangerous territory. Jay has come to the US in the hopes of starting a major league baseball career.  He is starting spring training, and above all else he needs to stay focused. Unfortunately for him, Jessica has something else in mind for him to focus on. Their first meeting leaves him not just wanting more but opens his heart to dare to believe that he has found what he never thought possible. Will Jay be able to maintain a balance between his dreams and his heart, and will Jessica find a new love that will not only consume her heart but free her soul?Wow, how I loved Jessica and Jay in this amazing journey that we see them embark upon! They are two beautiful souls nursing a broken heart who just need a chance to find something more. The depth of emotions and transformation that we see them experience together is absolutely breathtaking. I dont want to take away from the stunning exquisiteness of what transpires between these two, but be warned that they will run away with your heart and leave you completely breathless for so much more.Rachelle Ayala is clearly a master at opening your heart to her spectacular characters and allowing them to pull on your heartstrings until you find yourself exhausted from your own inner struggle as they find their way through their journey. Its not every day you find an author that can so easily wrap her words around your heart until they become your world, force your heart to beat, and make your soul sing with joy. If you love to feel the stories as you read them, then you dont ever want to miss one of her books!

The Day of the Wave is fiercely intense and undeniably epic in its desperate pursuit of lost dreams, unwavering hope, and ultimate redemption. This is an astonishingly indescribable journey of two people whose world was savagely ripped to shreds and yet they refused to give up on the tiniest flicker of hope that burned within them. Through the slow yet deliberate rebuilding of the lives, they fight to regain even the tiniest bit of control in order to help them face each day. With all their heart they hold onto a silent pray to find the all elusive hope that will bring them some semblance of meaning to their existence.  When that prayer is finally answered, they are both blind-sided by the overwhelming transformation that slowly reshapes their heart and soul. The value of his life-changing force is beyond all the gold in the word because it finally brings meaning back into their life and begins to fulfill all of their deepest and desperate desires.Islas life was forever changed on one fateful day. When she should have been enjoying a fun family vacation, she was instead plunged into the blackest and most unthinkable nightmare she could have ever imagined. Now, each and every day as a huge battle as she tries to find a way to push through the numbness and the terror that haunts her each day and night. Her strength wanes with the setting of each sun, but her heart refuses to let go of those she loves. She holds them closer than her next breath, and with the courage she has left keeps a silent wish alive in the depths of her soul. Ben was given the greatest gift of his life one day, but less than two weeks later, that gift and more were taken from him in the worst possible way. Left with the remnants of a broken soul and a shattered heart, he lives the life of a wandering nomad never staying in one place long enough to put down roots for fear of facing his demons that endless nip at his heels. As he rebuilds a life among the ashes of his past, a day comes when life is suddenly breathed back into him. His heart beings to beat again and his soul is awaken from its death sleep. However, he finds that with this whirlwind of life comes the knowledge of no longer being able to outrun his nightmares if he intends to hold onto this hurricane of hope indefinitely. Will a freak chance at being united with the missing piece of their heart heal and transform Isla and Ben, or will the powerful reminder of the past forever drive them apart?I really felt Isla and Bens struggle to overcome their horrific past. Each painful memory tore at my heart and ripped a hole within my own soul at what they were forced to endure. Amidst their shared pain, they found the healing, hope, and love that they never imagined they would ever find. The unconditional acceptance and unquestionable understanding between them was more powerful and effective than an army of therapists. Finding their missing part of their broken and battered heart brought then a peace and determination to face the darkness that tried to suffocate them daily. They could face and conquer the world together, and I love seeing this incredible affect they had on each other. Love covers a multitude of sins and by adding hope to the mix, we find that anything is possible  even a miracle.Becky Wicks is clearly an outstanding author whose heart overflows with unending hope and endless love. Her gentle and intimate perspective is refreshing and the magnitude of her vulnerability is such an immensely beautiful experience. She clearly believes in the power of hope and the boundless possibilities that exist whenever love enters our world. Life is fleeting and unpredictable, so we need to live it deliberately and inexcusably with our whole heart while holding nothing back.

Falling for My Boss is a delightfully fun and breathtakingly brilliant story of finding the stunningly unexpected at the worst possible time. This is an incredible story about finding yourself and the person who completes you in every way amidst the uncaring, stormy chaos of life. No matter how hard we might try to fight against and ignore our heart because of bad timing, ugly circumstances, or deeply ingrained insecurities, it will work that much harder to secure its hold on you and capture your full attention. You will not walk away easily, and you most definitely will not walk away forever unchanged from its overwhelming passion, its life-altering hope, and its devastatingly unfair knowledge of your deepest needs and biggest dreams. Once it has its hold on you, fighting is utterly useless, so instead embrace it with everything in you and allow your soul to find the peace and wholeness that only a love this true and pure can bring.Elizabeth is trying to live a life that she can be proud of, but chasing her dreams is proving harder than she ever thought. When she is offered a questionable job that makes her rethink what she is really doing, she is torn between pursuing something that could be end up to be a total disaster, or perhaps if she wants it bad enough could be a new start to finally opening her heart and trusting again. Giving in to the hope she is desperately clinging to, she accepts the job and unknowingly begins a journey that will claim every piece of her heart for better or for worse. While waiting to meet his brother who ends up as a no show, he finds a beautiful girl that lights up every part of who he is  his heart, his mind, and his body. He feels a strong pull to this beautiful mystery and more than anything wants to get to know her better. Some gifts come wrapped with strings and secrets that could rip a burgeoning dream apart before it ever becomes reality. Does Scott and Elizabeth have what it takes to survive the aftermath of this raging storm, or will they watch helplessly as their small piece of Heaven slips right through their fingers?I felt so torn when Elizabeth finds herself in a terrible situation that only gets worse. Yes, she made a bad choice, and the price she paid was so much higher than she could have ever imagined. Its funny how we think we can compartmentalize ourselves in order to do things we think will benefit us. Thats like saying we can stop breathing and still continue to live a normal life. While Elizabeth courageously faced and dealt with one insecurity after another, it was Scott that my heart hurt for the most. Scott had no clue what was going on and all he did was put his heart on the line for her. Please dont think that I disliked Elizabeth because truthfully I fell in love with both her and Scott. They were so right and perfect for each other. There no barriers between them when they were together. They brought out the good in each other and helped to build the other up. Together they could have overcome anything, and what they found in each other was the missing piece to their soul. No words could accurately describe what they shared. They were simply beauty at its finest.J. S. Cooper continues to surprise and captivate me with her wonderfully heartfelt and fiercely raw stories of astonishing love mixed with true to life heartbreaking circumstances. She holds nothing back as she breaks my heart and mends it at the same time. Her writing and heart only grows stronger and bolder with each beautiful work or art she creates. These beautiful masterpieces are the stuff of dreams and the designers of legends. If you want to have a totally unique and intense experience, then look no further than a J. S. Cooper book!

Beautifully intense, wildly unexpected, and achingly raw Badass is the story you wont see coming that will capture your soul and hold your heart for ransom. Every now and again life offers us the best thing that we will ever find amidst the worst possible circumstances. All we have to do is to figure this out before its lost to us forever. Absolutely no pressure there. Some say when life gives us lemons, we should make lemonade. Too bad more of us dont think that way. Life would be a whole lot more interesting and what fun is life if we dont take a risk every now and again.Cassie is a serious student who is starting her graduate degree on the foreign shores of California after living her entire life in Massachusetts. She plans to devote her life to marine biology and to her love of nature and the wildlife within it. She never intended to find her own brand of wildlife for her own non-existent love life, but life had a big surprise in store that she would turn her heart and world upside down. Shane has chosen the life of a Navy SEAL, and thinks he lives the perfect life. No commitment, no demands, and nothing tying him down aside from his job. Cassie and Shane know they dont fit into the others life, but neither can find the strength to deny their intrigue and attraction. While Cassie tries to decide if she really wants to let Shane into her life let alone her heart, Fate rips the decision away from her and sends both on a whirlwind ride that changes everything. Will they be the same when the dust settles, or will they discover a love so all-encompassing and resilient that they will gladly open their hearts and their lives to the only One that has ever been able to breathe life into them?Cassie and Shane couldnt have been more different and yet they complimented and completed the other in ways they refused to acknowledge. While being too busy guarding their hearts from being hurt, they find that they have been living life on automatic. Not really feeling, keeping everyone out, and losing themselves in their work. They dont make excuses for who they are, but when their eyes are finally open they realize how much they have been missing. Their hearts collide and intertwine almost immediately ingraining the other into their very soul. Watching these two stumble through the meaning of real love, unconditional acceptance, and being vulnerable initially tore at my heart and then made it soar when life took on such a powerful meaning that they couldnt even express. I couldnt help falling in love with these two stunning characters that made me feel every part of their incredible journey together. The honest realism and the depth of their emotions hit me hard and left me absolutely gutted. There is no way that I could get enough of their love story!Linda Barlow and Alana Albertson undoubtedly and forever rocked my world with their mind-blowing masterpiece! They crushed and obliterated all of my expectations taking me for one out-of-this-world exquisite love story that has etched itself like a beautiful tattoo on my heart. Some stories written by two authors can seem choppy and at times disjointed, but what I found was one story, written with a huge heart, and illustrated with a soul overflowing with hope and joy that is contagious and unapologetic. Please give this story a chance as you will not be disappointed.

A Gypsys Kiss is without a doubt both tantalizingly captivating and breathtakingly beautiful in its dark shroud of mystery, life-changing journey of love, and unwavering devotion to family. What an amazing gift to enjoy such an incredible adventure that highlights and focuses on the most important things that make life worth living! No one is ever truly unloved, and everyone touches the lives of those around them no matter how insignificant they think they are. Dont ever discount your place and importance in this world. We are all created to fulfill a very specific purpose, and we are the only ones that fulfill can it. We need to daily gather hope and courage from that fact. The greatest that thing you will ever do is just to love and be loved in return.Breena is born with a gift that she has only ever viewed as a curse. She doesnt see her purpose in life as being meaningful and so she chooses to isolate herself from everyone. While she has a huge heart and an untapped reserve of love, she resigned herself to being alone. After all who could ever love and accept her for who she really is? It could be said that Hawk has it all with his endless popularity, natural athletic talent, and a loving family, but sometimes appearances can be deceiving. He has a growing concern that he knows only one person can help him with, but he isnt sure he can convince Breena to help him out. He knows nothing about her, but as they try to unlock the mystery that haunts him, he sees in her what he has been missing and craving for in his own life. What starts out as a request for help slowly turns into a quest for winning the heart of the girl who completes him in every way. Will Breena open her heart and her life to take a chance to fulfill her deepest desire, or will she only give Hawk her help in unraveling the mystery surrounding his life?Walking beside Breena and Hawk during this entire journey has been completely exhilarating and delightfully heartwarming. Highlighting the importance and power of family and friends made my heart soar to the Heavens as society today doesnt typically view family in such a stunning and wholesome way. The only way we can succeed in this life is to hold our family close and to cherish the special love we find along the way just as dearly. I very much enjoyed watching Breena and Hawk discover and nurture the amazing love that came to life between then. Neither could have anticipated the impact that the other would have on them, and I am so glad that they took their time to learn about, cherish, and accept everything about each other. It was so wonderful to watch them fall in love and surrender to the beauty that their love created and inspired in them. It was their lifeline when things got hard, and it served as their courage to keep going when life looked impossible.Susan Griscom wrote with a heart full of vibrant color and overflowing love. When you combine the two, you get something that is wholly unique and incredibly spectacular. It touches the heart in such a powerful way that you know you will take this story and its characters with you from this day forward. The paranormal and suspense genres have always appealed to me, but when you mix those with strong, passionate themes of family, devotion, and love, you will steal my heart away and earn my reading devotion every time. If you enjoy these genres and themes as well, do not hesitate to read this book. You will NOT be disappointed!

Wild Thing allows us a much deeper dive into this beautifully enchanting and fiercely emotional rollercoaster that is Georgie and Xan. We are privileged to see behind the veil on the mysterious and complex character that is Xan. I loved how we are granted a back stage pass to get to know the other band members as well. We see their strange dynamic up close and personal, and nothing is as it seems when it comes to Killer Valentine. So sit back, fasten your safety belt, and be prepared to for one wild and unforgettable ride!Georgia is determined to keep her heart as far away from Xan as possible. She is only with him for some temporary no strings fun and a place to hide while she regroups and gets her life back on track. No long term plans for her thank you very much and especially not with a man like Xan. The Ice Princess is firmly in charge and has no desire to relinquish control to anyone. Xan says he only wants Georgie around for some much needed fun and to help with his songwriting. Thats all he needs, and he barely has any time for those things with his bands packed scheduled. However, what he didnt count on was how quickly, quietly, and completely she has invaded his life, his heart, and his very soul. Now, all he wants is to keep her safely by his side, and he will do it by whatever means possible. After all alive and brokenhearted is better than dead and never coming back. What is a girl to do when her life hangs in the balance, and the only one who can save her is the very man who can easily destroy her? What will Xan risk to keep Georgie safe and his band on schedule to see their rise to fame finally become reality?I loved getting to know these beautiful characters on a much deeper level. They made me fall in love with all of them without any regrets. Georgie and Xan are both phenomenal characters who never failed to show me how beautiful life is when you find the person that completes you and how devastating love can be when it is toyed with and forced into a mold that it was never meant to fill. We have to be true to ourselves if we hope to grow and live a rich and fulfilling life. If we arent honest with ourselves, then we can never be truly honesty with anyone else. We all have choices we have to make, but we need to sure that they are good for not only us but for those around us. No matter what people may tell you, family and friends are all that you have in this world, so they should never be treated poorly or taken advantage of.Blair Babylon has written another utterly incredible work of art. No matter how many of her books I have read, she continues to become an even greater and more formidable author whose fierce passion and unbreakable conviction shines through the crowd to illuminate her uniquely creative and completely unforgettable genius. She excels at shining the light on the human soul and illustrating that we all have pieces of both light and dark inside each of us. We have to choose which we will allow to dominate and control us. Only we have that choice, and it should never be taken lightly.

A Perfect Love is an unquestionably courageous and undeniably passionate story that above all else highlights the indescribable power and the priceless value of family. No one or nothing should ever deter us from making sure that our family knows how much we love and appreciate them. They hold us up, empower us, and put a drive in our soul to do the unthinkable in order to protect, love, and cherish those who not only make up our world but are a piece of our world. Without family, the soul never truly lives, the heart never fully awakens, and the mind blocks off unused segments in order to survive and function. Our soul cries out to belong, to be wanted, and to be cherished. This is a part of ourselves that we ignore at our own peril, so no matter what you do in life, always be sure to love often, appreciate well, and never let go.Jo receives an extremely unexpected surprise that tilts her world on its axis. After the initial shock, she is determined to learn more about and enjoy this new change. She is in a wonderful place with Liam, and she has family around that will undoubtedly support and love her no matter what. After she drops this bomb on Liam, he realizes that while you cant plan for everything, their love and dedication to each other has never been stronger than it is now. He is going to enjoy this life change with Jo every step of the way, and in the process decides to step up and repair a broken relationship with his brother. Nothing is more important than family, and with Jos encouragement, Liam sets out to right a long forgotten wrong. What no one expects is that along with this happy surprise, they are also dealt a shocking and life-changing blow. Nothing will deter Jo and Liam from living their life as they have always dreamed, so with a firm resolution in place and an unwavering love between them, they take one day at a time in reinforcing and protecting everything and everyone they hold most dear. Will their valiant effort be enough to weather this devastating storm, or will someone walk away in order to forever protect the other?I was completely blown away by the beautifully mesmerizing characters that I encountered throughout the pages of this book. Each one realizes how hard life is, but in the end they choose to focus on and nurture the best parts of their life  their family and friends.  Watching them rally around Jo and Liam during and after their darkest times in their life completely took my breath away. I cried many tears at seeing how much love and dedication they showered on this amazing couple. The right words to convey my full emotion utterly fail me. Jo and Liam are such a precious, real-life pair who fight every day to keep what they have and make it grow. They simply had me head over heels for them by the end of the story. I truly hope to see more from these truly breathtaking characters. In particular, I look forward to Liams bother Mace finding a woman who not only heals his broken heart but shows him everything that he has been missing out on in both life and love.If ever an author can open my heart and fill it with more emotion and understanding then I ever thought possible, it would be Becca Lee. She is truly a wondrously gifted and uncommonly kindhearted person who allows us glimpses of her heart and from those our heart is filled to overflowing with the most important things in life. Watching her truly stunning talent deepen and blossom over time, is a gift that I never get tired of treasuring and enjoying.  Whatever you do, I implore you to give this wonderful author a chance. You will not be disappointed.

Taming Romeo is a breathtaking story of being pursued and caught by a love so boundless and intense that all we can think of is forever. When a love so pure and right envelopes and permeates itself so thoroughly and gently throughout your heart, it cannot be easily stopped or pushed aside. Throwing aside such a precious gift is unthinkable and beyond cruel. Unfortunately, in life nothing is cut and dry when it comes to love and life. Sometimes we are convinced that love will only serve to hold us back from our dreams when in reality they only help to fuel and enhance your deepest dreams. If only, we could really understand that and not allow others to convince us to settle for leaving our heart on the side of the road. Living life without your heart completely removes the reason for life itself. Who would want to live like that?Evie is a girl with a dream of becoming a doctor. The only problem is that while her dreams pull her away from home, the boy who has stolen her heart is at home. She is completely torn by this, and ultimately she is convinced that her dreams are more important then what her heart wants. After all she can find love anywhere, right? Her heart tries to tell her that she is wrong, but to prove that she knows best, she finds a love at college that becomes only a shadow of what she desperately longs for. Romeo doesnt understand why the girl he intended to marry left him standing with his heart in his hands. He thought he knew where she stood, but obviously hes missing some important piece of information. When she comes home for a short break, he doesnt intend to waste any time in showing her what all she has missed out on. He wants to ingrain himself so deeply into her heart that she cant walk away this time. With meddling families and jealous siblings, these two have their work cut out for them. Will Evie follow her heart this time, or will she forever lose the best thing in her life?Evie attempted to make her dreams come true at the ultimate expense of her heart which only proved to her that she was making a huge mistake in the end. Everything came crashing down around her because you cant live your life devoid of your heart. You ignore it at your own demise. Her character really tugged at my heart because she learned the hard way that you cant walk away from the incredible love that she and Romeo carefully built and nurtured.
