With many quiet revelations and comically awkward scenes, Amelia and Chris learn to work through their personal issues, their feelings for each other, and how to embrace an uncertain future. Love and Other Perishable Items is an intelligent, satisfying book, and readers will be reluctant to leave Buzos carefully constructed world.Cover Comments: I really appreciate the simplicity of this cover, and I think it fits well with the story. The interior design is also really nice.

Sophronia never thought shed enjoy finishing school, but Mademoiselle Geraldines school is unlike any other. After a rather interesting start and making many allies (and a few enemies), Sophronia and the first form class prepare for their first examinations. When Sophronia is suddenly ostracized by her peers after receiving the best marks in her class, she suspects a conspiracy that may run deeper than schoolgirl whims.Carrigers use of humor, oftentimes constructed by the ridiculous nature of Victorian etiquette, is the main device by which she builds her steampunk world and fleshes it out so wonderfully. The book includes more inventions, new circles of society, and poses the question of who the girls are really working for. With Sophronia on the case, questions usually lead to more questions, but the journey is delightful and full of adventure and thrills. Carriger maintains a nice balance between the character relationships and the greater conflict of the story, making for a nicely complicated and emotionally satisfying book.Cover Comments: I love the cover, even though the girl looks a lot older than Sophronia, who is supposed to be 14-15. Nonetheless, it captures the fantastic mesh of Victorian setting with danger and airships (look closely at the wallpaper!). Fantastic.

Troy Billings is over three hundred pounds and his weight dominates everything that he does and thinks about. When skinny Curt McCrae thwarts Troy's suicide attempt, he enlists Troy to be a drummer in his band. Troy doesn't know the first thing about the drums or music, but he lets Curt pull him along because he feels like someone cares about him for the first time in his life.Fat Kid Rules the World is gritty and painfully candid. Going gets close to Troy's insecurities as he struggles to keep up with Curt's manic ideas, and she uses Curt's struggles with prescription drug use to propel Troy to find his self-confidence and value for life. While the relationship between Troy and Curt is well-written, the secondary characters of this novel, particularly Troy's father and brother, tend to come across as caricatures rather than characters. Nevertheless, the story is quick-witted, sometimes darkly humorous, sometimes uncomfortable, but ultimately triumphant.

Sutter isnt interested in plans for the future; he lives for the constant pursuit of the spectacular now. He spends most of his last days of high school drunk and looking for a good time when he meets Aimee, a shy girl without much self-confidence, and decides to help her come out of her shell. Hes not looking for a girlfriend, but somehow thats what he gets in Aimee. But as graduation draws closer, Sutter cant help but wonder who is helping whom, and whether or not the spectacular now will be enough for their relationship.The Spectacular Now is an interesting study of Sutters character and his inner thoughts, beliefs, and motivations. Tharp mostly explores Sutters character and what makes him act and react, but outside of Sutter, the book is light on plot. Aimees blindness and naivet make her hard to like as a character independent of Sutter, and Sutter is even more unlikable when it becomes apparent that he is taking advantage of Aimees adoration. Tharps writing is honed, sardonic, and interesting, but the conclusion of the story leaves the reader wondering if Sutter ever experienced any character growth, if he even believes in all of the encouragement he offers Aimee, or if Sutters purpose is just in breaking Aimees heart.

When sixteen-year-old Sydney discovers she is pregnant, she tells only her best friend and hopes in vain that she'll miscarry. Her divorced parents, unaware of her pregnancy and fed up with her reckless behavior, send Sydney on a wilderness canoeing tour in Canada in the hopes to straighten her out. As the days pass and Sydney's pregnancy progresses, she thinks back on her choices and is forced to come to a decision about her future.This introspective novel explores Sydney's life and her relationships, with her parents, her best friend, her romantic encounters, and her own demons. Gramont focuses on Sydney's slow personal growth, and the unexplainable yet magnetic dynamics between her protagonist and the supporting characters. It's in Sydney's interactions and unexpected strong connections to the most unlikely people in her group that force her to own up to her mistakes and take responsibility for her actions. Every Little Thing in the World is a novel about possibilities, connections, and the power of redemption.Cover Comments: I like the bright colors of this cover, and the look on the girl's face--full of bliss. The water looks really cool, and makes this cover look really active.

Gerald figures he has two options for his future: prison or death. He has so much anger building inside of him, and everyone seems oblivious to all of the injustice that has been making him angry since he was just five years old. His anger is always there, and he can't seem to control it until he meets a girl. She's not perfect, and she doesn't make the anger go away, but together they dare to demand something from the world in return, and Gerald sees a third option--a tentative future of possibilities.Reality Boy is easily King's most heart-breaking and forceful book yet. From the gut-wrenching beginning to the heartbreaking flashbacks of a childhood invaded by TV cameras and millions of viewers, Gerald's story is an intense ride. King deftly demonstrates the reality TV is anything but real, and that it doesn't matter if your family and environment expects you to fail, because you are the only one who has control over your own life and choices, and you can demand better for yourself. The characters in Reality Boy are so tangible; Gerald's sister is truly terrifying, the ketchup lady shockingly sincere and tender, and the circus members profanely hilarious. This isn't a book about finding love and finding your life through a significant other, but rather experiencing romance and in that finding the courage to demand a life for yourself and stand up to others. King will punch you in the gut and demand a visceral reaction. You won't be able to look away. Reality Boy is worth every word.Cover Comments: I really like this cover. The cover model looks a lot like how I imagined Gerald, and I really like the effect of the colors across the cover.

Blaze, a Marvel comic-loving teen and aspiring artist, is determined to get Mark the Soccer God to finally notice her as girlfriend material, and not just the fill-in soccer mom to her younger brother and his rowdy friends. And when Mark finally takes notice, Blaze is thrilled...except Mark isn't the guy she thought he was. In fact, he turns out to be quite the shark. And there is nothing quite as fearsome as the revenge of the Blazing Goddess.Blaze, Or Love in the Time of Supervillains is full of snark, good humor, and plenty of painfully awkward moments as Blaze fumbles her way through her first relationship and learns a few things about herself along the way. Superhero metaphors and allusions abound in this quirky story, and Blaze's voice is very strong and distinct. Her endless optimism balanced with a sarcastic tone make her a funny, likable narrator who learns to deal with disappointments in life with grace, flair, and plenty of nerdy humor. Crompton's debut novel is intelligent, unexpectedly sweet, and full of attitude.Cover Comments: If you don't pick up the novel for the synopsis or title, you'll definitely pick it up for the fantastic cover! Like the book, this cover has so much attitude. I absolutely love it.

Serena dreamed of two things: leaving her small Florida town and becoming a travel writer. Her plans were derailed when Sawyer Legrande left her, sixteen years old and pregnant. Now eighteen and working at her family's restaurant, Serena's life is changed once more when Sawyer comes back to town and wants to be a part of their daughter's life, and Serena's--if she can let him in.How to Love is a vivid and smart book full of love, heartache, hope, and regret. The novel is written in alternating chapters and tenses, dividing the narrative by "Before" Sawyer leaves town and "After" he returns. The two storylines are independently developed but complement each other nicely to show Serena's growth and character development as a whole. Cotugno develops the tensions between Serena and her family very well, motivating change in everyone's actions by asking heavy questions about life, following your dreams, and second chances. The characterizations are precisely written, and the emotional journeys memorable in this stand-out first novel.Cover Comments: I really like the simplicity of this novel. The blue is a great shade, and I like the texture of the font.

The Iceres Cooking Thermometer Is a quick, accurate and easy to read indoor/outdoor thermometer that is perfect for my cooking needs. The overall length is 9 inches, with the stainless steel probe measuring 5 3/4 inches. I really like the long thin probe. It enables me to get accurate fast readings in seconds even on thick pieces of meat. The length of the probe helps protect my hand from the heat of the grill and the thin design doesn't leave a big tell tale probe mark when removed. This thermometer is instant read with an easy to read digital LED display.  The instant read feature matters when you are trying to get the perfect internal temperature as every minute matters.  I like that I don't have to guess or cut into the meat to get it perfectly cooked.  Another feature thisthermometer has is an automatic shut off.  I usually forget to turn thermometers off.  It is sure not fun to think my thermometer is ready to use and find I need to change out batteries so an auto shutdown is a must have feature when I select a thermometer.The Iceres thermometer comes in a clear plastic storage tube that has a carry strap. The thin design and the storage tube makes it easy to store in a drawer.  The thermometer also comes with the battery in place. It is easily accessible and uses a LR44.  I find cleanup is easy, I just wipe the probe off.  I am so glad I reviewed this product.  I am looking forward to using this during the holidays when baking breads, making candy and baking a turkey.I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest opinion. My opinion of this product is 100% my own.

Finding a deep wrinkle product that is a moisturizer, can be used on both my eyes and face, keeps my skin hydrated, and supports collagen production has made a big difference in my skin texture and appearance. I really like how my face feels more hydrated, smoother and my skin looks healthier.  There is so much to like about this product. It is made in the USA in a state of the art FDA registered facility, safe for all skin types, cruelty free, and a Vegan formula.  Directions are to apply twice a day for at least 28 days to see significant results. Avoid storing at high temperatures for better shelf life.The net weight of the  Illuminea deep wrinkle facial cream is 31 ml. The cream is dispensed using a pump, spreads easily on my face and I only need to use a small amount (about 1 dime sized pump) so this bottle should last me for awhile.  There is no noticeable scent, no greasy feeling and it absorbs into my skin quickly. I love how my makeup glides on over this product and my skin still feels light.  I like that this comes with a guarantee you'll get results or your money back. I am excited about this wrinkle cream as I am starting to see results even though I haven't used this product for 28 days.  In the couple weeks using this twice a day, I notice my fine winkle lines around my eyes are improving and the skin under my eyes is less baggy.  I will continue to use this as I love the results I am seeing so far and I have deeper wrinkles that I know will take longer to improve.  I use this in the morning and night on my clean face after washing.  It is an easy one step (only one product to apply, not a different one for my eyes) that I highly recommend.I am so glad I was given the opportunity to try this product in exchange for an honest review.  I was not compensated in any other manner and my review is my honest opinion.

I am very impressed with the design, quality sound, and comfort of the Soniq USA SE500 Pulse Earbuds.  First thing I noticed when I opened the box was the cool sleek look of the cord and the carry case. The cord Is a braided nylon fabric wrapped cord (not plastic) that is generous in length, water resistant and tends to be tangle free.  This is so much better than my earphones that came with my iPhone 6 that tangle easily  and need to carefully be wrapped to get back into their plastic carry case. With the zippered round black Soniq Pulse Earbuds case there is no need to wrap the cord.  The earphones are comfortable, they have a memory foam ear cushion that seals out most noise and mold to your ear.  There are even additional memory foam ear cushions to select from for a proper fit.  The Pulse Earbuds provide a clear crisp sound and the quality of music is top notch and they eliminate most background noise.  Pleased that even though most noise is sealed out sounds such as a phone ringing can still be heard.I was given the opportunity to review these Soniq USA SE500 Earbuds in exchange for an impartial review and received them at a discount.  I was not compensated in any other manner for this review.

As a homeowner I want burglars not to be able to tell if we are away and that my home is an easy target.  I always have a neighbor watch my house and take extra steps to deter a would be burglar. If my home looks occupied when I am gone most likely burglars will pass it by.  I usually do this by using automatic timers for my lights and make it look like someone is in the home.  Recently a neighbor had some items taken from their car parked outside in their driveway so when I saw the opportunity to review The Fake TV Simulator I was pleased to give it a try.  To be truthful, I was very skeptical that this would be so realistic. I now realize how easy and cost effective it is to give the appearance of a television being played using a small device (about 2 1/2 by 3 inches) instead of playing my real television. The Fake TV Simulator uses LED lights that consume a low amount of electrical energy (only 3 watts of power).  The Fake TV Simulator is very convincing as the lights change color, fade, and replicate screen motion of a real television.  I like that this is so simple to use, nothing to program on a computer.  I just plug it in and choose a setting (press once for always on, press again to come on at dusk till dawn or press again for it to come on at dusk and stay on for 4 hours, press again and you are setting it to come on at dusk and stay on for 7 hours).  The unit has a light sensor that turns the TV Simulator on at dusk so it automatically changes to come on at the correct time. The product description states the lights of the simulator compare to a 40 inch screen and I believe that would be a good comparison. This comes with a free flexible tripod stand that can be used to position the simulator. There is also a bonus gift of a free phone holder that would enable me to also use my iPhone on the tripod.The product owner's description clearly states that this is being offered at a huge discount due to an Australian plug being provided by mistake.  To remedy this issue I used a micro USB cord to plug my unit in. I am still giving this 5 stars for the following reasons; I really like this product, I feel that this is being offered at a great price considering a tripod and phone holder are included, and most people likely have an extra USB cord they can use.I am so glad I was given the opportunity to try this product in exchange for an honest review.  I was not compensated in any other manner and my review is my honest opinion.

I followed the directions to hand wash the belt in soapy water, rinse and allow to air dry before use. Once it was dry I fitted the belt directly on my skin having the Velcro facing towards me. I adhered the lined up Velcro edges making sure the fit was snug and comfortable. I then covered the belt with my clothing.  The first thing I noticed was how the "Just Fitter" Premium Waist Trimmer supported my lower back and abdominal muscles. I felt my posture was improved. I was excited because I realized that I would be able to wear this comfortably.  Then I noticed the warmth that the belt was creating. It felt similar to using a heating pad. The heat increased as I became more active.  Since wearing the waist trimmer I have seen an improvement in my stomach area and I plan on continuing incorporating this into my fitness plan.The black waist trimmer belt will fit up to a 44 inch waist and is 9 inches wide and weighs 9.3 ounces. It is made out of a heat generating material that helps burn fat faster. It comes with a 90 day guarantee that If you don't notice an OBVIOUS improvement in your appearance, they will give you your money back - no questions asked.  I find that this is not only helping shrink my waist size but my lower back strength seems to be improving.  I definitely will continue using the Just Fitter Waist Trimmer.I am so glad I was given the opportunity to try this product in exchange for an honest review.  I was not compensated in any other manner and my review is my honest opinion.

To me it is all about how a moisturizer feels, smells, its ingredients and where it is manufactured. I know I won't use a moisturizer that makes my skin feel uncomfortable or if it has an offensive or odd odor.  I want a product that is paraben and sulfate free and made in the USA and this product is. Every diaper bag should have one of these handy reusable portable bottle warmers. It doesn't use batteries or need to be plugged in, you simply flex the stainless steel disc to initiate the activation. It is best to wrap your baby bottle before activating the click button on the warmer. It clearly states in the product description that the purpose of this product is to keep your pre-heated milk warm. It will not warm your milk up from cold. It will keep your preheated bottle warm for up to one hour. The solution is non-toxic FDA approved and is reusable. As it cools down completely it will become crystallized and a solid pack. My product did not come with directions but I had used another product that uses this technology as heat packs for muscle relief so I am familiar with how to reset the pack.  There was an email sent to me on how to use the pack but since I've used this technology before this is what I do. Boil water in a pot, (Do not put the pack in a microwave, must be in boiling water to reheat.) I wrap a cloth around my pack to protect it from the bottom of the pot. Place the wrapped bottle heater pack inside the pot. Keep in boiling water (approximately 10 minutes) until all the crystals are dissolved and only a clear liquid remains. I use tongs to remove pack from boiling water.  (Make sure there are no crystals remaining.). Place the heat pack on a cloth to cool down. When the pack cools down, it's ready to use again. If crystals begin to form while pad is cooling, it should be boiled again until all crystals disappear.  To reuse just flex the metal disc. If it doesn't start to heat up the heat pack may still be too hot after boiling. Allow more time to cool. If your heat pack is completely cooled just try additional flexing to the stainless steel disc. This would make a thoughtful gift to new parents, babysitters and grandparent. I highly recommend this product. I had the opportunity to review this in exchange for an honest review. I was pleased to do so. I was not compensated in any other manner and my review is my honest opinion.

I like aerated frothy milk on my drinks but I do not own a milk steamer. I have found by using a milk frother I can create a foamy milk topping in a few quick steps.  It's pretty simple, fun and easy to do using the Bru Joy Milk Frother. I like the Bru Joy unit because it is stainless steel, well made with a classy, trendy look, it fits comfortably in my hand and I am able to control the speed. The unit requires 2 AA batteries which are not included.  To operate the frother there is an easy to operate switch that moves forward using your thumb until it clicks at low speed. Moving the switch forward after the click will increase the speed of the frother head. Turn it off by using your thumb to pull the switch back until it clicks off.This is how I make aerated frothy milk.1) Heat milk in a thick ceramic cup in a microwave oven, filling the cup about 1/3 full (add a little sugar, syrup or vanilla to the milk if you like).  Make sure not boil the milk.2) Remove cup of heated milk from the microwave and insert the frother all the way into the cup before you turn it on.3) Turn on the frother making sure to keep the tip submerged increasing the speed and varying the depth until the milk is foamy expanding approximately 50%.4) Turn off the milk frother while it is still immerse in the milk.The creamy, decadent foam is ready to enjoy on top of a drink.  Sometimes I sprinkle the froth with cinnamon, salted caramel bits or a swirl of caramel or chocolate syrup.  With supervision this is fun to make with children. They have so much fun using the milk frother to make their hot chocolate drinks with special toppings.I also use the milk frother to scramble eggs. I add a small amount of water (about 1 tablespoon water for 2 extra large eggs). My eggs are light and fluffy much better than when I whisk by hand.The enclosed cleaning directions for the milk frother are to wash only the frother head in warm soapy water and rinse thoroughly. Clean the stainless steel handle by wiping with a clean cloth. Make sure not immerse the motor unit.  However, if I have just used it in milk I usually clean the frother head under running water as soon as I am finished using it. This makes cleanup easy. I highly recommend this product. It is fun to create a treat for myself or company. I think this would make an awesome gift.  I received this product at a discount price for my review. My review is based on my own personal experience.  Opinions are my own and this is my honest review.

The combination of the three ingredients; Omega 3, CoQ10, and Squid Ink in one pill is perfect for me. I have not had any problems with an upset stomach or any fishy burps like I know sometimes occurs when taking fish oils.  I definitely think this is cost effective as I don't need to buy separate bottles of dietary supplements of fish oil, Omega 3 and CoQ10.  There are 60 softgels in the bottle and directions state take one softgels once daily with a meal. I store these in my refrigerator as the bottle should be stored in a cool dry place. The bottle comes with the lid sealed in a protective plastic wrap. When you open the lid there is another protective seal you break open. The pills have a definite fishy smell and are a very dark brown in color. I don't care for the smell but there is no unusual aftertaste. I feel I have seen an improvement in my skin since taking these pills. I will have to wait to have lab work to see if my cholesterol level improves. Both my doctor and my chiropractor recommended fish oil so I will continue to use. There is a 100% money back guarantee.

I am pleased with the design of the inside of the briefcase and totally amazed how much it holds.I was fortunate to purchase this stylish, well made and functional briefcase using a promotional code. Happy to say I have found the easy solution to being able to chill a bottle of wine quickly. Seems like I never guess correctly which bottle of wine my guests will want to open. Now, I just make sure I have the rod section of the wine chiller chilled in the freezer for at least 2 hours.  Then I simply pour out a little bit of the wine so I can insert the rod that I have screwed onto the pourer/aerator into the bottle. It's important to pour out a little taste of the wine because you will displace some wine when the chilling rod is immersed.  The wine chiller and pourer not only allows me to chill wine quickly (it takes about 5 minutes) but also aerates the wine. I will be the first to admit I am not a wine connoisseur and I am not buying the most expensive wine but I feel that aerating does improve the taste. I also find that the pourer eliminates drips and spills. I am glad I was able to purchase this using a promotional code as this wine chiller is so easy to use. Over the Top Concert Earbuds came with 3 different size premium Comply earphone tips for me to select from. Each set is spherical shaped for a secure fit that blocks noises. Another hint to go deep for deeper insertion is that you open and close your jaw multiple times as you insert the earbud with the rolled and compressed Comply tip.
