The plot is so intriguing and the book is so fast paced that I read the whole thing from start to finish in no time. It was over before I knew it or was ready for it. I absolutely loved and felt so much for Shannon and Ethan, they both come from dark places and have the potential to either ruin each other or save each other. This book is swimming with emotions and passion. Kudos to Cherry for giving us another great book to devour. I was generously given a complimentary copy of this book for an honest review.

This is the first book that I've had the chance to read by this author and I really loved her writing. I haven't had a chance to read her Broken World series but fully intend to. It is a really good shifter read, although at times I felt as though I was missing something as if I had come into the middle of something. I think perhaps if I had read the other books in the Broken World series I might not have been lost at times, but the author does offer enough back story and pieces of the puzzle throughout the book that everything makes sense if you just keep reading, which is not difficult because the book is hard to put down. The story really pulls you in and the characters are really great. There is a ton of chemistry between the two main characters along with a good deal of action, mystery and suspense. I am very much looking forward to the next book in the series. I was generously given a complimentary copy of this book by the author.

I enjoyed this book so much. There is literally something for every reader in here. Not only have I found some new authors to love but the twists on these fairy tales is amazing. While each author has done a twist on a fairy tale, some going way outside the box, some making them ultra modern, each author has their own style and flair, adding twists, sexiness, evil and magic, which when blended in with the other talented authors makes for an amazing compilation. I loved all of the stories but my favorite was Awakened by Kristen Strassel. This is a dark twist on Sleeping Beauty and of course, I love me some Sexy vamps. I think that this is my favorite anthology of the year thus far and I definitely recommend it. I was generously provided a complimentary copy of this book for an honest review.

This is my first read by this author but the synopsis was just too good to pass up. Thank goodness I didn't I really loved this read, and found it extremely hard to put down, I wanted to devour the whole thing in one sitting. The story is so very well written that I was immediately sucked into the story, with all of it's drama and heart pounding moments as well as a few unexpected surprises, plus the characters are so very well developed that you really get to know them. I absolutely loved the sweet, witty and beautiful, Mia, who has gone though some pretty hard stuff in the past along with being a single mom, though there were times I wanted to grab her and yell WTH? I also adore Chris the consummate oh so sexy bachelor. The chemistry between the two is sizzling. Though their first meeting was less than idyllic. I enjoyed the slow way that they build while the two try and stave off their feelings for each other. This is just a terrific read that I definitely recommend. I was generously provided a complimentary copy of this book for an honest review.

This is my first read by this author and you can bet that it won't be my last. I absolutely loved it. It was so well written that I found myself falling right into the story, I did not want to put it down and would have read it straight through if it weren't for these pesky adulting duties. :pI absolutely loved the strong, sassy but sweet Cassie and the ultra sexy, bad boy, sweetheart that is Theo. The chemistry between them is off the charts. I love a good friends to lovers story and this one is no exception. I just loved the way that the story flows so easily along pulling the reader along. Will Theo get the woman  that he has been crushing on forever? Can he convince Cassie who doesn't do relationships to give it a chance? Will Cassie reveal her true feelings? Read and find out. I definitely recommend this book. I was generously given a complimentary copy of this book for an honest review.

This book is not your usual apocalyptic, end of the world read. First of all the authors did an excellent job at giving the same story while telling if from the different sides. The story is epic and includes fierce battles and angels, demons and other paranormal creatures, things that nightmares are made of. The action and adventure is practically non stop. There are so many twists and turns and bits and pieces that really keep you on your toes. I was really captivated by the story and was reluctant to put it down. I was generously provided a complimentary copy of this book for an honest review.

This is the second book in the series and if you haven't read the first book Fractured Immortal, I strongly suggest that you do, to really know what is going on with the story. This book picks up after the cliffhanger of the last book although, unlike most cliffhangers this one isn't resolved within the first few pages. Still I loved this book, there is so much going on.  Ilia and Alex as well as the rest of the gang have no idea of the revealed information that we the readers were given at the very end of the last book. When they found out, I was so relieved, I physically felt my body muscles loosen up not even realizing that I had been all tensed up. There is so much action and suspense in this book and love and solid loving friendship. I loved all of the characters though I have to admit that I was very suspicious of Eris from the very beginning and was shocked at the revelation about Ilia's mother. I could go on and on but don't want any spoilers to slip. I definitely recommend this read and can't wait for book 3. I was generously provided a copy through the R2R program from the Lovers of Paranormal group on Goodreads.

First let me start off by saying that the episodes of this season have to be read in order and if you haven't started the series yet, now is the perfect time, all of the episodes are out so no waiting. Yay! This entire season has been totally awesome. I absolutely love all of the characters, and loved getting to know them all. They each bring their own thing to the party and are so easy to care about and relate to. We have had ups and downs and secrets and fun. This episode ended with everyone leaving for winter break and a really hard boom. What is Ashleigh going to do? I am positive that her dance "partner" is not being totally honest and has something else up her sleeve. Poor Cassie I thought I knew what she was upset about but when we really find out, I was furious and want to smash Clay, that a-hole. I absolutely loved the series the author has done a terrific job and I can not wait till season 2 due out early in 2016. I was generously provided a complimentary copy of this book for an honest review.

I absolutely loved the Serving HIM series so I was totally thrilled to learn that Craving HIM was bringing back Dominic and Aleena. Also with this combination of authors, I don't even have to think before one-clicking, anything that they put out is sure to be absolute gold. This book is no exception. You don't have to read the Serving HIM series before this book, but I highly recommend it, first of all they are awesome, and secondly they are the base, of Dom and Aleena's story and I feel that if you don't read them first you will be missing out on a lot.  As for this book, I was sucked right back in with Dom and Aleena the second I began reading and unlike the Serving HIM series this is a full length novel which I loved! I was so caught up in the story that I didn't realize how much time had passed, until I hit the end and realized that the sun was beginning to peek above the horizon. Oops! The book just has so much to offer, it is blazingly sexy, with suspense, and even more of Dominic's story. This book gave me a real feeling of closure to Dominic and Aleena's story and I can't recommend it highly enough. I was very generously provided a complimentary copy of this book for an honest review.

I absolutely LOVED this book! The writing is absolutely superb, I was sucked into the story, totally hooked, right from the start, experiencing the story right alongside the characters. I literally flew through the pages, unwilling to put it down, I greedily consumed each and every word. The story flows effortlessly even while taking you on a roller coaster of emotions, and suspense. The plot is amazing and breathtaking with twists and turns that I never saw coming. I adore Robyn, she is a strong spitfire of a woman, even though she has her weak moments (who doesn't?) Then we have Cole and Callum, two very sexy, very different but completely delish men. I was enthralled from cover to cover through the drama, suspense, betrayal, love, intense passion,  and so much more. I can't recommend this book highly enough. I totally recommend it as a must read. I was graciously provided a complimentary copy of this book for an honest review. I am so looking forward to reading more from this very talented author.

I loved this book so much, it is seriously moving, heart-wrenching, and touching and simply beautiful. It is about serious heartbreak and the fallout that follows and moving on. It shows the strength of character of the main character Izzie and how even though you are knocked out with a one-two punch, you can have a second chance at life, and at love, not only for others but for yourself. The author has done such an excellent job with this one. I was immediately drawn into the story and did not want to put it down. I love how the author made the plot somewhat unpredictable and even threw in a few twists. I was captivated and intrigued throughout the entire read. I enjoyed not just the main characters but all of them, they each add to the story. I was right there with them all feeling their feelings with them, and really pulling for that HEA. I was generously given a complimentary copy of this book for an honest review.

When I was first offered the chance to read and review this book I wasn't sure if I would say yes because I had never read or hear of the author, but the first thing that drew me to take a closer look was the cover, and then the blurb, as soon as I read it I knew that I needed to know more. I am soooo glad that I did. This book is absolutely stellar. The writing is fantastic and the book drew me in pretty much from the start and kept me turning page after page, and every time I thought that I finally knew what was going on the author threw in a twist that had me gasping and reeling. There were points when I was absolutely shocked. I love that! The read is a total thrilling bumpy, twisty, turn-y, up and down  ride. This book is so hard to put down and the few times that I was forced to (life and such) I found myself thinking about what I had already read and what might be coming next. I am left wishing and hoping for a sequel. Kudos to the author for creating a work of this magnitude. I look forward to reading more and more of your work. I was generously provided a complimentary copy of this book for an honest review.

This is the second book in The Senseless series and continues where book one left off. These books do need to be read in order. This sequel is just as good if not better than the first which completely caught my attention and I loved. So much so that I went to purchase it after being given a complimentary copy of the book and was surprised to find that it was available and still is as of the writing of this review free on Amazon. I was also given a complimentary copy of this book for an honest review and I also sought it out on Amazon for purchase because it is just so good and I think that my daughter will absolutely love the series. Book 3 Nonsense is also currently available, the review for that will be coming soon. Back to the review for this book. This installment is another fast and exciting read, with mystery, twists,  and suspense with a touch of romance. I was once more drawn in right away and held captive by the story reading it straight through as I just could not put it down. We are still left with burning questions and I am dying to begin book 3 in the series!

This is book #1 in The Senseless Series and is totally captivating and intriguing, I loved it from cover to cover. It was short and I wasn't ready for it to end when it finally did. I absolutely got into the premise of the teens and how the acquired these powers. The characters are all very interesting and each has their own unique personality and really adds their own special something to the story. I can't wait to learn more about them especially the new and mysterious Kieran who somehow didn't get any powers, which makes me pretty suspicious of him. There is a cliffy ending and I can't wait to read more of this series. I was provided a complimentary copy of this book for an honest review and I loved it so much that I went to purchase it, and was surprised to find that as of the writing of this review it is currently free on Amazon. I also found that books two and three are currently available for cheap so I will be diving in asap!

This book was a quick enjoyable read. I loved the chemistry and witty banter between Blake and Ella. It's a sweet story and perfect for a quick afternoon reading fix. I was rooting for Blake from the start he is such a total sweetie and so hot! I was desperately wanting for Ella to see what has been right under her nose all along while she was wasting her time on an unrequited love. Find out what happens and give this book a read. I was generously provided a complimentary copy of this book for an honest review.

I am a total lover of all things paranormal, and when I read this part of the blurb "Trespassing into an unfamiliar world called the Demon's Grave, the group face a charismatic demon and six nightmarish Challenges as punishment. Those that make it to the end can go home, but those that don't will be his forever. Friendships are tested, secrets revealed and sacrifices will be made" and saw the cover with a spider on the girl's face, which totally creeped me out. I knew that I wanted to read this book. Having read it I need to read the rest of the series! The story  is full of mystery, suspense, twists, horror and just a totally intriguing plot. I was hooked right from the beginning and couldn't put the book down, if this had been a movie I would probably spent the time clutching a pillow. The book really flows keeping you turning the pages, needing to know what happens next. I really connected with the main character Nora and was totally suspicious of Aidan throughout. I definitely recommend this book. I was generously given a complimentary copy of this book for an honest review.

This is the perfect vessel for this trilogy, because the volumes really do need to be read in order, I suppose one could read the second or third as a standalone, but I really feel that the reader would be missing out on a LOT, and possible be confused at points. I myself wasn't sure what to expect when I was offered to read and review this trilogy. I wasn't familiar with the author but the blurb was intriguing so I took a chance. Wow! Am I ever glad that I took this chance! I really lucked out. I love the author's writing style and voice, her imagination is seriously amazing and the characters are real and very well developed. When I think of New Orleans I think of things like Mardi Gras, and Po' Boys, but also history and the mysterious. This was the perfect setting for this paranormal read. The story grabs you right from the start and keeps you enthralled as events unfold. It's exciting, intriguing, full of action, adventure, and is sexy as sin.  You will want to make time for this reading because you will not want to put it down. I can't wait to see what the author has in store for us next. I definitely recommend. I was very generously given a complimentary copy of this trilogy for an honest review.

After reading the blurb for this series I jumped at the chance to read and review it. Thank goodness that I got the chance to read the whole thing in one go, because as much as I love a good series cliffhangers or not, I am usually very impatiently waiting for the next book in the series, stalking the author on media to know WHEN will I get to know what happened! Each of these ends in a cliffy! I absolutely love the authors writing, he imagination is simply amazing, the world that she has created, and the descriptions are so awesome that you are part of the story rather than just reading it, and the characters are so very well developed you just know them. I totally love Braita, she is a totally real chick and completely bad=ass, and the male characters are all oh so delish! I was totally drawn into the series right from the beginning of book one, and was hard pressed to put it down, I read it every single chance I got and when I wasn't reading it, I was thinking about it. The whole saga is interesting, intriguing, and fast paced. I still have some questions at the end of the read and I can't wait to see what the author has in store for us next! I was generously given a complimentary copy of this series for an honest review.

After reading the first two books in this series which were both awesome, I was very excited about this one. I absolutely LOVED this book! It can be read as a stand alone, but I highly recommend the previous two books. As with the two previous books I was drawn into the story right away and held fast turning page after page until the very end. This book is quite a bit more lighthearted than the previous two books, but we are still taken on a bit of an angsty emotional ride. The author balances out the right amount of angst, sweetness, humor, romance, and steam with this read. I absolutely adore Lana and Jake, I couldn't help but to become seriously emotionally invested in the both of them. Neither of these characters has had what you could call a wonderful past but they are getting a chance at a better future. Will they grab hold and take it? Read and find out! I definitely recommend this book and the two before it. I am going to be watching out for this talented author. I was generously given a complimentary copy of this book for an honest review.

These styluses (styli?) are attractive and work very well, and the price is amazing. The fact that they are very light (an advantage for some) also means they are not as sturdy as others that are more expensive but don't do the job any better. If you don't have a chewing puppy around, you'll likely be fine.

I have two of these, one citron and one red. They do the job, and they are quite substantial. I also have some much cheaper ones which work well but are very light. My dog barely chewed one, and it's sort of ruined. I think the Amazon ones could have withstood the dog much better. (I know, I never should have left anything at all within reach of my one-year-old Miniature Bull Terrier! I have learned that lesson many times, but sometimes one slips up...)If you prefer better quality in your devices, get the Amazon one. It's expensive but clearly well made.

Wonderful product at an extremely reasonable price! Since I've never used the very expensive professional ones, I can't compare, but this is very helpful and plenty good enough for me, a rank amateur.

These small, instantly dissolving tablets work well and are extremely convenient to use. They do not have the typical bitter taste of even chewable Imodium. I wish they were available in the U.S. Instead, they are shipped from England, which no doubt accounts for the very high price. Great product but too expensive for someone who needs them fairly often.

This body wash lathers like crazy, smells like cucumbers (good!), and leaves the skin feeling smooth and fresh. HOWEVER, it has two big problems that will keep me from ordering it again:1. The dispenser lid does not work at all! I have to unscrew the whole cap, and then too much product pours out. Plus, it's a pain to do. I have arthritic hands so that's part of the problem, but it really is difficult to do (you have to squeeze the whole bottle really hard to get any to come out, and then only a tiny bit comes out), and I think it would be difficult for most anyone.2. It stings and burns mucous membranes, which do get suds on them in the normal process of washing.So... good product inside bottle but very bad dispenser.

This absolutely did NOT work!! I followed the directions to the letter and liked the ease of application. But what's the point if it doesn't color your hair? The only explanations I could think were that either the two solutions did not mix as intended or maybe I hadn't used enough (not likely). Whatever the reasons, the effort (and money) were wasted. After I read the other reviews, I realized that it consistently did not work, not only for me but for many. Don't buy this stuff.

I got these soup bowls to go with my Denby Duets Sage and Paprika dishes, and they match perfectly and add a bit of interest to the otherwise plain Duet dishes. Denbyware stands up to normal daily dishes and looks great. I have loved them for years and was excited to update my collection. The only downside is the cost, but they are definitely quality. I intend to add more of the Denby Fire serving pieces. Highly recommended.

The looks of these sandals are really cute and different, and I thought they'd be super comfy too since they're Aerosoles. But the weirdest thing happened when I put them on, which was that somehow they made my both feet turn inward and my big toe was slightly off the sole! I have no idea why or how that happened, but I tried to walk and correct the positioning, and that just didn't work. Sadly, I will be returning them.Except for that strange thing, I would have given them a five star rating, even though there's no arch support. I haven't gone through all the other reviews, but I feel pretty sure this didn't happen to most people. Admittedly, I have weird feet. So by all means, try these if you like the look. I think they probably work for most people, and the leopard print is really cute.

I was getting very discouraged with vacuuming and mopping with the Swiffer, which is super convenient and doesn't keep using the same dirty mop head, but when I did spot cleaning, even right after mopping, the paper towel would come up looking way too dirty... like I hadn't mopped at all! So I decided to give the FloorMate a try.PROS: Floors are definitely cleaner, which is the point.  Dirty water vacuumed up is evidence of what used to be left on floor.  Fairly easy to assemble.  Reasonable price.  Solution and dirty-water tanks are easy to remove, replace, refill and/or empty.CONS: Unit is very heavy to push around. Definitely causes back pain.  Directions for use are completely inadequate. (Example: To make cleaning solution come out, the unit has to be  moving. They don't tell you this.)  Holding down solution-flow button causes hand fatigue and pain.  Doesn't clean grout well.  Unit is large, requiring significant storage space.All in all, I think it's worth it for cleaner floors. But it's not the easiest contraption to use, especially if you have back or hand problems.Most definitely, the floors are cleaner, and the dirty water that is vacuumed up is pretty good evidence of what used to just be spread around. I love the fact that it dries the floors and picks up the dirty water, and the size of the containers seems adequate to me.
Even though this is definitely an inferior-quality imitation of better ones, it still works and feels great for a few moments of relaxation.

Because a suspension of disbelief is required to appreciate this book, and because I'm not usually a fan of "fantasy" novels, I had doubts when beginning to read it. But I was soon swept up in this fascinating work about two young girls and their saviors, a pair of Tasmanian Tigers. The first-person narrative and unique manner of speech (attributed to the girls' loss of the English language during their time with the tigers) cease to become off-putting almost immediately and actually become endearing (at least to me).This book is an adventure story, a love story, a story of loss and sorrow, and a. highly imaginative tale which succeeds on all levels. I read it in two days, slowed down by the need to sleep, and loved every minute of it.If you are intrigued by the possibility of humans living in intimacy with wild animals and being cared for by them, do yourself a favor and read this book. It will educate you (check out Wikipedia on Tasmanian Tigers), enchant you, and move you. Highly recommended.

I have a Hoover Linx that I have loved for several years. Thought I try this one because the reviews were good, and I was ready for a change. Sadly, this Rowenta was a HUGE disappointment. I'll list what I consider the pros and cons.PROS: Looks nice.  Charge lasts a long time.  Goes along a base board nicely.  Fits under most furniture.CONS: Once the long charge runs out, it takes overnight to fully charge it again.  There's no battery you can remove and charge. Instead, you have to plug the whole vacuum in, which takes a lot of room.  The vacuum is difficult to stand up. It's very unstable and you have to get it just right.  It's extremely difficult to maneuver unless you're going right along a base board. It requires a strong hand to guide it.  It's also difficult to empty the dust cup. I end up fumbling with it every time.  Then it's hard to get the dust cup back in place after emptying it..  The dust cup is much smaller than the Hoover Linx's.  After the dust cup has been emptied and the vacuum recharged, when you start it again, the smell (of dog hair in my case) is awful, and I'm guessing lots of dust is coming out along with that smell.  A second filter was supposed to be enclosed, but it was not.I definitely do NOT recommend this vacuum. I DO recommend the Hoover Platinum Linx.

I really like this lipstick for texture, feel, and lasting power. The case is especially nice because it feels solid, seems to be made of a sturdy metal, the finish seems lasting, and it closes with a resounding click. I don't think it's going to come open in your purse. Be sure you've pushed it all the way closed, which is not difficult.The only quibble I have (and the reason for 4 instead of 5 stars) is that the color you see online is not very representative of the color you will see on your lips. I like colors that are close to nude/natural but not so light that they're actually lighter than your lips, ala 1960's Twiggy. I've tried two colors now (Secret Desire and Natural Seduction... dumb names, right?), and they both looked like my kind of color, but on my lips, they are both too light.So when you choose your color, just keep this in mind. I haven't tried one of the deeper shades because (1) his lipstick is super expensive, and (2) I'm even more horrified of too dark than too light.I do encourage you to try Edward Bess, as the lipstick is pretty great if you do hit on the right color, and his foundation is really nice too, but also seems lighter than you might expect. Maybe his line is best tried in a brick-and-mortar store first.

I also (like another reviewer) read about this brush in a magazine and promptly ordered it because it sounded great and it was not expensive. However, it took forever, with the dryer blowing directly on the brush, for the orange indicator to show that it was hot enough, and then it instantly turned back to the orange (indicating it was not hot) as soon the brush wasn't blowing directly on it. Also, the bristles were very stiff and they caught in my hair.Not recommended.

I love the versatility of being able to buy inexpensive bands of different colors (or just because your old one is worn out). This band fits the watch, which is a great watch, and the band is actually labeled as a Timex product. The light beige color is just as shown online. You can also wash these bands, which helps if you get them really dirty.

I love Easy Spirit clogs, which are so comfortable, cute, and versatile, but I took a chance that the 9B might fit o.k. because they didn't have 9AA. Oops, they were definitely too wide, even with thick socks. Since it's hard to find AA sizes, and I can usually get by with a B or medium width, I was hoping these would be fine. They weren't, so I sent them back. Otherwise, they were great. That's why I gave them 5 stars instead of 4, because they are fabulous shoes if they fit, especially if you have problem feet, which I do.The color is unusual, with the "gold" being more of an olive green, but the "bumper" would definitely help keep the lighter fabric upper looking cleaner. I would have kept them if they had fit.Also, it's possible to find bargain prices on Easy Spirit shoes on Amazon, especially if you wear an unusual size or don't mind wild colors! Check it out.

I have liked YuBe products since I first became aware of them, so I thought I would love this lotion. It smells good (smells like YuBe cream/ointment), and it feels good when you put it on, but shortly thereafter, it doesn't feel like you've even put lotion on. It's winter now, so my skin is dry, and maybe that's part of the problem. I think this would be better to use in summer, when heavier lotions feel greasy.Just understand that it's very light and not very long-lasting. And expensive! Should be more moisturizing at that price.
This Denby Fire sugar bowl goes perfectly with the Denby Duet dishes, and I love the trio of colors. Denby is a great company, and the dishes will last forever, even with everyday use.

This is a perfect little holder for the amount of cream one person might drink in coffee in a morning, so you're not dumping cold cream in every fill-up. It looks great with the sugar bowl and the Denby Duets matching dishes.It doesn't have a handle, but it's actually easier to handle than if it did, I think. I'm not sure why they put the larger, handled jug in the picture. This one is the Little Brown Jug (heh heh heh).

Don't give up if you're looking for this cover still! I just got it (January, 2014) from a third-party seller and am super pleased with it. The design by Molly Rausch is wonderful, and the sage color is very nice. The inside is a soft fawn color and is very soft with a handy pocket. I am using it for my Paperwhite, which is smaller than a Fire, but the elastic bands hold it securely anyway. My only suggestion to improve it would be to have a way to secure it closed so that, if you drop it (and you will), it can't land on the front of y our Kindle.I love it! I don't understand all the negative reviews.

This pillow is very HARD, and the contours are minimal, much less than as depicted in the picture. I haven't decided whether I'll keep using it, but I would give it one star (or ZERO stars) for comfort. It feels like I'm lying on a  flat board. Since it's been so cold, I can't comment on how effective the cooling is, but it has not felt hot to me, like the brand-name memory foam neck pillow I've been using.I notice that the firmness evaluations from reviewers are very variable. Maybe this company should either have better QC or rate the pillows for firmness.

Sturdy construction,  quality fabric, adjustable fit. And it's for the Sox! What's not to like? Seriously, this cap is much nicer than the usual run of the mill sports cap. If you're a Red Sox fan, it's a must-have.

Highly recommended because these under-the-tongue, tiny little pills are so easy to take. They also taste good, like orange. I often just skip vitamins that are too big or taste yucky, and then they're not going to do much because I don't take them. And the dosage is high enough so that even if you only take one a day, they're good.

This is a small, attractive watch with Timex reliability and price, but it definitely doesn't look cheap. I also have the Timex Weekender watch and love it too, but this one is just a little more dressy. I wish it had the Glow feature like the Weekender, but it is smaller and that's probably limiting. The black face is a little bit harder to read than the white, in case you're wearing readers like I am.Highly recommended if you like the looks and if you have trouble finding watches small enough for your small wrists.

So happy with these shoes! In fact, I've already ordered another Easy Spirit clog in another color. The fit is great, true to size, and it's really nice that they offer 2A (narrow). If you have narrow feet, don't be afraid to try these. They're not extremely narrow, just enough that really helps with clogs, which can slip and trip you if they don't fit well.  I got the natural color, and it's a. nice neutral that can go with anything. I haven't taken these shoes off since I got them because they are so comfortable and still versatile enough for casual wear and comfy enough for house slippers! And they're cute to boot,  with a price that's niceGet them! You won't be disappointed!

This is a very nice band, fits the watch perfectly, the price is great, and it even fits my small wrists. The only catch is that I have been wearing it daily, and it has started to fray. I can clip off the frayed part, but I'm afraid to use fire to seal the end, which is usually the remedy for fraying nylon. It might work, but I'm a big chicken when it comes to fire.I do love my Weekender Timex watch, and I get lots of compliments on it. It doesn't look cheap, and you can buy bands of just about any color! The dial that can be lighted up is the best and most convenient feature ever!

I've tried lots of foot files, and some don't do anything and some are too rough. This one is just perfect, with a side for taking down the calluses and a side for smoothing. It even catches the filings. They are also compact and fit together securely and yet are easy to get apart.Highly recommended!

I have trouble finding glasses that fit snugly enough because I have a small head. I'm happy to say that these do fit me; however, they may not be large enough if you have a largish head. They are very well-made, and the lenses are optic quality.I bought them in the brown and am considering the other color too! Highly recommended if you like the retro look.

I felt that I had to give this book at least three stars since I'm sure it was fascinating to people who knew very little about sharks and were concerned mostly with descriptions of how humans are abusing and misusing them. I am a diver of many years and have always felt very lucky to glimpse a shark, although I have no desire to stand in a steel cage and watch great whites respond to the chum ladled into the water around the cage. I, like several other reviewers, was hoping for behavioral and physiological information about the "hidden world" of sharks, including facts that I wouldn't have been likely to have gleaned from any other source. In this, I was very disappointed.I have to admit that I found this book to be not particularly engaging. I read about half of it before deciding that, for readers who already knew lots about sharks, the proper star ranking might be 1.5 to 2 stars. And I quit reading.

This is an outstanding book about Bull Terriers/Mini Bull Terriers. Many breed books waste 90% of their pages on general dog care, health recommendations, feeding, etc., and actually have little to say about the specific breed. I was pleasantly surprised that this book covers the ground thoroughly, and although I am not an expert on Bull Terriers, I do feel that I learned a lot of valuable information from this book. I have a new Mini Bull puppy, and she's cute as a bug and I'm glad to have a source of information about the breed. They are unique, so I'd advise prospective owners to research the breed before plunging, possibly never to surface. :-)Another great book for BT/MBT owners is When Pigs Fly by Jane Killion, available on Amazon.  "Author Jane Killion lives with a house full of Bull Terriers and a very wise cat. She breeds and shows Bullies and has put 21 titles on her dogs in Breed, Obedience, Agility, and Rally." (Amazon blurb) Also highly recommended!

These shoes are great looking, and I love Merrell lace-up shoes, which can be tied to properly fit narrow feet. But this particular pair is AT LEAST one full size too large. I ordered a half-size down (from 9 to 8.5) as advised by the reviews, but it was still way too big. If you have a high instep, you will probably find the fit to be fine, but for narrow, flexible, flat feet, this shoe just won't work. I loved the looks, the color, and the nubuck, but I stepped right out of them when I tried to walk.

I learned the hard way that routers are easily fried by lightning while everything else to do with your computer is rarely hurt. This is the third router I've had to buy, and the reason I chose it was because it was identical to the one that just got electrocuted. Counterintuitive, you say? Well, maybe, but according to the local expert, all routers are susceptible to damage by lightning. The reason I got the same kind was that it had performed beautifully for the short time I had it, and I had just about killed myself installing it. I figured if I got an identical one, it would be really easy to slide it into the pre-prepared installation slot. And that turned out to be correct. It took maybe ten minutes to set this one up, whereas the other had taken me at least half a day of crawling around on the floor under my desk and trying to access the back of my desktop. (It's cramped.) If you are a techie, I'm sure you wouldn't have any trouble at all, but me... not so much.An excellent feature is a reset button on the router itself, instead of having to unplug and replug.The only reason I gave it four stars instead of five was the trouble I had installing it.

I have a couple of Miguel Ases earrings and love them. I thought I would love these too, but from the picture, I thought the outer circle of "blue" beads would be brighter blue. Instead they are more of a dull gray and just a little too subtle for what I wanted. Usually ME earrings are bright and sparkling and eye-catching, but these were less so. If you're trying to work up the nerve for a little "bling," these might be the perfect pair to start with. I absolutely do not mean that they aren't pretty and flattering! They are! They just weren't what I had in mind.

These fit me perfectly (true to size), they have fantastic room in the toe box without looking clunky, and the heel is narrow. I love the colors (grey/aubergine/vitamin C), and they look great on. The colors are toned down a bit by the grey, but the purple and coral really jazz it up. The base/sole of the shoe, especially in the rear, is wide and makes my whole foot feel stable and secure. There is lots of cushioning, which I really need, having lost all the fat pads in my feet.  They fit with or without socks, and the support feels really good. I hadn't bought Reebok in years but used to wear them all the time because they ran narrow. Now I remember why I wore them even before they made running shoes especially for women! (Yes, I know how antiquated that must sound to you youngsters, but it was true. If you were a runner, you just had to search for men's shoes that would fit.)Highly recommended for running, walking, and just casual wear.

My reason for only giving two stars is simply that the shoes, even though they were the right size, just didn't fit my feet. The arch support hit my foot in a really uncomfortable way. However, I have very flat feet, so that might not be a problem with someone who has more normal arches or even high arches. And the toe box, while roomy enough, somehow hit my toes wrong. Maybe that was related to the fact that the fabric that forms the front portion of the shoe was weird. It was puckered before I even put my foot in them. Maybe this was a defective pair, but both shoes were just alike.I did like the looks of the shoe, and the white sole stands out and looks cool. I love the way the Reebok ZigLite fits and was hoping that this one would fit the same way, but it didn't.I do have problem feet, so I'm thinking this shoe would probably be fine for most people. There was that problem of the puckering though...

I am very sorry to say that this book is almost useless when trying to find any given term. There is no introduction or explanation of any kind about its organization or how it can best be used. What you get is an incomplete list (and JUST a list) of various terms, supposedly arranged in alphabetical order; however, these are very confusing because you can't distinguish the indented ones that come under a topic name from the topic names themselves. If you look long enough, you will discover that at the top of the page, the original topic name is listed, but this is something that could have been explained in an introduction.And when I said "list," I did not mean a list of definitions. This is just a list of the terms themselves without any defining or referencing included. Also, the list is very incomplete, so that you definitely may not find the term you're looking for. I honestly don't see how this book adds anything convenient or helpful. Stick with your Stedman's, and you'll save yourself some frustration. I gave it two stars instead of one because you might get lucky and actually find a correct spelling or two. And I'm sorry that I can't tell you whether the spellings are accurate because I didn't use it enough to determine whether the spellings are always correct.

These glasses come in a small leather case (as pictured) that is easy to put in your purse and it doesn't take up much room at all. The red frames are very bright, very attractive, and look like quality. The lenses seem to be of high quality also. So why only three stars? Because by the time you've gotten them out of the case and unfolded them so that they are secure, whatever you needed them for (menu in dimly lit restaurant?), the moment has come and gone three or four times. The quality of the lenses and the red part of the frames doesn't extend to the mechanism of assembling them for use. The ear pieces are difficult to extend, and they seem too fragile to withstand much use. What I have discovered about "readers" is that ease of putting them on and off is high on the list of desirable traits. And these pretty and flattering glasses don't have that virtue. If looks are more important to you, then these are super cute. And cute is good.

If you enjoy pens that not only write beautifully but are also artistic with great design, you should love this Science pen with Leonardo da Vinci drawings on it. I would not call the color "orange" at all; it's more of a light tan. The pen is large and heavy, and I find that it's most comfortable to write with if you leave the cap entirely off. Leaving the cap on just adds to the weight and slightly throws the balance off for me.This is a pen that you will keep for life. It is most definitely QUALITY. Yes, a BIC is cheaper... in all ways.

I love Miguel Ases' work, but I didn't love this necklace. The "flowers" were much bigger than I expected and appeared cheap to me, so that the look was not at all what I was hoping for. This somehow didn't live up to the quality of his usual designs, at least for me. I think a close-up of an individual flower would be helpful for potential buyers.

These reading glasses are super cute and are made very well of high-quality materials. They seem to be a tiny bit wide for my face, but I do have a relatively small face. The leopard pattern is well done, with shades of orange ranging into tan and very dark spots: expensive-looking and classy. The glasses have a feeling of quality when you pick them up, and I think they will last for a long time, even with the constant on and off of reading glasses.The case is a very cute, narrow purse design with a snap closure. It's made of green/lime leather with a satin lining. The glasses fit in snugly and are well protected. I've gotten compliments just on the case! Shipping was fast. Highly recommended.

These glasses are very nice: super light, lenses you see over without too much trouble, very comfortable, and the "gator" color is subtle yet cool! They come with a plastic case so they can be carried in your purse without fear of damage. I really like them and highly recommend them.

I am admittedly a fan of Acme pens, and this pen with its QWERTY design is attractive and fun, especially if you work all day at a keyboard (is anyone out there still typing on a typewriter?). It is heavy and high-quality and writes beautifully. The design is appropriate for a man or woman or anyone who loves words and good pens, and not for someone who thinks rollerballs are for using until they're dry and then throwing them away. Or losing them.Refills are readily available on Amazon and many other places. This would be a perfect gift for a writer or editor or yourself. You won't be disappointed.

This is a large book in dimensions (not thickness), and the paper is heavy and of high quality. There are also lots of pictures, including x-rays and instructions about the exercises. Those are the reasons it's so expensive. This is definitely not a pamphlet that you pick up for free at the doctor's office.The information and instructions are very basic, and whether they would be helpful to you depends on what your level of knowledge is to begin with. Also, it's quite likely that whether you have inflammatory arthritis, e.g., rheumatoid, or osteoarthritis, your tendency to develop it is inherited, and you cannot really change that. These exercises are aimed at strengthening the muscles of your hand to provide as much support to the joints as possible. There is also commonsense advice, like don't use your hands to do heavy work, especially work that involves lots of twisting motions and repetitive small movements. These will definitely increase the work load on your joints and contribute to their deterioration.Recommended for those who would like to strengthen their hands and don't already have a fair amount of understanding.

I dearly love Acme pens and have several (want more). This one, however, is especially beautiful and done with the exquisite attention to detail of all Acme pens. If you prefer having Bics that don't break your heart if you lose them, then it's not for you. But if you have a great love of writing instruments like I do, then you can't go wrong with this purchase. The Deer Prudence is a very special design, in my opinion, and I'm very pleased with it.One word of caution for those unfamiliar with Acme pens: These rollerball pens are substantial, i.e., heavy, so if you think that would bother you, you might want to see one in person before ordering. It's all part of the quality inherent in Acme. Also, you can write with the cap either on or off the top end of the pen, and it definitely weighs less without the cap on.By the way, all Acme products write beautifully, and refills are readily available through Amazon or your local pen store (yes, you probably DO have a local pen store!).Highly recommended.

I agree with the 5-star comments of the other reviewers and would like to add my own. Everything they said was correct (about fit, comfort, looks), and some mentioned the fact that they were sturdy. But I have multiple pairs of reading glasses (having just gotten cataract surgery and being famous for losing things), and these are by far the sturdiest. When you are putting glasses on and off, as you frequently do with readers, they need to be up to the inevitable abuse. I actually have two pairs of these ICU readers, one green and one tortoise, and they seem identical except for the color. The green is really cool (my favorite) and quite subtle. Not "screaming lime" or something like that.One reviewers also said they seemed small. I'm not sure if he was referring to the size of the lenses or of the frame, but I have a fairly small head (hat size about 6 and 7/8ths), and they do fit me. If you had a larger head, maybe it would be a problem.Highly recommended.

I have lots of knit tops, and I forget about them if I don't see them hanging. So I decided that I needed to have padded hangers, and I got these. I was worried that they might be shoddy because they are so reasonably priced, but I got both the leopard and the zebra prints, and they are so cute and very well made. The "satin" is not slick like I thought it  might be, and everything I've hung so far has stayed on the hanger just fine.I think these will be a great gift idea for just about any female too. And I will probably get more. Highly recommended.They were also shipped very quickly and packaged very well.

I just got my green/teal band/mid-size Timex, and it's really cute and extremely functional.  As others have said, the watch face is easy to read because of size and brightness.  The band is very comfortable and even for my skinny wrists, it fits.  It's a little bit tricky to get the band buckled because it is very flexible, like trying to thread a wet noodle, but it gets easier with practice.  Because the band is nylon, it will last nicely, but if you handle rough things or work outside, it will definitely show wear.  I love that different color bands are available on Amazon.  Great just for fun, and also for when your band starts looking shabby.The watch face was a bit bigger than I expected, but it's not too big.  My wrists are very small, and the "boyfriend" watches look ridiculous.  The watch face covers my entire arm!I also like that the two keepers are stationary.  That way they don't keep sliding off the end that they're supposed to be keeping from coming loose.I know that kids today just don't wear watches because the time is available on their phone or their tablet.  I have a phone too, but I really like wearing a watch to know what time it is at a glance.  This one is cute and very, very functional.  I had an Indiglo back when they first came out, and then I didn't really see them anymore.  I'm so glad Indiglo is back.  It comes in handy way more than you would think.

I have to agree with Sunshine (one-star review) about the discomfort and rubbing that this sandal does to the feet.  The leather is thick and stiff, and it hits right on a very sensitive spot on my feet where I had surgery.  Admittedly, I have very narrow, very flexible feet, but normally a Birk 39N fits me perfectly (8.5 to 9.0 in US)and is super comfortable from the first try-on.  Also, since some reviewers have mentioned that the shoe was flattering, I have to tell you that it wasn't flattering on my feet at all, much less so than all of my other Birks (I have a lot in various styles).  It made my feet look very wide and ugly.I do think that if you could tolerate a break-in period, the leather would loosen up and come to fit your feet better.  And I'm sure it does look good on some feet.  (That's why I gave two stars, plus the fact that they were a fabulous buy.) But there was no way I could wear them long enough to break them in.  They just hurt too much.Also, in case you're looking for Soft Footbed in the Larisa, I don't think it's available.  I couldn't find any.  I did find the Narrow, but I had to look a while.

I have had several pairs of these scissors, and I have loved using them.  I have severe arthritis in  my hands and especially in my thumbs, and if the material I'm trying to cut is heavy, it's very difficult for me.  These solve the thumb problem, as they do the work for you.  They are very sharp and very pointed (not for children!), and they keep their edge well.  The weak spot is the spring, and it definitely wears out.  Then you can't lock them closed, which makes them a bit dangerous to store, and they quit working.If you are realistic about how long things last, you may consider this an acceptable bargain, but I just wanted to give you a heads up.  These scissors don't last forever, but they are excellent while they last.

I have tried various harnesses on my short, stout little Pug, but if they were big enough around her neck and chest, they were too long.  This Puppia sounded really cute and cool for the Texas summers, so I took a chance and it's great!  I got the extra large because her measurements are: chest 19", neck 17", weight about 17 lb.  Now would it be too long for her compact little/big body? NO, it was just right, and so easy to put on!  I hate to admit it, but some harnesses, with all their convoluted straps and buckles, take a long time to even get the thing on.  Lola cooperated well with this harness and just stepped into it.  Then she stood there like she was paralyzed and finally started walking backwards!  She walked all the way across the room backwards, and it was really funny.  She eventually figured out that she could go forward when I tempted her with a treat.I got the harness in purple, XL, and it's super cute and fits just right.  I also got the matching leash, and it was a great price too.  I was a little worried that they might not be very high quality because they were priced so reasonably, but they're excellent quality, and I'm very pleased with them.  They are definitely meant for smaller type dogs, so don't get one for your German Shepherd.  Even the XL is not going to work Plus, they're not meant for true obedience training.  But they're perfect for the casual walk about.  Highly recommended.

I ordered this for my 4 Chihuahuas and 1 Pug, and none of them would get on it.  The Chihuahuas weigh 3-4 lb each, so they could have fit on it, but they didn't even want to look at it.  Usually a new dog bed in the house causes a mad rush to claim it by the first one to fling herself upon it! Also, the seat cushion is really small and made out of very thin, fragile, slick material.  The Pug would have destroyed it in short order, even though she could never have fit on it (despite the fact that they show a picture of a Pug on it with plenty of room to spare).  When you squeeze the foam inside the couch frame, it sounds like that very dry kind of foam that tends to crumble.  I hate to say it, but in person, the whole thing looks cheap, despite looking really cute in the picture.  And I paid almost $50 for it!  Another disappointed reviewer said she paid $20.  Hmmm. I'm sending it back.Don't even think of getting this for a dog over about 5 lb.  And, just to be clear, it is made in China.

I had been searching for my size (39N) in Blackberry for months and finally found the AZ here! With really fast shipping, I just got them, and they are even cuter than I anticipated.  I agree with another reviewer that the AZ doesn't look too thrilling, but add a gorgeous color, and they sing!  Put your foot in them, and YOU will sing.  Ever since Birks became available in Narrow and with the Soft Footbed, they are my go-to comfort shoe, which actually means my go-to shoe period.  The only downside is that you may have trouble finding them.  Amazon has a really nice selection, and if you have a rare size, you'll also find some great bargains.  They're not cheap, but if you have problem feet, they're a bargain at any price.  The adjustability, the width choice, and the Soft Footbed are what insure a comfortable fit.  The footbed itself offers great support for your arch (or non-arch) and your whole foot.  Your size may vary from the sandals to the closed toe shoes, like the Boston, but if you know your size, then they run very consistently true to size.  I wear an 8.5 or 9 in US sizes, and a 39N in Birks, as some kind of vague guideline.  Don't necessarily believe the sizing charts that you will see.  You just have to try them on.Besides the SFB, which is SO much more comfortable than the plain cork, the suede is the most comfortable material because it is so soft.  I'm not sure it holds up as well as Nubuck or oiled leather, but if you take care of your Birks, they'll take care of you for a loooooog time, no matter what material they're made of.

I love these suede boots and have gotten so many compliments on them.  I wore them to the doctor's office and two of the nurses wanted all the details about where I got them so they could get a pair.  I originally tried on the smooth leather version, which was super nice but looked really dressy.  The leather seemed to be of very high quality, and they looked like they belonged at the polo club, which is not a place I frequent.  Ahem...  So I got the suede instead, and they look casual but nice.  They're also very comfortable, and they fit true to size, at least for me.  My feet are very narrow, so I usually try to buy lace-up boots, but this strap is a truly adjustable one (unlike the Velcro that always CLAIM to be adjustable but simply are NOT), and on the last hole, they fit.Highly recommended! Nice sole, nice arch support, quality suede, great comfort, and really nice looking!

I gave these very cute sandals only two stars because they really, really HURT my feet! I am so surprised, partly because I expected them to be just like Birkenstocks, and also because of the great reviews.  As soon as I put them on, they were KILLING my feet across the top of my foot where the buckles were.  I tried to feel underneath, thinking that surely something got bent under or something was caught, but neither was the case.  I had to take them off immediately because they hurt too badly to walk around in.  The leather NuBuck seemed high quality, the color was nice (but more of a light pink than peach), and they appeared to be well made.  The price was great.  But they really hurt me, so I had to send them back.They are unlike Birkenstocks in the footbed.  It is soft, but the toe ridge is different, and the arch is different.  The toe ridge didn't bother me, but the arch hit my flat feet in the wrong places and contributed to the pain.  It felt like something was under my feet, like a ball or something, but it was just the relatively low arch support, and it wasn't in the right place for me.  The real problem, though, was the buckles.I think I'm the exception because nobody else had a problem, but I promise: I am not making this up.  They HURT!

Having purchased some super Sebago shoes recently, I thought I would give these boots a try. They were a great disappointment. There's really not much to them: no support, no cushioned insole, just a very basic leather container for your feet. They do have the non-slip outer sole, just like the regular Docksides from decades ago. In fact, they ARE the Docksides (as they claimed) with a higher ankle. If that's what you want, you've found it. But I was expecting more. I guess I've been spoiled by all the wonderful boots and shoes out there today. As for looks, I would say they're cute. They don't look like the only place they belong is on a boat. They could easily be just a casual boot. If you have good sturdy feet that don't need support, I'd say these are a great bargain. This was by far the best price I found. As for fit, they were really too big for me (my feet are narrow), but I would say that they're pretty true to size, and there's lots of room in the toe box. But I'm returning them.

You know how people are always saying that the shoes fit so well that they tried them on and didn't take them off until they went to bed? Well, that's exactly what I did! These have to be the most comfortable boots I've ever had, and I've had quite a few. And I have problem feet and very narrow feet. The other reviewer says she has wide feet, and they fit her perfectly~ I can't explain that, but I have to attribute it to the EXCELLENT boot-making skills of Sebago. These boots are actually the boot version of the Sebago oxford, only with a slightly higher heel, and both the oxford and the boot are so goodlooking and so comfortable that maybe I'll never wear any other foot covering... just kidding, of course, in the summer I'll have to look for Sebago sandals.All kidding aside, these boots fit perfectly, look great, and are made to a high standard of excellence. The laces actually work (I hate the new trend of having laces that aren't actually functional), the insole is cushy (just enough), the leather is sturdy and high quality, the copper metal lacers and other metal trim are an added touch, and they come with ribbon laces or regular laces. I got the mahogany and love the color, sort of a mix of brown with black rubbed toe. They go with everything. In addition to all the above, I got a GREAT price from Amazon.

It took a while to receive this item,  but I'll definitely get more when these wear out. I had only used the ones that came with the device, and they wore out rather quickly. These really are extra coarse, more coarse than the coarsest one that came with the device, so they work well. I will be a little more frugal about how I use them, because it could get expensive buying replacements. But I definitely recommend them. They do just what they're supposed to.

These shoes are SO much nicer looking in person than in the picture. If you look at a pic of them in a lighter color, you can see the details better. However, the dark brown (there's also a light brown available) is a great color. There's really nothing it won't go with. It's almost dark enough to pass for black, and the "scuffing" (not really scuffing, but I think that look is the new style) IS black. I think these shoes are made every bit as well as men's shoes, the way shoes used to be made. They are quality all over: the leather, the dye, the sole, the heel, the fact that they come with ribbon laces and regular laces, not to mention that they actually are adjustable with the laces, unlike many of the new oxford styles that have FAKE laces and are not adjustable at all. Makes me mad because I have very narrow, flexible feet, and I need to be able to tie the laces really tightly. The insole is somewhat cushy, not much, but enough to be comfortable. Speaking of comfort, these shoes are so comfortable for me, and that's saying a lot because my feet are problem feet. I normally wear a 9, but I tried both the 9 and the 9.5, and I liked the room in the 9.5 better. I would say they run pretty true to size, but if you like your toes to have plenty of room, consider sizing up one-half size.I really, really love these shoes, and I'm so glad that Sebago, who's always been known for quality shoes, has decided to branch out a little. I'm even considering getting them in other colors. I think these shoes will last a lifetime if cared for in the old-fashioned way: a little polish and conditioner and brushing. They'll look new for years. I can't recommend them highly enough!

I got this cap for my son for Christmas, and I think/hope he's going to love  it as much as I do! The tweed is a great color: subtle enough that he won't be self-conscious but stand-out quality enough to be cool. It's clearly made with great care, with the old-fashioned hallmarks of a well-made hat. It's got quilted satin lining so you won't have hat hair, and the materials, the stitching, and the finishing is clearly done with great care. I honestly don't think you can go wrong with this cap.Oh, and it was also delivered very quickly and packaged well. Highly recommended!

This hat is made of really classy-looking material, the lining is quilted satin, and it is finished both inside and out very well. The colors are great: not too flashy but not too plain either. It would compliment most any outfit you wore with it: brown, black, grey, tan, you name it. I bought this as a gift (I know it's risky to even buy clothes for people, much less a HAT), and I'm so in hopes that he will fall in love with it. It's definitely expensive, but I was hoping that the expense meant it would be a really fine hat, and my hopes were met. It should last a lifetime with proper care and occasional dry cleaning. It also arrived very quickly, and I was concerned about that. It was packaged well, with paper stuffed inside to help it keep its shape.If you have a friend, husband, son, father, who likes to look good and has some flair about him, give him this hat. And if he doesn't like it, you can always wear it yourself! Highly recommended!

I've looked at these watches for a long time, and I finally decided the time was right when there was one offered at a great price that the box had been opened on. It was in "like new" condition, and it came in the Mondaine box with documentation, so I was pleased with my bargain.The watch is very simple but very eye-catching and classic. I got the red band, which really makes the second hand (also red) pop, but it would look great with the black leather band too. I have very small wrists, and it's always a concern for me whether the band will fit, but this one is perfect on the last hole. The leather band seems to be very high quality too. I hope I can get replacements for the band when this one wears out, as leather bands invariably do.Because my wrists and hands are small, I can't wear the currently popular over-sized watches (they look ridiculous on me and cover the entire width of my arm), but this one is the perfect size and is very easy to read. If the simplicity and looks of this watch appeal to you, I would definitely recommend it. The quality is very evident, and I think that you will find, as I did, that the best price is going to be on Amazon.Added on Nov. 18, 2012: I've had this watch for almost a month, and it has quit running! When I got it, it was already running and, of course, the box had been opened, as I knew. Seems that the merchant failed to shut the watch off when it was returned (or whatever) so it had obviously been running long enough for the battery to die. I still love the watch, and the low battery is part of the risk you take when you save money  with an open box. Now I'll have to replace the battery and see whether I actually saved money or not.

I got these blocks as a Christmas gift for my daughter-in-law who goes to a lot of effort to decorate their house for all occasions, especially holidays. She also likes to put up uplifting thoughts, etc., on the refrigerator door and other happy things throughout the house. I thought these blocks would be a great way for her to put up whatever she might like to say, whenever. I was a little bit surprised at how big the blocks were, so do check the dimensions so you'll know what to expect.These blocks are definitely quality items and not cheap, made-in-some-other-country junk. The printing on them is clear and looks quite permanent. The wood is nicely finished and very solid. I think they would be a perfect gift for just about anyone, including children who could stack them and build towers with them, and for adults who enjoy sharing nice thoughts with family members. The only caveat would be that for very young children, they would make great weapons for conking another kid (or the dog) on the head. However, at least there's no danger of these blocks being swallowed!I got the Add-On set because it has great symbols and also numbers and extra letters.BTW, these exact blocks are for sale elsewhere on the web, but Amazon's prices were the best. They also arrived super quick, although I did think they could have been packed better. The box was almost all the way open on one side. They had put some bubble wrap in the box, but it probably should have taped around the blocks instead of just placed in the box. And it needed quite a bit more bubble wrap than they put in. The blocks are quite substantial, and I think they just got knocked around during shipping, and the tape wasn't up to holding the box together with those blocks slamming around inside. Still, they arrived in perfect condition.

I got these jeans in onyx, and it's a very dark indigo that could almost pass for black. I haven't washed them yet, so I don't know if it fades badly or not, but I'll be careful to wash it with only other dark clothes. The waist is very high, coming up even higher than my natural waist line. That means no muffin top, and since I usually wear T-shirts or untucked shirts, it doesn't really matter to me, but it definitely is NOT a contemporary look. The other thing to know is that, while these legs ARE straight, they are NOT slender-fitting but instead are pretty roomy. Again, not contemporary but very comfortable, and the price is great. The fit and length are perfect for me, and they look nice on, looking almost more like trousers than regular jeans. If you work in a place where everyone is not terribly dressed up, you could even wear them to work.Considering both the pros and the cons of these jeans, I'd still recommend them for the fit, the comfort, and the price. Just know that no teenager would be caught dead in them. They'd definitely consider them Mom Jeans.

This is the prettiest bra I've ever had! I'd love to have one in every color. It fits perfectly, the lace doesn't show even under T-shirts, and (yay, yay, yay!) the cups are not lined with foam rubber, which is impossibly hot in the Texas summers. I got it in nude/ivory (the bra is one color, the lace is another), and it really is beautiful and very flattering. It's also super comfortable and the price is quite good, IMO. I highly recommend this bra and every Wacoal I've ever purchased. I wish I'd known about them long ago...

I am so glad to have found a company (Wacoal) that makes bras without the omnipresent foam cups! I'm not sure why padded bras (that's what we used to call them) took over the whole market niche of bras, but it's really hard to find bras without the foam rubber. Maybe it's because it makes sizing so much simpler for the manufacturers and for the consumer(no real matching of boob to bra necessary), but padded bras are real killers in the summer. It feels exactly like you're wearing a wet suit, and forget about the bra drying while you're wearing it. Now, finally, I find that Wacoal has a great selection of non-padded bras that fit me like a dream and are beautiful besides. I got this bra in light blue, which is really a pale aqua with chocolate brown lace around the cups. I realize that not all boobs are the same, but every Wacoal bra I've tried (four styles) fit me perfectly. It feels like coming home! Amidst all the surgically enhanced ladies, I'm not particularly big (36C) but there's no way I'm going without a bra, and I'm so glad to have found Wacoal. Shoes and bras: they GOTTA FIT!!I highly recommend this particular bra and also that you check out the entire line if you're in the market for bras. Be sure to read the description to find out whether they're padded or not. You can't always tell by just looking at the pictures.

This koozie looks just like a giant prescription pill bottle, made out for patient Mr. Hugh Jass. It's funny and it works to keep your drink cold. It comes up a tiny bit too high on the can, making it a little difficult to drink from the can, but not impossible. I gave a couple to my wonderful friends, a pharmacist and his wife. They got a big kick out of them.BTW, one reviewer complained that the koozies smelled bad. I have a very sensitive nose that is easily offended, and the ones I got didn't smell at all.

Nabob is my very favorite Tassimo coffee, and I was horrified when Amazon dropped it from Prime. Then for a while it was only available from a Canadian shipper (it's made in Canada), and the delivery time was ridiculously long (over a month!). When I last ordered it, it came from Florida and was delivered promptly, and I was very pleased. Now it's finally back on Prime and even available on Subscribe and Save! Yay! This coffee is just what I want coffee to be: smooth, mellow, neither burned nor weak, in two words: Just Right! Goldilocks and I agree that Nabob, indeed, is the perfect coffee!

I agree with the majority of other reviewers that this mouse is definitely worth the money. It works precisely, is easy to handle, the cord is generously long,and it couldn't be easier to get started with it (plug and play). The reason I didn't give it five stars is because it is extremely lightweight (which was considered a good point by other reviewers), which gives the impression that it was cheaply made and may not last. But that is strictly a personal impression and likely due to the fact that other mice (mouses?) I've had felt sturdier and slightly heavier. My wireless mouse had quit working (it never really was reliable [a Logitech]) and I didn't want to pay another high price, so this one fit the bill perfectly and I'm quite happy with it so far. You can't go wrong to give it a try.

These are great panties: cool, pretty, no panty lines, quick-drying, nice colors, high quality. Just be aware that they are VERY low-rise. ExOfficio  makes another style that is exactly like these but has a higher rise. I much prefer the higher rise, but if you like low, these are great. I had to give them five stars because they're my favorite panties except for the low rise. No sense in grading them down because I didn't read carefully enough.

I ordered this cap from the cafepress.com website but thought I was getting it through Amazon because they used Amazon's payment info. When I got it, the printing was WAY too light to read. It was not the Buddha cap, but a different cap in the retro vintage style. The lettering looked clear and bright on the online site, but it somehow missed "clear and bright" on my cap. So I communicated with the company, and they were extremely nice and said that I would receive a refund. Because it was personalized, they didn't even ask that I return it. So even though I'm rating the cap itself two stars (it was a nice cap except for the light printing), the company gets a thumb's up and FIVE STARS! Also, during the online chat, the rep was very responsive and polite and didn't make me wait 15 minutes to first get someone and then for every answer, like some online chats.Again, so you don't miss it in the middle of the above, FIVE STARS for cafepress!

The blazer deserves more than a five star. The cut is higher than common but looks great and professional for business or interview settings. The colors and pattern is bold but still casual. The shoulders are designed properly and sleeves  are the right length. I was extremely happy with the way it looks. I received this product at a discount one exchange for my honest review.

They are leggings but not see through so you do not need the longer tops. I think the print is hot but thats my personal opinion. I was very happy in the length and that it fits so well that I do not have to adjust it in anyway. There is no constriction while I am doing any activities. I am very pleased and wear this out and to the gym. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

This was pretty good. It contains a full on refresher from introduction to administration of justice to POST and forward. I covers laws regulations and quizzes on protocols. It prepared for every aspect that could be asked at the exam. I highly recommend this for those who need a refresher or prep for the exam. I showed it to a couple friends and we agreed upon it as very useful. I received this product at a discount or free in exchange for my honest review.

The book consisted of multiple choice, fill in , and hardcore problem solving questions. It was a direct and fast read which  progressed from easy to difficult. It provides the answers and reasons for each and every one of the questions. After running through it I found myself to be better prepared. It also served as a good refresher. I received this product at a discount or free in exchange for my honest review.

The mural was easy to apply  to the wall it was a 1-2-3 step process. I am extremely pleased how it actually  went. The look is amazing. I ended up  using that particular wall as a backdrop to my lizard tanks and it went fairly well. It captures that natural touch. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

This product received five stars because it passed all the tests that I put it through via use and inspection. The accents and threads do not teeter. The fit is accurate and the length is perfect. The laundering process went very well. I was able to use boots and regular shoes with these jeans. It was versatile with every top and jacket. Pockets are deep enough that my wallet and phone will not fall off. the design is extremely unique which seems to be a trend for VO. Very pleased once again. Excellent design and garment. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

Extremely simple and classic look that it blends with the console. It attached very well and did not bust my air vents unlike others. The magnets have a decent strength. It stuck my phone and I had full rotation view of my screen which is such a help when using the GPS aspect. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

It is a bit tight but super warm. The print itself it crisp and clear. I love the Cheshire Cat! It is long enough to wear with leggings. The sleeves are a bit long but that is a plus with the cold weather hitting us right now. Its front and back Cheshire Cat . I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This is a pretty nifty case. The case is on the phone and then it sticks to the other part that becomes a pocket. That is the coolest thing I have ever come across. I am more than pleased with this product! I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I was pleased that the directions were extremely simple and easy to follow. It created my iPad into a mini laptop that I could turn over and then flip into a book!  The keys are not close together and the iPad is held above the board so there is no accidentally key tapping. It lasts a good deal which made me very happy and recharging is easy. It connected in seconds which was another plus. It worked wonderful with my iPad Mini!

Very nice high quality set. I was extremely pleased in the manner in which it arrived. The material had absolutely no pulls or missing threads. everything looks extremely well done and sewn. I put it on and it fit rather well. Due to the nature of this clothing I am sure you can understand why there is no photo lol. It looks great either way for halloween and for nightly activities with the honey. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

The mask arrived in a foam encasement which was nice as it had travelled a very long way. I was extremely please to find that it in tact. It is very delicate. I would not suggest trying to stretch it or mold it to your face or force it as it may just break. the lace draw string are in tact and do not look as they would fall off. The design is different but unique. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

The jeans fit very nicely. I love the medium wash and the depth of the pockets. It is NOT a super skinny  it is exactly as stated a slim fit which is equivalent to body con dresses. It stayed put and there was no need to adjust : pull up or down. Looked wonderful. This is the first one of this jean style I have tried from VO Jeans and I am very pleased. These styles are not common where I live so its nice to standout in terms of upbeat  fashion.I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
