I am not much of a camel-tan color as my skin blends but this high-waisted design caught my eye. It fit perfectly from waist to thigh. It accented my waist and smoothed the rest which was a nice touch. The material is good quality as well. The buttons are nice and not gaudy. Survived the washer as well and they do not slide off. I am very happy. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

The material is well tightly knit. I love the thread coloring very neutral and compliments my medium skin tone. I found it interested how the keyhole was knitted. The arm openings are perfect in size and the length is good. It does hug the body but in a not so bad way. It accents what we women prefer to have accented which is a good thing. I wore to a couple small events and it looked wonderful. I can wear it with low and high heels, boots, and slip ons. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This would be my second or third time posting my review. I did the bag test and found that it was perfect for a student holding eighteen units in the sciences. Yes, those heavy books, binders, and laptops, and graphing calculators. There was also additional room to spare. The leather is smooth and does not look chemically treated. The zippers work and still do, all of them.  The hand strap works great and so the the arm strap. The thickness is perfect for carrying a heavy load. I am extremely please with this product as I use it to lug all my course materials on a daily basis. In addition it has that classic look so even a woman could carry it. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. I had early on submitted a video showing how many books fit but that as well was taken down. 100% my own words above!

The long blouse is not itchy material but it does sort of cling to the body. It is temperature resistant in the sense that I did not freeze while wearing this. It is not see through which is another plus. The color did not fade or bleed in the wash nor while I wore it. It is well designed  and looked great with leggings, shorts, and jeans. The neckline covers up to the collar bone which I thought was nice. I receive this product at a discount in exchange for my unbiased review.

16:49 Mins The Backpack has well made stripes and the leather accents ave it more of a good look. I put it to the test and was able to place a lot to items into the bag in its main compartment and in the out side compartments. The straps are adjustable and pretty thick. They will handle a lot of weight. Please view the video to get a better idea what fits.  I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

When i get to the gym my purpose it to push myself harder and harder to get that cardio going on. I do not want to workout just to know that I wasted my time. The only issue I have is that when I am working in the aerobic zone I tend to have issues recovering. This actually kept the plane balanced. Yes I was somewhat sore but I was not sore to the point that I was dragging myself from one place to another or smelled like Bengay. I also love that everything fits nicely into the zippered carry case, a nice bonus that none of my other compressors have. Very easy to use and has a powerful pump. *I received a sample of this item at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review*

This is a HUGE 60" x 78" (5 feet by 6 1/2 feet) poly-weaved (plasticy) mat that folds up nicely 10.5" x 15" for easy carrying/travel.  There are handles and a velcro closure strap and two side pockets for carrying extra small items (like the four included stakes).  The way that the stakes are made they can attach to the ground and the little piece goes over the mat to hold it down with pressure, rather than staking it through the mat.  The entire mat is nicely sewn on the edge so that is no ripping and tearing.  Easy to clean with a wet, soapy sponge.  When you get it you will need to air it out a bit, as it has a slight plasticy smell from manufacturing.Great for families that like to do outdoor things together like sports, plays, shows, music festivals, farms, picnics, the beach and so many other uses!  *I received a sample of this item at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review*

All of the similar back supports I have seen are a rigid plastic coating that isn't comfortable when you strap the support belt on, but this is all neoprene and is comfortable and flexible.  There are two sets of straps to get a really good fit, and extra support.  The material is breathable and won't make you sweat like other support belts do.  The belt and shoulder straps are completely adjustable to fit almost any size.  Using a belt like this helps take weight from your back and distribute it and also helps protect you from hernias.  It is exactly what I need when we get our 40' containers in and they need to be unloaded by hand.  Whoever is working on it can use the belt to keep themselves from getting injured.  Now I need to buy 5 more so all the employees can be safe!!!  *I received a sample of this item at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review*

Super cute rigid pvc bat wall decorations.  These come shipped flat bu you can bend up each bat wing so that it "pops" from the wall and looks more 3-dimentional than if it were just flat on the wall.  These vary in size and you can make any cute design on your wall for decoration.  Since they are PVC you can use them indoor or outdoor and are waterproof.  They come with 12 double sided sticky foam pads for a 1-time use.  You can easily buy more double sided foam pieces if you want to reuse them each Halloween.  If you get more than one package you can make a really elaborate wall design like the one shown in the picture.  I included a photo with a quarter in it so that you can see exactly how big they are.  *I received a sample of this item at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review*

I actually bought this in a size larger than I would normally wear because of the size chart saying that a size 8 to 10 is a large, but it was somewhat too large.  I would have preferred a medium after seeing how the large fit.  I really like the shirt but it is thin and somewhat transparent so you need to wear the same colored bra or skin colored bra....or a tank top underneath which is what I think I will do.  It is very silky and soft material.  It lays nicely on your body and feels very comfortable.  The material is 94% Rayon and 6% Spandex.  It IS hand wash only and hang-to-dry.  With your order you will get a cute nail file from the company (it's their "business card").  I love the shirt but if you order, definitely order a smaller size than the chart!  *I received a sample of this item at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review*

A very nice set that works great and comes with two great bonus items (a plastic serrated knife and a lid so that you can use the container to store food).  The salad spinner is three parts, the clear container, a green inside strainer that sits inside of it (but can be removed for washing) and the lid that snaps on and has little plastic nubs that catch the basket and are used to push the basket in order to spin and shake the water off the fruits or vegetables.  Once you assemble the three pieces all you need to do is add the washed items and then put the lid on and use the green handle to go in circles for 30-60 seconds.  To stop the spinning you can push the green button.  Everything is super easy to rinse off and clean.  The plastic is BPA free so you can feel safe putting your food into it.  I love it as much as my premium brand salad spinner!  *I received a sample of this item in return for an honest and unbiased review*

A surprisingly small shipping and storage size which is a HUGE plus in my small home.  Storage comes at a premium in my attic and this box makes it easy to store the entire tree in a small space.  The base is one connected piece that swivels into an X and uses three screws to hold it open to support the tree and hold the pole at the base of the tree itself.  There is a little shedding upon set up but it's nothing out of the ordinary.The tree comes in three separate sections and easily snaps together to make one large tree.  The arms are a flexible metal and come pressed together for shipping and need to be pulled out by hand and each little branch needs to be pulled and spread in order to "fill out" the empty spaces.  This process can vary in time depending on the look you are going for.  I'd say about 8-10 minutes to connect and stand up the tree and another 20-30 minutes to spread the branches to really fill it out as seen in the photo.  Any additional empty spaces can be filled easily with tinsel, garland, and ornaments.This is a 6' tree and would go great in a small house or apartment, or even a nice addition to your office at work!  In my townhome I am limited in space and this tree is going to make a GREAT surprise for the kids who have only had even smaller trees in the past.  The base looks a little sparse, I would recommend you get a Christmas tree blanket that goes around the bottom of your tree to hide the stand.I have included a couple of photos for you to see how it is shipped and how it looks put together (I didn't spend a lot of time spreading the branches but I will when the holidays come).  *I received a sample of this item in return for an honest and unbiased review*

This bag is a nice computer bag! To start, the silver colored hardware on the bag is heavy duty and well made. The zipper glides well on the zipper teeth and the clasps on the long strap (included inside bag) are sturdy while looking classy. The larger pouch is large enough to hold my 15" laptop with a plastic shell case on it. Right where the two handles are there is a slit to two "hidden" pockets that are the size of the bag, great for paper or cords.  The exterior zippered pocket is great for cords or earbuds other small accessories.  The design is stylish and the fabric is waterproof and feels durable. The construction and stitching are also strong and look to be very nicely made, the only problem I have with the item is that the two hooks that the shoulder strap attach to are plastic rather than metal.  The inside of the bag is padded well and has a soft plush lining (blue) to protect your computer from scratches or being banged up while carrying it. I've included some photos so that you can see the details up close. *I received this item in return for my honest and unbiased review*

I've had a plastic burger press for years and it finally broke on me recently so I was on the search for a replacement press.  What I really like about this press is that it is exactly the same size every time.  The last one I had you could vary the size because it was a deep press.  I do recommend greasing up the bottom part a little bit so that the meat comes out easily from the mold.  One of the things about this press that I haven't seen in a lot of other brands is that it gives the "grill lines" so that when the meat plumps in the middle it won't get super thick and look like a meatball.  The aluminum press is well made and looks nice.  The handle is wood and is screwed on tightly.  It's easy to use and really helps make nice, uniform burgers (nice for knowing that all your burgers will cook for the same length of time).  *I received a sample of this item at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review*

The apron comes folded up and sealed in plastic bag. The apron is cute and nicely made.  It is actually a pretty durable poly-cotton material, and seems like it would be durable and last a long time.  This stylish kids sized apron is "one-size-fits-all" that has a strap around the neck and a tie closure around the waist.  The hat is really cute and looks like a real chef's hat.  The hat has a velcro closure so it will fit any child's head comfortably.  It is really cute for a kid to use for holiday cooking, really helps them get in the spirit of fun in the kitchen.  *I received a sample of this item at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review*

Very nice! These are like lightweight knit socks with the tips of the toes cut off at about the half way point.  The bottom is lined with grippy bumps on the soles of the socks which help you stay put in the different yoga positions. They are comfortable to wear and really make the "downward dog" pose easier to stay in for a longer period of time!  These are stretchy so they will fit a variety of foot sizes.  There is a tighter band in the center of the foot at the arch for added support.  They come in a cute color selection, too.  Very nice!  *I received a sample of this item at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review*

This case reminds me of an OtterBox case because it has several layers of protection.  The inside case has a top & bottom and then there is a rubberized layer that goes over that.  The carrying cover has a clip for your pants and offers easy pop in or pop out for the phone.  The back of the phone case has a ring that swivels any direction for you to be able to prop, hang, or lean the phone on any surface for better viewing.  The case is very sturdy and really protects your phone well.  There are holes for the cameras but the side buttons are covered with little button covers and any access ports have a flip open area in the rubberized coating.  A very solid case, highly recommended to protect your investment!!!  *This product was provided to me at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review*

This is a great starter racket for kids!  The frame is sturdy and the netting is firm and gives a good bounce to the ball.  The frame is a little oversized for kids who are just starting and may have a harder time with coordination.  The smiley face on the racket is cute, as are the bold and bright colors along the outside of the frame.  The handle has soft but grippy tape on it and is comfortable to hold.  The weight is also good for younger kids, it's not very heavy.  Overall I am very pleased with this racket!  I also purchased the matching bag!  *This product was provided to me at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review*

This laundry sorter comes in a plain brown shipping box and needs to be put together before use.  Each grouping of items (poles, sides, wheels, etc) comes sealed together in a plastic bag to protect them from getting scratched or damaged before opening.  There are detailed instructions that are very easy to follow and pole is marked with a sticker which makes it easier to figure out what goes where.  It's a pretty simple procedure to put the unit together.  You should definitely plan on having about 30-45 minutes to put it together.The quality of the pieces are very nice.  The poles are hollow but are sturdy pieces of metal, not flimsy at all.  There are little plastic caps to protect the pieces from being metal-on-metal and prevent scratching between pole and the sides.  The wheels are solid and heavy duty with swivel locks on the sides.  The laundry bags are very nice and thick material and the poles that hold the bags have rubberized coating so that you don't get that metal-on-metal scratching on the top either.  They are a little darker brown in person but they are a neutral color so they match just about any decor.The poles that support the bags slide in and out of the cloth laundry bags which is a great feature that makes it easy for you to wash the bags with your laundry.  There is a mesh metal shelf along the bottom so that if your bags are heavy they won't sag and pull on the stability bars.  I also like that there is an extra bar midway down the back side of the sorter which gives it a much better support than I've seen in other laundry sorter units.This would be great in a bedroom or in a laundry room.  You could use it to sort colors, or if you prefer you can sort clothes based on who's they are.  In my family we would need one more bag (as we are a family of four) if we were to sort it by person.....but I think I would prefer to sort laundry by using one bag for towels and sheets, one bag for light colored clothing and one bag for darker colored clothing.  I saw one reviewer said that this was small but it is NOT small at all, it is much larger than the one I've been using for years.  I have a large capacity washer/dryer and each bag is about one large load.This is a GREAT sorter and it is much nicer than others I've seen (and MUCH nicer than the one I currently own).  I have included many photos of details for you to get a closer look.  *I received a sample of this item at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review* and absolutely LOVE it!

Elegant, stylish, sleek. This "rabbit" style wine bottle opener is really well made and all of the mechanics are made from metal rather than plastic. It is SO easy to use once you pop off the three plastic protectors, all you have to do is pull the top bar up, open the two side bars and insert a bottle (with the foil already cut off with the foil cutter included) and the squeeze the two side bars and press down the top bar down. Once in the down position you pull it back up and you are done!This is the easiest bottle opener I have used. I have tried the pressure "popper" opener which is easy to use but needs frequent, expensive cartridge changes, an electric opener which is easy to use but incredibly bulky and needs to stay on the counter for charging, and old fashioned corkscrews which are difficult to use.The bronze finish is very attractive and looks so much nicer than plain steel. The box is beautiful and great for storing the wine bottle opener. I'm SO happy with this set! *I received a sample of this item at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review*

I LOVE this ceramic tourmaline flat iron! It comes nicely packaged and has a storage bag with an insulated carry drawstring closure. The iron's heat is fully adjustable up to 400F (professional level heat) which can be adjusted by using the dial on the inside of the iron. Another professional feature is the heavy duty, fully rotating cord swivel at the end of the iron. The cord is a long and heavy duty cord so that you are not tethered to the outlet. There is a hook at the base which can be used on a hook for hanging storage. The iron did a great job at straightening my hair and making it look silky and shiny.  The iron also has a bonus of a glove to keep your hand safe from burns while using the iron.  *I received a sample of this item at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review*

This is a nice, comfortable neoprene case. The inside is a silky smooth stretchy neoprene and the outside is more durable plastic which is stitched together well. There are a few nifty features on this case, Two holes at the bottom for cords (I suppose it's for the charging cord and headphones) and a long slot at the top to put your phone into the case. There is a smaller hole in an area on the side to hold a key or two. There are two slots for when you wrap the band around your arm and slide it through to velcro, I suppose this is for varying sized arms. The closer slot would be used for a tighter fit. There is also an individual slot to stick a license or credit card that is also tucked under the backside. Overall it's a nice case and is well constructed. *I received a sample of this item in return for an honest and unbiased review*

I have been looking for one of these for a long time and I am so excited to have found it! This looks like a normal ear warmer that you would wear in the winter when it's cold outside but because it's made out of lycra it is actually even better for using when you are running. Inside the headband there are two super thin, somewhat soft speakers that lay right where your ears are (you can move them around if you need to)! They have a really good sound quality, with a good balance of bass and treble. The wires come out of the back side and connect together at a small plastic toggle where it then is one single wire and offers a good amount of cord distance to plug into your phone and put in a pocket or an armband. The cord is also a braided cloth which helps keep it from tangling and cord breakage. You can wear it anywhere but I specifically need it for all the cub-scout campouts, sleepovers, running, and vacations. They are very comfortable and I absolutely LOVE them! *I received a sample of this item at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review*

The sound quality is VERY good.  The headphones are foldable on both sides for travel and it includes a nice zippered carry case.  The headphones are comfortable and stylish.  I LOVE the control pad.  The headphones come with complete instructions and it only takes a few minutes to set up the bluetooth and begin using them.  I LOVE how comfortable they are, the earpieces and head band are fully padded and are fully rock to adjust to your ears/head.The headphones come with two cords.  One cord hooks up directly to an earphone jack and the other is to charge the headphones with a USB charging cord.  I am VERY pleased with the sound, the level of bass and treble are balanced well for a powerful sound.*I received a sample of this item in return for an honest and unbiased review*

This is a pretty cool looking bluetooth mouse.  The design is sleek looking and some of the features are pretty cool including the roller and up/down button near your thumb that will switch between programs or between pages on the website.  Because the mouse uses such a small amount of energy the single AA battery should last a year!The mouse feels comfortable to use and because it is a laser it is easy to use once you put your AA battery in.  Setup was a breeze.  Instructions and warranty card are included.  *I received a sample of this item at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review*

These are so much cuter and brighter than your typical Christmas/holiday lights!  There are 50 brightly lit purple colored LED lights that run on solar power! No plug needed!!!! With each full charge (6-8 hours charge time) you get 8-10 hours of light. There is 21 ft including a 5ft lead line and the lights either flash or stay on.  They are weatherproof so you can use them safely outdoors in your trees, bushes, or attached to your home. There is a stake included if you want to mount the solar panel. I was able to attach it at the top of my by wrapping the wire around in a way that holds the solar panel facing up. It needs to face the noon-sun for best results. LEDs have such a long life, I am very excited to have this nice set! *I received a sample of this item at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review*

These are very cute and come nicely packaged in a ziplock type bag.  They fit the fitbit nicely but the band isn't quite as nice as the real band that is made by the fitbit company.  The buckle is metal and there is a little wrap that holds the end from popping up.  The designs are even prettier in person, the colors really stand out and are much prettier than the standard black band that the fitbit comes with.  Both bracelets are a smooth plastic, not that grippy type.  They are also good at repelling sweat on the outside.  On the inside there is an opening which is used for sticking the fitbit inside but it is still open to sweat.  *This product was provided to me at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review*

These are a cuter version of the metal hair clips I used to use as a kid!  The metal sort of pops forward to release and backwards to "hold" the hair in place.  It is easy to use on kids hair which is great because they don't really like you fussing a lot to use hair ties and regular plastic barrettes!  The designs are cute and each color comes in a matching pair.  They are not only cute and colorful but they are sparkly, too.  Every girls favorite feature!  Both the hearts and cats are cute designs and the color variety is perfect.  *This product was provided to me at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review*

Cute concept and great execution.  The little "capsules" have charcoal in them to freshen/purify and absorb moisture from stinky & moist environments.  The capsules also have a scented freshener in the middle which you can control the power of the scent by unscrewing the capsule a little or a lot depending on how much scent you want your shoes to have.  It's a fresh scent, much like cotton or powder, not flowery or perfume-y at all.  I got these for my teenage son to use in his expensive pair of shoes to help make them last longer.  He says they work well and help eliminate the bad shoe smell (sweat, ick!).  *This product was provided to me at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review*

These little solid nerf-type refill balls are perfect for your nerf guns!  This is a nice back-up stock for when you lose the original balls that the gun came with.  They are solid enough to be shot out of the gun but soft enough that they won't hurt upon impact.  They are bright yellow as shown on the stock photo but I have included a couple of pictures so you can see them a little closer/better.  They have dimples like a golf ball.  The 100-count package of balls come sealed in a ziplock type bag for easy storage.  *This product was provided to me at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review*

Perfect rack for cooling cookies and other baked goods and is a generous size with lots of room to lay out big batches of baked items. There are three wires that are curved to act as legs to raise the rack off the counter for good airflow. The rack is sturdy and doesn't bend under pressure, and lays flat and is a bit raised in the center for support. The rack is oven safe if you decide to use it (up to 500f). The rack is also dishwasher safe but I usually just clean it with soap and water. It is stainless steel so it won't rust. If you ever have any problems it is backed by a lifetime warranty! *This product was provided to me at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review*

This is a huge, heavy battle rope that is used with a circuit for an intense arm/shoulder workout.  It sounds easy enough, you wrap the middle around something and grab a hold of the rubberized grip handles and whip them up and down but after about 20 seconds it burns and is very challenging to continue.  In my circuit I use it in 30 second intervals between other exercises....it's so intense I can barely continue.  My arms and shoulders feel sore.  The weight and motion really work for an all over muscle work out.  The material seems durable and well made.  It ships in a BIG box and is very heavy.  A GREAT fitness tool to have!  *I received this item in return for an honest and unbiased review*

The charger is 3000 mAh which should be good to charge almost any phone at least once when you are running out of battery. The charger comes with it's own charging micro-usb plug at the top to just pop into the phone.  This will NOT work with an iPhone.  The charger is nice and compact, you can almost fit it in your fist, great for sticking in my purse (or glove box). It's lightweight, 2 1/2 oz.  I also like that the charger attaches right to the phone and you can use the phone while it's charging. *I received this item in return for an honest and unbiased review*

This is a nice neoprene case. The inside is a silky smooth stretchy neoprene and is stitched together well. There are a few nifty features on this case a long slot to put your phone into the case and a smaller hole in an area on the side to hold a key or two. This is fully adjustable for varying sized arms. The key feature with this running band that sets it apart from other running arm bands is that it will fit an iPhone 6 with a large case on it (otterbox and lifeproof, among other larger cases).  Overall it's a nice case and is well constructed. *I received a sample of this item in return for an honest and unbiased review*

This is a black pair of tweezers with a silver angled tip. These work great for tweezing your brows. The tips of the tweezers line up well and each time you use it you get the intended hairs. There is a good weight to the pair and it feels comfortable in my hand when using it.  Definitely the nicest tweezers set I've ever owned! *I received a sample of this item at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review*

This battery is 10,400 mAh which will charge my iPhone 6 SEVERAL times! You can use any charger/phone combo as long as you have a USB charger for it to plug into the unit.  It comes with a micro usb to usb cord for charging the unit.  This is a thick charger that fits in your fist and it's not so big that you can't carry it around in a purse, carry-on luggage, or a backpack. There is a hole on the end that you can use to attach a wrist strap (not included) This is a great unit to buy as a back up for power outages or long travels so you don't have to continually find wall plugs in airports!  *I received a sample of this item at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review*

I love these things!  I have one in the back room and one in the front room (both have entrances). They make NO audible noise when plugged in but bugs and other pests can hear an ultrasonic sound and it helps keep them away.This brand in particular has settings that my other pest control units don't have.  On the side of the unit you can choose the pitch and the range of the unit.  On the other side you can choose the output and turn on the floor light, which acts as a nightlight in the dark.I've always found that these units are helpful to have so I bought several for our house, including this one which really is the best one I've ever seen. It's easy to use, and I prefer to use these over stinky sprays to ward off bugs (this time of year there are all sorts of creepy crawlies looking for a home! *I received a sample of this item at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review*

This bag is very big and VERY nicely made and looks & feels even better in person. One my favorite features about this bag is the plastic "feet" on the bottom of the bag. The feet make the bag stand a bit higher than whatever surface you put it on which I love because that means it will pick up less dirt and germs and keep my bag nicer, longer.The inside has SO many pockets, it is wonderful for keeping everything organized.  Four Outside Pockets: One front pocket, two side pockets, one back pocket. Seven Inside Pockets:One zipper pocket, three pockets, two insulated bottle pockets, one cell phone pocket, one key ring.  The bag has two shorter handles (still long enough for wearing on your shoulder) and included and optional adjustable carry strap which is stored on the inside upon shipping.  The flap over the top is nice for keeping your stuff safe inside and seals with a magnetic closure.The bag is very nice and all of the zippers, clasps and buckles seem to be sturdy and well made.  The design options are really cute and the bag is big, but still light enough that you want to use it (1 1/2 lbs before you add anything to it).  Inside is a matching, padded changing pad and a reusable plastic bag for wet clothing or to store a dirty diaper until you can get to a trash can.I took some pics so you can see all of these great details. The bag is a generous size and holds a ton. The polyester exterior is easy to clean off with a cloth and some soap and water. I really like this bag!!! *This product was provided to me in exchange for an honest and unbiased review*

This is a great all-in-one system! There is a lens for every activity and environment! The glasses come with 5 interchangeable single piece lenses that are very easy to switch out. While they are intended to be "cycling" glasses, they are certainly good for so many other activities & even everyday use.  The nose piece is rubber coated comfortable on the bridge of your nose. The lenses are very easy to change out and there is a booklet that comes with the glasses to help you pick which environment to use each in.These glasses are very sporty looking. I think they look better on a mans face but certainly any woman could wear them comfortably. The lens wraps around your head and since most of the glasses have no frame there is no real interference in your view. The wraparound lens is nice because there is no sun peeking in around the edges....perfect for people playing sports! The color of the frames is nice and the look and style really changes when you change the lenses. 100% UV400 Protection Coating is great for the health of your eyes. The kit also includes a sunglasses cord that can be attached and worn so that if the glasses fall off of your face they won't fall to the ground.  But, if they do, they are shatterproof!The hard shell carry case has a zipper and a clip on them so that you can hang it on a backpack and the glasses will be safe & well protected. The thinner, drawstring cloth bag is good for using inside of a gym bag or a purse. Protection from scratching but not as solid as the hard-shell. The cleaning cloth is handy to keep with you in any travel bag for cleaning the lenses without scratching them.I have included some detailed pictures of the glasses and accessories. *I received a sample of this item in return for an honest and unbiased review*

While they are intended to be "cycling" glasses, they are certainly good for so many other activities & even everyday use.  The little inner clear plastic frame is completely removable. Super cute kit that comes with the case, cloth drawstring carry bag, lens cleaning cloth, and the retro 80's glasses!  These are super cute in my opinion and would look great on men or women.  The glasses are comfortable to wear and look good on both me and my husband.  They are dark enough to really block a lot of light and I love that they are UVA & UVB protected (100%). Super cute set of chalkboard stickers! There are six sheets of 8 stickers, all die-cut in different shapes (meaning there are 6 of the same die-cut if you take one from each page that match). They are easy to write on with the chalkboard pen and you can also find additional colors in any craft store.I use these on my plastic storage bins for organizing and easy identification without having to open them. I also have them on some of my glass pitchers and jars in my kitchen just because they are adorable. I also use them on my food storage pieces that have flour, sugar, coffee-mate, and powdered sugar so that I can see at a glance which is which!There are SO MANY creative uses for these! I love that there are so many designs to choose from. The sticky adhesive is great. I'm very excited to find new uses! *I received this product at a discount in return for my honest and unbiased review.*

Exactly what I was looking for!  I love trying new foods and am always interested to make some of the recipes but ethnic food isn't always available in traditional American cook books.  This book not only has just about every Korean food that I've tasted before, but, also offers a chapter on tradition and culture of Korean food preparation and serving, and even a little bit about table manners!The 135 recipes themselves range in difficulty from easy to complicated, but most seem to be on the easy side.  Each recipe gives you a "prep time" and a "cook time" so that you know before you begin what to expect.The only thing that the book lacks is photos of the finished product.  The image on the front is nice and I would love to see what it is that I will be cooking, especially when some of the items I have never seen, nor heard of.  *I received a sample of this item in return for an honest and unbiased review*

Acid reflux is also known as heartburn.  If you suffer from acid reflux (heartburn) you know that what you eat can cause flare-ups.  This book helps you choose foods that are low-acid and low-fat which are common triggers, in an effort to help ease the flare up of acid reflux and GERD.The book starts with an introduction to what it is that is actually happening in your body and why this happens, and includes a lengthy list of neutral foods that are "safe" foods (as opposed to acidic foods).  There are also other lifestyle tips and tricks to helping eliminate the symptoms and a list of homeopathic tricks to help you with immediate heartburn relief.The book includes over 100 reasonably easy recipes and a two week meal plan which can get you on the path of eating the right foods to reduce flare-ups.  There is also an appendix that offers the PH balance of many foods, and another which talks about what to expect from an ENT or gastroenterologist doctor appointment.  Very helpful information!This is a very helpful book and the recipes really cover every taste.  *I received a sample of this item in return for an honest and unbiased review*

Very cute for little kids.  The colors are bright and look like graffiti, as shown in the photo.  The main compartment is thin, designed for a tennis racket to fit in.  The compartments have one zipper so the racket handle pokes to the left side when you zip it....if it had 2 zippers the design would work better for having the racket handle straight up.  The second, mouth shaped zipper compartment is bigger, for storage.  You can throw a sweater or shoes into that section.  There is also a smaller zippered compartment for little things like a small towel or other little accessories.  The arm straps are padded for comfort and there is a hook strap for carrying or for hanging. Really cute just to be used as a regular backpack, too....doesn't have to be for tennis.  *I received a sample of this item at a discount in return for an honest and unbiased review*

This badge holder is very nice for attending expos or for holding your work ID on a daily basis.  The color is a little darker than shown in the stock photo, but I personally think it's nicer.  The ID is leather and the lanyard is a well made, woven polyester.  The lanyard is detachable by squeezing a plastic clasp and has a metal closing clip to hold the ID holder.  There is also a thin black cord which you can use to attach other accessories such as keys or even a cell phone....the clasp on that is also detachable.  The badge holder has a ID card slot and a slot on the backside too to keep another ID, credit card, or any other card.  The stitching is nice and the holder and lanyard seem to be durable and well made.  I am very happy with this ID holder!  *I received a sample of this item in return for an honest and unbiased review*

While I understand the "beauty" effects that this pillow case claims to offer, I just like it because it is so smooth and comfortable and feels great to sleep on.  The pillow comes in a pretty gift box that includes a little drawstring bag with other color samples and an actual silk moth cocoon.  The pillow case is neatly folded and wrapped in plastic.  Once I took it out I saw that the top side is silk and the bottom is cotton.  As other people have mentioned in their reviews that they feel that this is a method to "cut corners" while in fact it is not.  Anyone who has had any experience with silk pillows would know that silks is very smooth and pillows tend to slide inside.  The reason that the bottom of this case is cotton is so that the case doesn't slide around.  I do like that there is a zipper to close the pillow so that it doesn't slide out.  It is incredibly nice and so soft and comfortable to sleep on.  *I received a sample of this item in return for an honest and unbiased review*

Update 06-17-15 => I just added the following to my pump.Etekcity Wireless Controlled Electrical Switch Socket Outlet with Remote (Battery Included)It was $11.99 for a single on/off remote control and works thru walls up to a 100 feet. It is awesome! The reason I decided against a phone app is because I didn't want to look for, or grab, my phone every time I needed hot water for my showers. Plus I am not going to make my house guests download an app hahaha. Good Luck !-------------------I had house guests arriving, so I could not receive this in time for my plumbers' arrival, so I had to buy it at Home Depot (same price). Don't hesitate, this pump is amazing! The plumber installed the pump on top of my water heater and the comfort valve in my upstairs bathroom. There is a clock on the pump. You can set it to be off (and the water heater works as before), 'on' all the time or set the timer to the positions that you want hot water. With a horrible drought in California I needed to at least try to do something. Before the pump, I got hot water at all my faucets quite fast but it has always taken over 10 minutes for the showers. That's a lot of wasted water. I now turn on the pump before each shower. Either by an APP on my phone or physically at the pump. I NEVER wait more then 20 seconds for hot water in the shower. The $215 (including tax) is a lot of water charges where I live, so it does not make sense financially. I had it installed because I wanted to help out with the drought and for my personal convenience. Good Luck !
Love these shorts. They are so comfortable to wear around the house. Good Luck !

Sweet! I am so happy I bought these 2 batteries and charger. They are small and when I know I will have a long day I put the second battery in my pocket for insurance. It has NFC and the build quality appears to be well done. Good Luck !

Wow I need to get out more...I had never heard of a pop up drain. For those that do not know what a pop up drain is...it just means you push the drain itself to go up and down. This drain is dark antique brass and really works well. I am very very pleased. I had rust around the old drain and I thought I would have to buy a new sink. This drain is big, it completely fills the hole, and it covered up all the rust (most drains are smaller then the hole). I am one happy customer. This matches the faucet I bought from the same company. I highly recommend this drain. Good Luck !
I am still very pleased with the Amazon Fire TV.

Insanely cheap so I bought it, yet I was suspicious. The plumber immediately said, Wow what a nice faucet! He installed it and it works perfectly. It is well designed and good looking. FYI this is a dark antique brass finish NOT shiny brass. My last faucet had round handles and hard to turn off while brushing my teeth. This faucet can be easily turned off with the back of your hand. For those of you curious about how it is so inexpensive, I have a theory. I think the faucet is not as stout and big as most faucets therefore less brass and less expensive. Because there is NO drain lever behind the faucet I also bought the pop up drain and it is also awesome. Don't hesitate, if you like how it looks just get it. Good Luck !

It has been giving me 17 hours a day of charge and I am a heavy user. It's at least double the thickness FYI. I also added blue painting tape to the back of the phone cover because it is very slippery. If you need a longer lasting battery this is the ticket. Good Luck!

Update 08-31-2015 - I doubt people are still reading my watch review but if you are I have now lost 50 pounds using this watch. It is not a magic watch it just makes you more aware. And second, people keep asking me when the phone notifications are coming. Polar recently sent this internal message to all watch owners. So here is the news and Good Luck!' Coming soonAndroid Smart NotificationsHeads up Android users! Weve continued to work really hard during the summer to get the Smart Notifications to your use and were excited to let you know the wait is almost over. Now were at the point where we need to do a few final test rounds and try to nip those nasty bugs out before we can launch the notifications for you guys as well. If all goes as planned, we expect to be able to bring the Android Smart notifications to the first Smart notification supported device during September. Then, well continue to gradually update the other supported devices in the upcoming three to four months following the first release.Team PolarTags: Polar A300, Polar FlowApp Android, Polar Loop 2, Polar M400, Polar V800 'Update 07-30-2015 - I am down 40 pounds now, what a relief! This watch and MyFitnessPal continue to amaze me. Technology is awesome how both programs sync between each other. I now have 6 watch bands and change them daily. Since I go to the gym and do several things I just start the recording on 'Circuit Training'. I turn it on when I start working out and stop it when I get home. That's about when my heart rate has dropped to normal hahaha. If you are serious about loosing weight and want to move more get this watch. Also use MyFitnessPal to help you count calories. It is a free app for your computer and phone. However I got the paid version. In my opinion it is faster and a better experience. Good luck !Update 05-15-2015 - I am down 27 pounds now, WOW! I love this watch and the app MyFitnessPal. The watch battery lasts 28 days on one charge. I have been more active since I got the watch and I pay more attention to my sleep. I know it is not an Apple Watch but in my opinion it is much better and functional.Update 4-23-2015 - I have lost about 15 pounds already using this watch and MyFitnessPal. I called Polar today to clarify some things. I hated turning on and off the exercise recordings for each exercise. Then it dawned on me, you don't have to. The guy at Polar told me that I was correct. The different types of exercises named in the watch are for those that like a breakdown of each exercise. I don't. He said they are simply 'labels' but each exercise is calculated the same way, by heart rate from the chest strap. So I took all the labels off my watch and just added one and called it 'workout'. So now I can do the bike, treadmill, weights and walking around the gym with just one recording.I also discovered that once your IOS device has your Bluetooth information you don't need to add it again even if it doesn't look connected in your settings. So if you use the Polar Flow app and the MyFitnessPal app this is what you do to update the apps. Simply open your Polar Flow app and push the bottom left button on your watch and let it sync all the watch data to the app which will also update MyFitnessPal app automatically. Now this is the catch, if you don't walk enough or workout enough, the calories that MyFitnessPal said you had for the day will change up or down when you sync the watch to the programs.Update 4-9-2015 - Well I still love this watch. I seem to be getting 28 days of charge. But it is hard to tell because every few days I take it off to update it on my computer, but only for a few minutes, and it is still fully charged. Yes I could do all that by Bluetooth but I am old school. It also seems to work well with MyFitnessPal. It syncs to that program which is awesome for trying to loose weight. If you use MyFitnessPal I suggest you enter all your foods nutrition values manually the first time so you have an extremely accurate calorie count. I have already lost 10 pounds. Yeah!I have noticed in the reviews that some people are wearing the chest strap all day. During the day the watch is a fitness tracker (pedometer, sleep monitor, vibrate to get up and walk). You only wear the chest strap during exercise whilst you record it. Polar does not make that clear in the instructions. I am sure you can wear your strap 24/7 if you want to but I don't. Polar changed the way the watch works since my last one. They now call it 'recording'. It may be more accurate this way. You record your exercise at the start and shut off the recording at the end of your workout. If I go to a special place like Disneyland for the day I have worn the strap and recorded it as an exercise under 'walking'. But there is no way I am wearing the strap all day. So, for just as a fitness tracker, you just put the watch on and go about your day and you don't push any buttons or record anything. This model does not come with a constant heart monitor (flashing lights under the watch) unless you wear the strap. I downloaded the PDF instruction manual and printed it out on my laser printer. I still have a lot to learn but that helps. Yes they totally need to work on their APPlication it could be far better then it is. I.E: Better explanation of what things are and more consolidation of data. Employees should never write the manual or instructions because they assume the end user knows what is obvious to them.Original Review - This is an amazing fitness tracker / workout watch. Amazon did not have it at the time I bought mine so I bought it at REI. I have been a Polar fan for over 20 years. I kept wondering why they had not developed a fitness watch like so many manufacturers. Polar has always been considered the Rolls Royce of workout watches. You put a strap around your chest and it keeps track of your vitals (including heart rate) during your workout at the gym or at home. The chest strap is far more accurate then the blinking lights under the bottom of the watch on the new trackers which Polar did not add. Polar introduced this A300 just ahead of the Apple watch. I am sure the Apple watch will be amazing but it starts at $349 and has an 18 hour battery life. The Polar A300 has a 4 week battery life and it is $140 without the heart chest strap. On the Polar USA site I bought 2 more awesome bands at about $28 each. This watch is the update to the Polar M400 which has GPS, the A300 does not. But I have no need for GPS since my memory works well and I know where I have been! Plus later this year there will be a firmware update to only this watch (not the M400), to give you phone notifications. Wow that will be AWESOME!So when you bring this watch home you download, on your computer (phone), the program / app that tracks all your vitals in one spot. There are both Android and IOS apps. You pull the watch out of the watch band and it has a USB plug on it. Plug it into your computer and the program / application will open. You should go thru the program / app and make any necessary changes. By default several things are public. I made everything private since I don't want to share my fitness details around the world hahaha. After you make your changes click on the sync and it downloads all your workouts to the program / app so you can watch your progress, recharges the watch (very fast) and checks the time etc.So basically once the watch is synced and charged up unplug it from the computer and put it back into your watch band. I wear mine 24/7 because I found it to be very comfortable. If you just want to use it as a fitness tracker, put it on your wrist and that's it (the instructions do not explain that). It will do everything automatically. If you don't move your butt every 50 minutes or so it will vibrate on your wrist and tell you to move. If you don't you will get a bad boy badge lol! Do not push the center button either. That means you are 'flipping off' the watch about moving and it will also give you a bad boy badge. On the face of the watch is a rectangular box that fills up solid as you move about. The empty area will have 'pixxy dust' sprinkling around but only when you are moving. It is very cool! In the evening it automatically stops bothering you about moving. It also somehow knows you are sleeping, also amazing. Inside the program it doesn't give you a bunch of mumbo jumbo junk about your sleep, it just gives you a percentage of how you slept. It tells you how many hours of sleep you got and how many hours of restless sleep you got.When you want to work out you put a Bluetooth chest band on. In the program you can set up your workouts. I deleted the presets and added just the ones that I need. It has indoor cycling, elliptical, weight lifting and etc modes. I also learned this the hard way and I think it's correct. You only push the center watch button when you want to work out (unless you want to see your step progress during the day). The center button starts to 'RECORD' your workout. So push the center button then use the right up or down buttons to pick your workout and start your exercise. In my case, I ride the indoor cycle, start to record and when I am done I stop recording. So when I go next to the elliptical I repeat that process. I do not know how to combine them yet. But it is super simple to record each type of exercise individually. FYI if you need to know, what time it is, as you workout, just hold your watch up to your chest strap and the screen will light up and tell you the time for a few seconds.Like I said the battery lasts 4 weeks but I am excited to see my progress so every few days I plug the watch in to see how I am doing. So it is always charged. But you can also recharge the watch in any USB charger. The last thing I would suggest, do the 'FITNESS TEST' on the very first day. Get the watch set up, sit in your favorite recliner with the chest strap on and do the test. This will give you a base line of your fitness and help you see your progress. Seriously buy this watch it is great. Good luck !

My 2 year old, original battery, in my Samsung Galaxy S4, started to heat up my phone and the battery life drained after just a couple hours. This is a wonderful story of a chipmunk who needs to learn how to listen to his mom. But he wants adventure and is bored with the chores.Will he ever learn to listen to his mom?
